tika-vin04t:4: Sammajjanī padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena ca;
tika-vin04t:7: Chanda, pārisuddhi, utukkhānaṃ, bhikkhugaṇanā ca ovādo;
tika-vin04t:12: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti, “pattakalla”nti vuccati.
tika-vin04t:13: Pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni samāpetvā desitāpattikassa samaggassa bhikkhusaṅghassa anumatiyā pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ ārādhanaṃ karoma.
tika-vin04t:15: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho? Ajjuposatho pannaraso, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya.
tika-vin04t:16_0: Kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakiccaṃ? Pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocetha, pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi,
tika-vin04t:16_1: taṃ sabbeva santā sādhukaṃ suṇoma manasi karoma. Yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyya,
tika-vin04t:16_2: asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ, tuṇhībhāvena kho panāyasmante “parisuddhā”ti
tika-vin04t:16_3: vedissāmi. Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti, evamevaṃ evarūpāya
tika-vin04t:16_4: parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hoti. Yo pana bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ anusāviyamāne saramāno
tika-vin04t:16_5: santiṃ āpattiṃ nāvikareyya, sampajānamusāvādassa hoti. Sampajānamusāvādo kho panāyasmanto
tika-vin04t:16_6: antarāyiko dhammo vutto bhagavatā, tasmā saramānena bhikkhunā āpannena visuddhāpekkhena
tika-vin04t:16_7: santī āpatti āvikātabbā, āvikatā hissa phāsu hoti.
tika-vin04t:17_0: Uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ. Tatthāyasmante pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, dutiyampi
tika-vin04t:17_1: pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyasmanto,
tika-vin04t:20: Tatrime cattāro pārājikā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
tika-vin04t:22: 1. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, antamaso tiracchānagatāyapi, pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
tika-vin04t:24_0: 2. Yo pana bhikkhu gāmā vā araññā vā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyya, yathārūpe
tika-vin04t:24_1: adinnādāne rājāno coraṃ gahetvā haneyyuṃ vā bandheyyuṃ vā pabbājeyyuṃ vā corosi bālosi
tika-vin04t:24_2: mūḷhosi thenosīti, tathārūpaṃ bhikkhu adinnaṃ ādiyamāno ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
tika-vin04t:26_0: 3. Yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, satthahārakaṃ vāssa
tika-vin04t:26_1: pariyeseyya, maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya “ambho purisa kiṃ
tika-vin04t:26_2: tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena, mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo”ti, iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo
tika-vin04t:26_3: anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya, ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
tika-vin04t:28_0: 4. Yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ attupanāyikaṃ alamariyañāṇadassanaṃ
tika-vin04t:28_1: samudācareyya “iti jānāmi, iti passāmī”ti, tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno
tika-vin04t:28_2: vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṃ vadeyya “ajānamevaṃ āvuso avacaṃ
tika-vin04t:28_3: jānāmi, apassaṃ passāmi, tucchaṃ musā vilapi”nti, aññatra adhimānā, ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
tika-vin04t:29_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā. Yesaṃ bhikkhu aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ
tika-vin04t:29_1: vā āpajjitvā na labhati bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ yathā pure, tathā pacchā, pārājiko
tika-vin04t:29_2: hoti asaṃvāso. Tatthāyasmante pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi,
tika-vin04t:29_3: kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyasmanto,
tika-vin04t:37_0: 2. Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyya
tika-vin04t:37_1: hatthaggāhaṃ vā veṇiggāhaṃ vā aññatarassa vā aññatarassa vā aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:39: 3. Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāseyya yathā taṃ yuvā yuvatiṃ methunupasaṃhitāhi, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:41_0: 4. Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya
tika-vin04t:41_1: vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya “etadaggaṃ bhagini pāricariyānaṃ yā mādisaṃ sīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:41_2: brahmacāriṃ etena dhammena paricareyyā”ti methunupasaṃhitena, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:43: 5. Yo pana bhikkhu sañcarittaṃ samāpajjeyya itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ purisassa vā itthimatiṃ, jāyattane vā jārattane vā, antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapi, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:45_0: 6. Saññācikāya pana bhikkhunā kuṭiṃ kārayamānena assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ pamāṇikā kāretabbā,
tika-vin04t:45_1: tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso dvādasa vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ sattantarā,
tika-vin04t:45_2: bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāya, tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:45_3: Sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kāreyya, bhikkhū vā
tika-vin04t:45_4: anabhineyya vatthudesanāya, pamāṇaṃ vā atikkāmeyya, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:47_0: 7. Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ bhikkhū abhinetabbā
tika-vin04t:47_1: vatthudesanāya, tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ. Sārambhe
tika-vin04t:47_2: ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kāreyya, bhikkhū vā anabhineyya
tika-vin04t:49_0: 8. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ duṭṭho doso appatīto amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya
tika-vin04t:49_1: “appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti, tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno
tika-vin04t:49_2: vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti, bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:51_0: 9. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ duṭṭho doso appatīto aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ
tika-vin04t:51_1: lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya “appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā
tika-vin04t:51_2: cāveyya”nti, tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā aññabhāgiyañceva
tika-vin04t:51_3: taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti kocideso lesamatto upādinno, bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:53_0: 10. Yo pana bhikkhu samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkameyya, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ
tika-vin04t:53_1: vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo
tika-vin04t:53_2: “māyasmā samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:53_3: samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi, sametāyasmā saṅghena, samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno
tika-vin04t:53_4: ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti, evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:53_5: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce
tika-vin04t:53_6: samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyya, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:55_0: 11. Tasseva kho pana bhikkhussa bhikkhū honti anuvattakā vaggavādakā eko vā dve vā
tika-vin04t:55_1: tayo vā, te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “māyasmanto etaṃ bhikkhuṃ kiñci avacuttha, dhammavādī ceso
tika-vin04t:55_2: bhikkhu, vinayavādī ceso bhikkhu, amhākañceso bhikkhu chandañca ruciñca ādāya voharati,
tika-vin04t:55_3: jānāti, no bhāsati, amhākampetaṃ khamatī”ti, te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi evamassu vacanīyā
tika-vin04t:55_4: “māyasmanto evaṃ avacuttha, na ceso bhikkhu dhammavādī, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavādī,
tika-vin04t:55_5: māyasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, sametāyasmantānaṃ saṅghena, samaggo hi saṅgho
tika-vin04t:55_6: sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti, evañca te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi vuccamānā
tika-vin04t:55_7: tatheva paggaṇheyyuṃ, te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:55_8: yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:57_0: 12. Bhikkhu paneva dubbacajātiko hoti uddesapariyāpannesu sikkhāpadesu bhikkhūhi
tika-vin04t:57_1: sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoti “mā maṃ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha
tika-vin04t:57_2: kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā, ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:57_3: viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā”ti, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “māyasmā
tika-vin04t:57_4: attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi, vacanīyamevāyasmā attānaṃ karotu, āyasmāpi bhikkhū vadatu
tika-vin04t:57_5: sahadhammena, bhikkhūpi āyasmantaṃ vakkhanti sahadhammena, evaṃ saṃvaddhā hi tassa
tika-vin04t:57_6: bhagavato parisā yadidaṃ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā”ti, evañca so bhikkhu
tika-vin04t:57_7: bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo
tika-vin04t:57_8: tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ
tika-vin04t:59_0: 13. Bhikkhu paneva aññataraṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati kuladūsako pāpasamācāro,
tika-vin04t:59_1: tassa kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, kulāni ca tena duṭṭhāni dissanti
tika-vin04t:59_2: ceva suyyanti ca, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “āyasmā kho kuladūsako pāpasamācāro,
tika-vin04t:59_3: āyasmato kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, kulāni cāyasmatā duṭṭhāni
tika-vin04t:59_4: dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, pakkamatāyasmā imamhā āvāsā, alaṃ te idha vāsenā”ti, evañca
tika-vin04t:59_5: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno te bhikkhū evaṃ vadeyya “chandagāmino ca bhikkhū,
tika-vin04t:59_6: dosagāmino ca bhikkhū, mohagāmino ca bhikkhū, bhayagāmino ca bhikkhū tādisikāya āpattiyā
tika-vin04t:59_7: ekaccaṃ pabbājenti, ekaccaṃ na pabbājentī”ti, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo
tika-vin04t:59_8: “māyasmā evaṃ avaca, na ca bhikkhū chandagāmino, na ca bhikkhū dosagāmino, na ca
tika-vin04t:59_9: bhikkhū mohagāmino, na ca bhikkhū bhayagāmino, āyasmā kho kuladūsako pāpasamācāro,
tika-vin04t:59_10: āyasmato kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, kulāni cāyasmatā duṭṭhāni
tika-vin04t:59_11: dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, pakkamatāyasmā imamhā āvāsā, alaṃ te idha vāsenā”ti, evañca
tika-vin04t:59_12: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:59_13: samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:59_14: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyya, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:60_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto terasa saṅghādisesā dhammā nava paṭhamāpattikā, cattāro yāvatatiyakā.
tika-vin04t:60_1: Yesaṃ bhikkhu aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjitvā yāvatīhaṃ jānaṃ paṭicchādeti, tāvatīhaṃ
tika-vin04t:60_2: tena bhikkhunā akāmā parivatthabbaṃ. Parivutthaparivāsena bhikkhunā uttari chārattaṃ
tika-vin04t:60_3: bhikkhumānattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ, ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho,
tika-vin04t:60_4: tattha so bhikkhu abbhetabbo. Ekenapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho taṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin04t:60_5: abbheyya, so ca bhikkhu anabbhito, te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci. Tatthāyasmante
tika-vin04t:60_6: pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi
tika-vin04t:60_7: pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin04t:63: Ime kho panāyasmanto dve aniyatā dhammā
tika-vin04t:66_0: 1. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye
tika-vin04t:66_1: nisajjaṃ kappeyya, tamenaṃ saddheyyavacasā upāsikā disvā tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena
tika-vin04t:66_2: vadeyya pārājikena vā saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā, nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamāno
tika-vin04t:66_3: tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabbo pārājikena vā saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena
tika-vin04t:66_4: vā, yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya, tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo, ayaṃ dhammo aniyato.
tika-vin04t:68_0: 2. Na heva kho pana paṭicchannaṃ āsanaṃ hoti nālaṃkammaniyaṃ, alañca kho hoti mātugāmaṃ
tika-vin04t:68_1: duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsituṃ, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpe āsane mātugāmena saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:68_2: eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, tamenaṃ saddheyyavacasā upāsikā disvā dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-vin04t:68_3: aññatarena vadeyya saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā, nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamāno
tika-vin04t:68_4: dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabbo saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā, yena vā
tika-vin04t:68_5: sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya, tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo, ayampi dhammo aniyato.
tika-vin04t:69_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto dve aniyatā dhammā. Tatthāyasmante pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā,
tika-vin04t:69_1: dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā,
tika-vin04t:72: Ime kho panāyasmanto tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā
tika-vin04t:75: 1. Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ, taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:77: 2. Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:79_0: 3. Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuno paneva akālacīvaraṃ
tika-vin04t:79_1: uppajjeyya, ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paṭiggahetvā khippameva kāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:79_2: no cassa pāripūri, māsaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ ūnassa pāripūriyā
tika-vin04t:79_3: satiyā paccāsāya. Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya satiyāpi paccāsāya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:81: 4. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpeyya vā rajāpeyya vā ākoṭāpeyya vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:83: 5. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyya aññatra pārivattakā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:85_0: 6. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpeyya aññatra
tika-vin04t:85_1: samayā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo, acchinnacīvaro vā hoti bhikkhu,
tika-vin04t:87_0: 7. Tañce aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā bahūhi cīvarehi abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya,
tika-vin04t:87_1: santaruttaraparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari sādiyeyya,
tika-vin04t:89_0: 8. Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa aññātakassa gahapatissa vā gahapatāniyā vā cīvaracetāpannaṃ
tika-vin04t:89_1: upakkhaṭaṃ hoti “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena
tika-vin04t:89_2: acchādessāmī”ti, tatra ce so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ
tika-vin04t:89_3: āpajjeyya “sādhu vata maṃ āyasmā iminā cīvaracetāpannena evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:89_4: cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā acchādehī”ti kalyāṇakamyataṃ upādāya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:91_0: 9. Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa ubhinnaṃ aññātakānaṃ gahapatīnaṃ vā gahapatānīnaṃ vā paccekacīvaracetāpannāni
tika-vin04t:91_1: upakkhaṭāni honti “imehi mayaṃ paccekacīvaracetāpannehi paccekacīvarāni cetāpetvā
tika-vin04t:91_2: itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarehi acchādessāmā”ti, tatra ce so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito
tika-vin04t:91_3: upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya “sādhu vata maṃ āyasmanto imehi paccekacīvaracetāpannehi
tika-vin04t:91_4: evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vā cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā acchādetha ubhova santā ekenā”ti kalyāṇakamyataṃ
tika-vin04t:93_0: 10. Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa rājā vā rājabhoggo vā brāhmaṇo vā gahapatiko vā dūtena
tika-vin04t:93_1: cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyya “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin04t:93_2: bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti. So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya
tika-vin04t:93_3: “idaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā
tika-vin04t:93_4: cīvaracetāpanna”nti. Tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:93_5: cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma, cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiya”nti.
tika-vin04t:93_6: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ vadeyya “atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti. Cīvaratthikena,
tika-vin04t:93_7: bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā “eso kho,
tika-vin04t:93_8: āvuso, bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti. So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ
tika-vin04t:93_9: bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “yaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi,
tika-vin04t:93_10: saññatto so mayā, upasaṅkamatāyasmā kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī”ti. Cīvaratthikena,
tika-vin04t:93_11: bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo
tika-vin04t:93_12: “attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā”ti, dvattikkhattuṃ codayamāno sārayamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
tika-vin04t:93_13: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce abhinipphādeyya, catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ
tika-vin04t:93_14: tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ, catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūto
tika-vin04t:93_15: uddissa tiṭṭhamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, tato ce uttari vāyamamāno
tika-vin04t:93_16: taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. No ce abhinipphādeyya, yatassa
tika-vin04t:93_17: cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, tattha sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ, dūto vā pāhetabbo “yaṃ kho tumhe
tika-vin04t:93_18: āyasmanto bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha, na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci
tika-vin04t:93_19: atthaṃ anubhoti, yuñjantāyasmanto sakaṃ, mā vo sakaṃ vinassā”ti, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
tika-vin04t:96: 11. Yo pana bhikkhu kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:98: 12. Yo pana bhikkhu suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:100_0: 13. Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārayamānena dve bhāgā suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ
tika-vin04t:100_1: ādātabbā, tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ, catutthaṃ gocariyānaṃ. Anādā ce bhikkhu dve bhāge suddhakāḷakānaṃ
tika-vin04t:100_2: eḷakalomānaṃ, tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ, catutthaṃ gocariyānaṃ, navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:102_0: 14. Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārāpetvā chabbassāni dhāretabbaṃ, orena ce channaṃ
tika-vin04t:102_1: vassānaṃ taṃ santhataṃ vissajjetvā vā avissajjetvā vā aññaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya
tika-vin04t:104_0: 15. Nisīdanasanthataṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthi
tika-vin04t:104_1: ādātabbā dubbaṇṇakaraṇāya. Anādā ce bhikkhu purāṇasantha tassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ,
tika-vin04t:106_0: 16. Bhikkhuno paneva addhānamaggappaṭipannassa eḷakalomāni uppajjeyyuṃ, ākaṅkhamānena
tika-vin04t:106_1: bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbāni, paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaparamaṃ sahatthā haritabbāni asante
tika-vin04t:106_2: hārake. Tato ce uttari hareyya, asantepi hārake, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:108: 17. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpeyya vā rajāpeyya vā vijaṭāpeyya vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:110: 18. Yo pana bhikkhu jātarūparajataṃ uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:112: 19. Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:114: 20. Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:117: 21. Dasāhaparamaṃ atirekapatto dhāretabbo, taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:119_0: 22. Yo pana bhikkhu ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:119_1: pācittiyaṃ. Tena bhikkhunā so patto bhikkhuparisāya nissajjitabbo, yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya
tika-vin04t:119_2: pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo “ayaṃ te bhikkhu patto yāva bhedanāya
tika-vin04t:121_0: 23. Yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni, seyyathidaṃ
tika-vin04t:121_1: – sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ, tāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ
tika-vin04t:123_1: seso gimhāna”nti katvā nivāsetabbaṃ. Orena ce “māso seso gimhāna”nti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ
tika-vin04t:123_2: pariyeseyya, orena“ddhamāso seso gimhāna”nti katvā nivāseyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:125: 25. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:127: 26. Yo pana bhikkhu sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:129_0: 27. Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ
tika-vin04t:129_1: vāyāpeyya, tatra ce so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ
tika-vin04t:129_2: āpajjeyya “idaṃ kho, āvuso, cīvaraṃ maṃ uddissa viyyati, āyatañca karotha, vitthatañca,
tika-vin04t:129_3: appitañca, suvītañca, suppavāyitañca, suvilekhitañca, suvitacchitañca karotha, appeva
tika-vin04t:129_4: nāma mayampi āyasmantānaṃ kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyāmā”ti. Evañca so bhikkhu vatvā
tika-vin04t:129_5: kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyya antamaso piṇḍapātamattampi, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:131_0: 28. Dasāhānāgataṃ kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamaṃ bhikkhuno paneva accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:131_1: accekaṃ maññamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paṭiggahetvā yāva cīvarakālasamayaṃ
tika-vin04t:131_2: nikkhipitabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:133_0: 29. Upavassaṃ kho pana kattikapuṇṇamaṃ yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni
tika-vin04t:133_1: sappaṭibhayāni, tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto ākaṅkhamāno tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ
tika-vin04t:133_2: aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipeyya, siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo
tika-vin04t:133_3: tena cīvarena vippavāsāya, chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:133_4: Tato ce uttari vippavaseyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:135: 30. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:137_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā. Tatthāyasmante pucchāmi,
tika-vin04t:137_1: kaccittha parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi,
tika-vin04t:137_2: kaccittha parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin04t:149: 4. Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vāceyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:151: 5. Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:153: 6. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:155: 7. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ deseyya aññatra viññunā purisaviggahena, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:157: 8. Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṃ āroceyya, bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:159: 9. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannassa āroceyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:161: 10. Yo pana bhikkhu pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:170_0: 14. Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse
tika-vin04t:170_1: santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:172: 15. Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyya, anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:174_0: 16. Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ
tika-vin04t:174_1: kappeyya “yassa sambādho bhavissati, so pakkamissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā
tika-vin04t:176: 17. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ kupito anattamano saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:178: 18. Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:180_0: 19. Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya
tika-vin04t:180_1: ālokasandhiparikammāya dvatticchadanassa pariyāyaṃ appaharite ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:180_2: tato ce uttari appaharitepi ṭhito adhiṭṭhaheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:182: 20. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:185: 21. Yo pana bhikkhu asammato bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:187: 22. Sammatopi ce bhikkhu atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:189: 23. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānā hoti bhikkhunī, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
tika-vin04t:191: 24. Yo pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya “āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī”ti, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:193: 25. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dadeyya aññatra pārivattakā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:195: 26. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbeyya vā sibbāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:197_0: 27. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso
tika-vin04t:197_1: gāmantarampi aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo, satthagamanīyo hoti maggo,
tika-vin04t:199: 28. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruheyya uddhaṃgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā aññatra tiriyaṃ taraṇāya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:201: 29. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjeyya aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:203: 30. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:206: 31. Agilānena bhikkhunā eko āvasathapiṇḍo bhuñjitabbo. Tato ce uttari bhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:208_0: 32. Gaṇabhojane aññatra samayā pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo,
tika-vin04t:208_1: cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, nāvābhiruhanasamayo, mahāsamayo, samaṇabhattasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
tika-vin04t:210: 33. Paramparabhojane aññatra samayā pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
tika-vin04t:212_0: 34. Bhikkhuṃ paneva kulaṃ upagataṃ pūvehi vā manthehi vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya, ākaṅkhamānena
tika-vin04t:212_1: bhikkhunā dvattipattapūrā paṭiggahetabbā. Tato ce uttari paṭiggaṇheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:212_2: Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvā tato nīharitvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitabbaṃ, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
tika-vin04t:214: 35. Yo pana bhikkhu bhuttāvī pavārito anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:216_0: 36. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena
tika-vin04t:216_1: vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya “handa bhikkhu khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti jānaṃ āsādanāpekkho,
tika-vin04t:218: 37. Yo pana bhikkhu vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:220: 38. Yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:222_0: 39. Yāni kho pana tāni paṇītabhojanāni, seyyathidaṃ – sappi, navanītaṃ, telaṃ, madhu,
tika-vin04t:222_1: phāṇitaṃ, maccho, maṃsaṃ, khīraṃ, dadhi. Yo pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni
tika-vin04t:222_2: agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:224: 40. Yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya aññatra udakadantaponā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:227: 41. Yo pana bhikkhu acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:229_0: 42. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ “ehāvuso, gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti
tika-vin04t:229_1: tassa dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vā uyyojeyya “gacchāvuso, na me tayā saddhiṃ kathā vā nisajjā
tika-vin04t:229_2: vā phāsu hoti, ekakassa me kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hotī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā
tika-vin04t:231: 43. Yo pana bhikkhu sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:233: 44. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:235: 45. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:237_0: 46. Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ
tika-vin04t:237_1: vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:237_2: samayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
tika-vin04t:239: 47. Agilānena bhikkhunā catumāsappaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya, aññatra niccapavāraṇāya. Tato ce uttari sādiyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:241: 48. Yo pana bhikkhu uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:243: 49. Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya, dirattatirattaṃ tena bhikkhunā senāya vasitabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari vaseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:245: 50. Dirattatirattaṃ ce bhikkhu senāya vasamāno uyyodhikaṃ vā balaggaṃ vā senābyūhaṃ vā anīkadassanaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:256: 55. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:258: 56. Yo pana bhikkhu agilāno visibbanāpekkho jotiṃ samādaheyya vā samādahāpeyya vā aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:260_0: 57. Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:260_1: samayo “diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhāna”nti “vassānassa paṭhamo māso” iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā
tika-vin04t:260_2: uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, vātavuṭṭhisamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
tika-vin04t:262_0: 58. Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhena tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:262_1: ādātabbaṃ nīlaṃ vā kaddamaṃ vā kāḷasāmaṃ vā. Anādā ce bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ
tika-vin04t:262_2: aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:264: 59. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:266: 60. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā antamaso hasāpekkhopi, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:269: 61. Yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:271: 62. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:273: 63. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:275: 64. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:277: 65. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādeyya, so ca puggalo anupasampanno, te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, idaṃ tasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:279: 66. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:281: 67. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:283_0: 68. Yo pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā
tika-vin04t:283_1: yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti, so bhikkhu
tika-vin04t:283_2: bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “māyasmā evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi
tika-vin04t:283_3: sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya, anekapariyāyenāvuso antarāyikā
tika-vin04t:283_4: dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā, alañca pana te paṭisevato antarāyāyā”ti. Evañca
tika-vin04t:283_5: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:283_6: samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya. Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:283_7: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce paṭinissajjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:285: 69. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā, saṃvaseyya vā, saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:287_0: 70. Samaṇuddesopi ce evaṃ vadeyya “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā
tika-vin04t:287_1: yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti, so samaṇuddeso
tika-vin04t:287_2: bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “māvuso, samaṇuddesa evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi,
tika-vin04t:287_3: na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya, anekapariyāyenāvuso,
tika-vin04t:287_4: samaṇuddesa antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā, alañca pana te paṭisevato
tika-vin04t:287_5: antarāyāyā”ti, evañca so samaṇuddeso bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so
tika-vin04t:287_6: samaṇuddeso bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “ajjatagge te, āvuso, samaṇuddesa na ceva
tika-vin04t:287_7: so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo, yampi caññe samaṇuddesā labhanti bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:287_8: dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ, sāpi te natthi, cara pire, vinassā”ti. Yo pana bhikkhu
tika-vin04t:287_9: jānaṃ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upalāpeyya vā, upaṭṭhāpeyya vā, sambhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:290_0: 71. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno evaṃ vadeyya “na tāvāhaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:290_1: etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi, yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchāmī”ti,
tika-vin04t:290_2: pācittiyaṃ. Sikkhamānena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā aññātabbaṃ paripucchitabbaṃ paripañhitabbaṃ, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
tika-vin04t:292_0: 72. Yo pana bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “kiṃ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi
tika-vin04t:292_1: sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṃvattantī”ti, sikkhāpadavivaṇṇake pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:294_0: 73. Yo pana bhikkhu anvaddhamāsaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “idāneva kho
tika-vin04t:294_1: ahaṃ jānāmi, ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ
tika-vin04t:294_2: āgacchatī”ti. Tañce bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū jāneyyuṃ nisinnapubbaṃ iminā bhikkhunā
tika-vin04t:294_3: dvattikkhattuṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne, ko pana vādo bhiyyo, na ca tassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin04t:294_4: aññāṇakena mutti atthi, yañca tattha āpattiṃ āpanno, tañca yathādhammo kāretabbo,
tika-vin04t:294_5: uttari cassa moho āropetabbo “tassa te, āvuso, alābhā, tassa te dulladdhaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ
tika-vin04t:294_6: pātimokkhe uddissamānena sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karosī”ti, idaṃ tasmiṃ mohanake pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:296: 74. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano pahāraṃ dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:298: 75. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggireyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:300: 76. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:302: 77. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadaheyya “itissa muhuttampi aphāsu bhavissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:304: 78. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭheyya “yaṃ ime bhaṇissanti, taṃ sossāmī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:306: 79. Yo pana bhikkhu dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:308: 80. Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkameyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:310: 81. Yo pana bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya “yathāsanthutaṃ bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmentī”ti, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:312: 82. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:315: 83. Yo pana bhikkhu rañño khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa anikkhantarājake aniggataratanake pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito indakhīlaṃ atikkāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:317_0: 84. Yo pana bhikkhu ratanaṃ vā ratanasammataṃ vā aññatra ajjhārāmā vā ajjhāvasathā
tika-vin04t:317_1: vā uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ. Ratanaṃ vā pana bhikkhunā ratanasammataṃ
tika-vin04t:317_2: vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbaṃ “yassa
tika-vin04t:317_3: bhavissati, so harissatī”ti, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
tika-vin04t:319: 85. Yo pana bhikkhu santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchāvikāle gāmaṃ paviseyya aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:321: 86. Yo pana bhikkhu aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā visāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārāpeyya, bhedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:323: 87. Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārayamānena aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugataṅgulena aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyā. Taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:325: 88. Yo pana bhikkhu mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpeyya, uddālanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:327_0: 89. Nisīdanaṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikaṃ kāretabbaṃ, tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:327_1: dīghaso dve vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ diyaḍḍhaṃ, dasā vidatthi. Taṃ atikkāmayato
tika-vin04t:329_0: 90. Kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikā kāretabbā, tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:329_1: dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo. Taṃ atikkāmayato
tika-vin04t:331_0: 91. Vassikasāṭikaṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikā kāretabbā, tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:331_1: dīghaso cha vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ aḍḍhateyyā. Taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:333_0: 92. Yo pana bhikkhu sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeyya, atirekaṃ vā, chedanakaṃ
tika-vin04t:333_1: pācittiyaṃ. Tatridaṃ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ, dīghaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā,
tika-vin04t:333_2: tiriyaṃ cha vidatthiyo, idaṃ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇanti.
tika-vin04t:335_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto dvenavuti pācittiyā dhammā. Tatthāyasmante pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:335_1: parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:335_2: parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin04t:341_0: 1. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṃ
tika-vin04t:341_1: vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena
tika-vin04t:341_2: bhikkhunā “gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī”ti.
tika-vin04t:343_0: 2. Bhikkhū paneva kulesu nimantitā bhuñjanti, tatra ce sā bhikkhunī vosāsamānarūpā
tika-vin04t:343_1: ṭhitā hoti “idha sūpaṃ detha, idha odanaṃ dethā”ti. Tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā
tika-vin04t:343_2: “apasakka tāva bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī”ti. Ekassapi ce bhikkhuno na paṭibhāseyya
tika-vin04t:343_3: taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apasādetuṃ “apasakka tāva bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī”ti, paṭidesetabbaṃ
tika-vin04t:343_4: tehi bhikkhūhi “gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjimhā asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemā”ti.
tika-vin04t:345_0: 3. Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu
tika-vin04t:345_1: kulesu pubbe animantito agilāno khādanīyaṃ vā, bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin04t:345_2: khādeyya vā, bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā “gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:347_0: 4. Yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni sappaṭibhayāni, yo pana
tika-vin04t:347_1: bhikkhu tathārūpesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā, bhojanīyaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:347_2: ajjhārāme sahatthā paṭiggahetvā agilāno khādeyya vā, bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ
tika-vin04t:347_3: tena bhikkhunā “gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī”ti.
tika-vin04t:348_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pāṭidesanīyā dhammā. Tatthāyasmante pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:348_1: parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:348_2: parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin04t:351: Ime kho panāyasmanto sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
tika-vin04t:365: 9. Na ukkhittakāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:366: 10. Na ukkhittakāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:369: 11. Na ujjagghikāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:370: 12. Na ujjagghikāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:375: 15. Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:376: 16. Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:378: 17. Na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:381: 19. Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:382: 20. Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:385: 21. Na khambhakato antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:386: 22. Na khambhakato antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:388: 23. Na oguṇṭhito antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:389: 24. Na oguṇṭhito antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:391: 25. Na ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:393: 26. Na pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:412: 35. Na thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:414: 36. Na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāyāti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:416: 37. Na sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:418: 38. Na ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:425: 41. Na anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivarissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:427: 42. Na bhuñjamāno sabbahatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:429: 43. Na sakabaḷena mukhena byāharissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:454: 55. Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:456: 56. Na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:458: 57. Na chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:460: 58. Na daṇḍapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:462: 59. Na satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:464: 60. Na āvudhapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:467: 61. Na pādukāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:469: 62. Na upāhanāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:471: 63. Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:473: 64. Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:475: 65. Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:477: 66. Na veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:479: 67. Na oguṇṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:481: 68. Na chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:483: 69. Na nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:485: 70. Na ṭhito nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:487: 71. Na pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:489: 72. Na uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:491: 73. Na ṭhito agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:493: 74. Na harite agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:495: 75. Na udake agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:497_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto sekhiyā dhammā. Tatthāyasmante pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā,
tika-vin04t:497_1: dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā,
tika-vin04t:502: Uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo.
tika-vin04t:509_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā. Tatthāyasmante, pucchāmi kaccittha
tika-vin04t:509_1: parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:509_2: parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin04t:519_0: Uddiṭṭhā satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā, ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ
tika-vin04t:519_1: anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchati, tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabbanti.
tika-vin04t:525: Sammajjanī padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena ca;
tika-vin04t:528: Chanda, pārisuddhi, utukkhānaṃ, bhikkhunigaṇanā ca ovādo;
tika-vin04t:533: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti, “pattakalla”nti vuccati.
tika-vin04t:534: Pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni samāpetvā desitāpattikassa samaggassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa anumatiyā pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ ārādhanaṃ karoma.
tika-vin04t:536: Suṇātu me ayye saṅgho, ajjuposatho pannaraso, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya.
tika-vin04t:537_0: Kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakiccaṃ? Pārisuddhiṃ ayyāyo ārocetha, pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi,
tika-vin04t:537_1: taṃ sabbāva santā sādhukaṃ suṇoma manasi karoma. Yassā siyā āpatti, sā āvikareyya,
tika-vin04t:537_2: asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ, tuṇhībhāvena kho panāyyāyo, “parisuddhā”ti vedissāmi.
tika-vin04t:537_3: Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassā veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti, evamevaṃ evarūpāya parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:537_4: anusāvitaṃ hoti. Yā pana bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ anusāviyamāne saramānā santiṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin04t:537_5: nāvikareyya, sampajānamusāvādassā hoti. Sampajānamusāvādo kho panāyyāyo, antarāyiko
tika-vin04t:537_6: dhammo vutto bhagavatā, tasmā saramānāya bhikkhuniyā āpannāya visuddhāpekkhāya santī
tika-vin04t:537_7: āpatti āvikātabbā, āvikatā hissā phāsu hoti.
tika-vin04t:538_0: Uddiṭṭhaṃ kho, ayyāyo, nidānaṃ. Tatthāyyāyo pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, dutiyampi
tika-vin04t:538_1: pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyyāyo,
tika-vin04t:541: Tatrime aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
tika-vin04t:543: 1. Yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, antamaso tiracchānagatenapi, pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā.
tika-vin04t:545_0: 2. Yā pana bhikkhunī gāmā vā araññā vā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyya, yathārūpe
tika-vin04t:545_1: adinnādāne rājāno coraṃ gahetvā haneyyuṃ vā bandheyyuṃ vā pabbājeyyuṃ vā corāsi bālāsi
tika-vin04t:545_2: mūḷhāsi thenāsīti, tathārūpaṃ bhikkhunī adinnaṃ ādiyamānā ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā.
tika-vin04t:547_0: 3. Yā pana bhikkhunī sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, satthahārakaṃ vāssa
tika-vin04t:547_1: pariyeseyya, maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya “ambho purisa,
tika-vin04t:547_2: kiṃ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena, mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo”ti, iti cittamanā cittasaṅkappā
tika-vin04t:547_3: anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā.
tika-vin04t:549_0: 4. Yā pana bhikkhunī anabhijānaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ attupanāyikaṃ alamariyañāṇadassanaṃ
tika-vin04t:549_1: samudācareyya “iti jānāmi, iti passāmī”ti, tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamānā
tika-vin04t:549_2: vā asamanuggāhīyamānā vā āpannā visuddhāpekkhā evaṃ vadeyya “ajānamevaṃ, ayye, avacaṃ
tika-vin04t:549_3: jānāmi, apassaṃ passāmi, tucchaṃ musā vilapi”nti, aññatra adhimānā, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā.
tika-vin04t:551_0: 5. Yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa, adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin04t:551_1: āmasanaṃ vā parāmasanaṃ vā gahaṇaṃ vā chupanaṃ vā paṭipīḷanaṃ vā sādiyeyya, ayampi
tika-vin04t:553_0: 6. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nevattanā paṭicodeyya,
tika-vin04t:553_1: na gaṇassa āroceyya, yadā ca sā ṭhitā vā assa cutā vā nāsitā vā avassaṭā vā, sā pacchā
tika-vin04t:553_2: evaṃ vadeyya “pubbevāhaṃ, ayye, aññāsiṃ etaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ‘evarūpā ca evarūpā ca sā
tika-vin04t:553_3: bhaginī’ti, no ca kho attanā paṭicodessaṃ, na gaṇassa ārocessa”nti, ayampi pārājikā
tika-vin04t:555_0: 7. Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena
tika-vin04t:555_1: anādaraṃ appaṭikāraṃ akatasahāyaṃ tamanuvatteyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa
tika-vin04t:555_2: vacanīyā “eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena ukkhitto, dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena
tika-vin04t:555_3: anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo, māyye, etaṃ bhikkhuṃ anuvattī”ti, evañca sā bhikkhunī
tika-vin04t:555_4: bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā
tika-vin04t:555_5: tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyaṃ ce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ
tika-vin04t:555_6: kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā ukkhittānuvattikā.
tika-vin04t:557_0: 8. Yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇaṃ vā sādiyeyya,
tika-vin04t:557_1: saṅghāṭikaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ vā sādiyeyya, santiṭṭheyya vā, sallapeyya vā, saṅketaṃ vā gaccheyya,
tika-vin04t:557_2: purisassa vā abbhāgamanaṃ sādiyeyya, channaṃ vā anupaviseyya, kāyaṃ vā tadatthāya
tika-vin04t:557_3: upasaṃhareyya etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā aṭṭhavatthukā.
tika-vin04t:558_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā. Yesaṃ bhikkhunī aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ
tika-vin04t:558_1: vā āpajjitvā na labhati bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ yathā pure, tathā pacchā, pārājikā
tika-vin04t:558_2: hoti asaṃvāsā. Tatthāyyāyo, pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:558_3: parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyyāyo, tasmā
tika-vin04t:564_0: 1. Yā pana bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā dāsena
tika-vin04t:564_1: vā kammakārena vā antamaso samaṇaparibbājakenāpi, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ
tika-vin04t:566_0: 2. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ coriṃ vajjhaṃ viditaṃ anapaloketvā rājānaṃ vā saṅghaṃ
tika-vin04t:566_1: vā gaṇaṃ vā pūgaṃ vā seṇiṃ vā, aññatra kappā vuṭṭhāpeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ
tika-vin04t:568_0: 3. Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā vā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā nadīpāraṃ gaccheyya, ekā
tika-vin04t:568_1: vā rattiṃ vippavaseyya, ekā vā gaṇamhā ohiyeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ
tika-vin04t:570_0: 4. Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena
tika-vin04t:570_1: anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṃ, anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāreyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ
tika-vin04t:572_0: 5. Yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:572_1: bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ
tika-vin04t:574_0: 6. Yā pana bhikkhunī evaṃ vadeyya “kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto
tika-vin04t:574_1: vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā, iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti
tika-vin04t:574_2: khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā, taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti,
tika-vin04t:574_3: ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:576_0: 7. Yā pana bhikkhunī sañcarittaṃ samāpajjeyya itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ, purisassa vā
tika-vin04t:576_1: itthimatiṃ, jāyattane vā jārattane vā antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapi, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ
tika-vin04t:578_0: 8. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ duṭṭhā dosā appatītā amūlakena pārājikena dhammena
tika-vin04t:578_1: anuddhaṃseyya “appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti, tato aparena samayena
tika-vin04t:578_2: samanuggāhīyamānā vā asa manuggāhīyamānā vā amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti, bhikkhunī
tika-vin04t:578_3: ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:580_0: 9. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ duṭṭhā dosā appatītā aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa
tika-vin04t:580_1: kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya “appeva nāma naṃ
tika-vin04t:580_2: imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti, tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamānā vā asamanuggāhīyamānā
tika-vin04t:580_3: vā aññabhāgiyañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti. Kocideso lesamatto upādinno, bhikkhunī
tika-vin04t:580_4: ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:582_0: 10. Yā pana bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeyya “buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi dhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:582_1: paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā
tika-vin04t:582_2: samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ
tika-vin04t:582_3: santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī”ti. Sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “māyye
tika-vin04t:582_4: kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca ‘buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṃ
tika-vin04t:582_5: paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro,
tika-vin04t:582_6: santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ
tika-vin04t:582_7: carissāmī’ti, abhiramāyye, svākkhāto dhammo, cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti,
tika-vin04t:582_8: evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin04t:582_9: yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā
tika-vin04t:582_10: taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ
tika-vin04t:584_0: 11. Yā pana bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeyya
tika-vin04t:584_1: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo,
tika-vin04t:584_2: bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “māyye,
tika-vin04t:584_3: kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca ‘chandagāminiyo ca
tika-vin04t:584_4: bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo
tika-vin04t:584_5: ca bhikkhuniyo’ti, ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya, dosāpi gaccheyya, mohāpi gaccheyya,
tika-vin04t:584_6: bhayāpi gaccheyyā”ti. Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:584_7: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce
tika-vin04t:584_8: samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi
tika-vin04t:584_9: bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:586_0: 12. Bhikkhuniyo paneva saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa
tika-vin04t:586_1: vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā, tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi evamassu vacanīyā
tika-vin04t:586_2: “bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa
tika-vin04t:586_3: vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā, viviccathāyye, vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṅgho
tika-vin04t:586_4: vaṇṇetī”ti, evañca tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyyuṃ, tā
tika-vin04t:586_5: bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce
tika-vin04t:586_6: samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyyuṃ,
tika-vin04t:586_7: imāpi bhikkhuniyo yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:588_0: 13. Yā pana bhikkhunī evaṃ vadeyya “saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha, mā tumhe
tika-vin04t:588_1: nānā viharittha, santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa
tika-vin04t:588_2: vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā, tā saṅgho na kiñci āha tumhaññeva saṅgho
tika-vin04t:588_3: uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha – ‘bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā
tika-vin04t:588_4: viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā
tika-vin04t:588_5: vajjappaṭicchādikā, viviccathāyye, vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṅgho vaṇṇetī”’ti, sā
tika-vin04t:588_6: bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “māyye, evaṃ avaca, saṃsaṭṭhāva ayye tumhe
tika-vin04t:588_7: viharatha, mā tumhe nānā viharittha, santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā
tika-vin04t:588_8: evaṃsilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā, tā saṅgho
tika-vin04t:588_9: na kiñci āha, tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā
tika-vin04t:588_10: evamāha – ‘bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa
tika-vin04t:588_11: vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā, viviccathāyye, vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṅgho
tika-vin04t:588_12: vaṇṇetī”’ti, evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī
tika-vin04t:588_13: bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā
tika-vin04t:588_14: taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ
tika-vin04t:590_0: 14. Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkameyya, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ
tika-vin04t:590_1: vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā
tika-vin04t:590_2: “māyyā, samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:590_3: samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi, sametāyyā, saṅghena, samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno
tika-vin04t:590_4: ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti. Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:590_5: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce
tika-vin04t:590_6: samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi
tika-vin04t:590_7: bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:592_0: 15. Tassāyeva kho pana bhikkhuniyā bhikkhuniyo honti anuvattikā vaggavādikā ekā vā
tika-vin04t:592_1: dve vā tisso vā, tā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “māyyāyo, etaṃ bhikkhuniṃ kiñci avacuttha dhammavādinī
tika-vin04t:592_2: cesā bhikkhunī, vinayavādinī cesā bhikkhunī, amhākañcesā bhikkhunī chandañca ruciñca
tika-vin04t:592_3: ādāya voharati, jānāti, no bhāsati, amhākampetaṃ khamatī”ti, tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin04t:592_4: evamassu vacanīyā “māyyāyo, evaṃ avacuttha, na cesā bhikkhunī dhammavādinī, na cesā
tika-vin04t:592_5: bhikkhunī vinayavādinī, māyyānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, sametāyyānaṃ saṅghena,
tika-vin04t:592_6: samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti, evañca tā bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin04t:592_7: bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyyuṃ, tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:592_8: samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyyuṃ.
tika-vin04t:592_9: Iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, imāpi bhikkhuniyo yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:594_0: 16. Bhikkhunī paneva dubbacajātikā hoti uddesapariyāpannesu sikkhāpadesu bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin04t:594_1: sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānā attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoti “mā maṃ ayyāyo kiñci avacuttha
tika-vin04t:594_2: kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā, ahampāyyāyo, na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā, viramathāyyāyo,
tika-vin04t:594_3: mama vacanāyā”ti, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “māyyā, attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ
tika-vin04t:594_4: akāsi, vacanīyameva, ayyā, attānaṃ karotu, ayyāpi bhikkhuniyo vadatu sahadhammena,
tika-vin04t:594_5: bhikkhuniyopi ayyaṃ vakkhanti sahadhammena, evaṃ saṃvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā
tika-vin04t:594_6: yadidaṃ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā”ti. Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin04t:594_7: vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā
tika-vin04t:594_8: tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ
tika-vin04t:594_9: kusalaṃ. No ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:596_0: 17. Bhikkhunī paneva aññataraṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati kuladūsikā
tika-vin04t:596_1: pāpasamācārā, tassā kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, kulāni ca tāya
tika-vin04t:596_2: duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “ayyā,
tika-vin04t:596_3: kho kuladūsikā pāpasamācārā, ayyāya kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:596_4: kulāni cāyyāya, duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, pakkamatāyyā imamhā āvāsā, alaṃ
tika-vin04t:596_5: te idha vāsenā”ti. Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ
tika-vin04t:596_6: vadeyya “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo
tika-vin04t:596_7: ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, tādisikāya āpattiyā ekaccaṃ pabbājenti
tika-vin04t:596_8: ekaccaṃ na pabbājentī”ti, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “māyyā, evaṃ
tika-vin04t:596_9: avaca, na ca bhikkhuniyo chandagāminiyo, na ca bhikkhuniyo dosagāminiyo, na ca bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin04t:596_10: mohagāminiyo, na ca bhikkhuniyo bhayagāminiyo, ayyā kho kuladūsikā pāpasamācārā,
tika-vin04t:596_11: ayyāya kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca, kulāni cāyyāya duṭṭhāni dissanti
tika-vin04t:596_12: ceva suyyanti ca, pakkamatāyyā, imamhā āvāsā alaṃ te idha vāsenā”ti. Evañca sā bhikkhunī
tika-vin04t:596_13: bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā
tika-vin04t:596_14: tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ
tika-vin04t:596_15: kusalaṃ. No ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:597: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā nava paṭhamāpattikā, aṭṭha yāvatatiyakā,
tika-vin04t:598_0: Yesaṃ bhikkhunī aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjati, tāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe
tika-vin04t:598_1: pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ. Ciṇṇamānattā bhikkhunī yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅgho,
tika-vin04t:598_2: tattha sā bhikkhunī abbhetabbā. Ekāyapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅgho taṃ bhikkhuniṃ
tika-vin04t:598_3: abbheyya, sā ca bhikkhunī anabbhitā, tā ca bhikkhuniyo gārayhā, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
tika-vin04t:598_4: Tatthāyyāyo pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, dutiyampi, pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā,
tika-vin04t:598_5: tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyyāyo, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin04t:601: Ime kho panāyyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā
tika-vin04t:604: 1. Yā pana bhikkhunī pattasannicayaṃ kareyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:606: 2. Yā pana bhikkhunī akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:608_0: 3. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā sā pacchā evaṃ vadeyya
tika-vin04t:608_1: “handāyye, tuyhaṃ cīvaraṃ, āhara metaṃ cīvaraṃ, yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhamevetaṃ, yaṃ mayhaṃ
tika-vin04t:608_2: mayhamevetaṃ, āhara metaṃ cīvaraṃ, sakaṃ paccāharā”ti acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya
tika-vin04t:610: 4. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:612: 5. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:614: 6. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:616: 7. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:618: 8. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:620: 9. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:622: 10. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:625: 11. Garupāvuraṇaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā catukkaṃsaparamaṃ cetāpetabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:627: 12. Lahupāvuraṇaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā aḍḍhateyyakaṃsaparamaṃ cetāpetabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:629: 13. Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhuniyā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ. Taṃ atikkāmentiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:631: 14. Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhuniyā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattampi ce bhikkhunī ticīvarena vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhunisammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:633_0: 15. Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhuniyā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuniyā paneva akālacīvaraṃ
tika-vin04t:633_1: uppajjeyya, ākaṅkhamānāya bhikkhuniyā paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paṭiggahetvā khippameva kāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:633_2: no cassa pāripūri, māsaparamaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ ūnassa
tika-vin04t:633_3: pāripūriyā satiyā paccāsāya. Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya satiyāpi paccāsāya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:635_0: 16. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpeyya aññatra
tika-vin04t:635_1: samayā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo acchinnacīvarā vā hoti bhikkhunī,
tika-vin04t:637_0: 17. Tañce aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā bahūhi cīvarehi abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya,
tika-vin04t:637_1: santaruttaraparamaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari sādiyeyya,
tika-vin04t:639_0: 18. Bhikkhuniṃ paneva uddissa aññātakassa gahapatissa vā gahapatāniyā vā cīvaracetāpannaṃ
tika-vin04t:639_1: upakkhaṭaṃ hoti “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ
tika-vin04t:639_2: cīvarena acchādessāmī”ti. Tatra cesā bhikkhunī pubbe appavāritā upasaṅkamitvā cīvare
tika-vin04t:639_3: vikappaṃ āpajjeyya “sādhu vata, maṃ āyasmā iminā cīvaracetāpannena evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ
tika-vin04t:639_4: vā cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā acchādehī”ti kalyāṇakamyataṃ upādāya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:641_0: 19. Bhikkhuniṃ paneva uddissa ubhinnaṃ aññātakānaṃ gahapatīnaṃ vā gahapatānīnaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:641_2: paccekacīvarāni cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ cīvarehi acchādessāmā”ti. Tatra
tika-vin04t:641_3: cesā bhikkhūnī pubbe appavāritā upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya “sādhu vata
tika-vin04t:641_4: maṃ āyasmanto imehi paccekacīvaracetāpannehi evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vā cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā
tika-vin04t:641_5: acchādetha ubhova santā ekenā”ti kalyāṇakamyataṃ upādāya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:643_0: 20. Bhikkhuniṃ paneva uddissa rājā vā rājabhoggo vā brāhmaṇo vā gahapatiko vā dūtena
tika-vin04t:643_1: cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyya “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin04t:643_2: bhikkhuniṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti. So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya
tika-vin04t:643_3: “idaṃ kho, ayye, ayyaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, paṭiggaṇhātāyyā cīvaracetāpanna”nti.
tika-vin04t:643_4: Tāya bhikkhuniyā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ
tika-vin04t:643_5: paṭiggaṇhāma, cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiya”nti. So ce dūto taṃ
tika-vin04t:643_6: bhikkhuniṃ evaṃ vadeyya “atthi panāyyāya, koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti, cīvaratthikāya,
tika-vin04t:643_7: bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā “eso kho,
tika-vin04t:643_8: āvuso, bhikkhunīnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti. So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā
tika-vin04t:643_9: taṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “yaṃ kho, ayye, ayyā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi,
tika-vin04t:643_10: saññatto so mayā, upasaṅkamatāyyā kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī”ti. Cīvaratthikāya,
tika-vin04t:643_11: bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo
tika-vin04t:643_12: “attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā”ti, dvattikkhattuṃ codayamānā sārayamānā taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
tika-vin04t:643_13: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce abhinipphādeyya, catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ
tika-vin04t:643_14: tuṇhībhūtāya uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ, catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtā
tika-vin04t:643_15: uddissa tiṭṭhamānā taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. Tato ce uttari vāyamamānā
tika-vin04t:643_16: taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. No ce abhinipphādeyya, yatassā
tika-vin04t:643_17: cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, tattha sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ, dūto vā pāhetabbo “yaṃ kho tumhe
tika-vin04t:643_18: āyasmanto bhikkhuniṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha, na taṃ tassā bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin04t:643_19: kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti, yuñjantāyasmanto sakaṃ, mā vo sakaṃ vinassā”ti, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
tika-vin04t:646: 21. Yā pana bhikkhunī jātarūparajataṃ uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:648: 22. Yā pana bhikkhunī nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:650: 23. Yā pana bhikkhunī nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:652_0: 24. Yā pana bhikkhunī ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:652_1: pācittiyaṃ. Tāya bhikkhuniyā so patto bhikkhuniparisāya nissajjitabbo, yo ca tassā
tika-vin04t:652_2: bhikkhuniparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassā bhikkhuniyā padātabbo “ayaṃ te bhikkhuni
tika-vin04t:652_3: patto yāvabhedanāya dhāretabbo”ti, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
tika-vin04t:654_0: 25. Yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni, seyyathidaṃ
tika-vin04t:654_1: – sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ, tāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ
tika-vin04t:656: 26. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:658: 27. Yā pana bhikkhunī sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:660_0: 28. Bhikkhuniṃ paneva uddissa aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ
tika-vin04t:660_1: vāyāpeyya, tatra cesā bhikkhunī pubbe appavāritā tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ
tika-vin04t:660_2: āpajjeyya “idaṃ kho āvuso cīvaraṃ maṃ uddissa viyyati, āyatañca karotha, vitthatañca
tika-vin04t:660_3: appitañca suvītañca suppavāyitañca suvilekhitañca suvitacchitañca karotha, appeva
tika-vin04t:660_4: nāma mayampi āyasmantānaṃ kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyāmā”ti, evañca sā bhikkhunī vatvā
tika-vin04t:660_5: kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyya antamaso piṇḍapātamattampi, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:662_0: 29. Dasāhānāgataṃ kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamaṃ bhikkhuniyā paneva accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:662_1: accekaṃ maññamānāya bhikkhuniyā paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paṭiggahetvā yāva cīvarakālasamayaṃ
tika-vin04t:662_2: nikkhipitabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:664: 30. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:666_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā. Tatthāyyāyo, pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:666_1: parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:666_2: parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyyāyo, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin04t:672: 1. Yā pana bhikkhunī lasuṇaṃ khādeyya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:674: 2. Yā pana bhikkhunī sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:680: 5. Udakasuddhikaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā ādiyamānāya dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabbaṃ. Taṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:682: 6. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:684: 7. Yā pana bhikkhunī āmakadhaññaṃ viññatvā vā viññāpetvā vā bhajjitvā vā bhajjāpetvā vā koṭṭetvā vā koṭṭāpetvā vā pacitvā vā pacāpetvā vā bhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:686: 8. Yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:688: 9. Yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:690: 10. Yā pana bhikkhunī naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:693: 11. Yā pana bhikkhunī rattandhakāre appadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:695: 12. Yā pana bhikkhunī paṭicchanne okāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:697: 13. Yā pana bhikkhunī ajjhokāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:699_0: 14. Yā pana bhikkhunī rathikāya vā byūhe vā siṅghāṭake vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā
tika-vin04t:699_1: santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā nikaṇṇikaṃ vā jappeyya dutiyikaṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ uyyojeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:701: 15. Yā pana bhikkhunī purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkameyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:703: 16. Yā pana bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:705: 17. Yā pana bhikkhunī vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:707: 18. Yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:709: 19. Yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:711: 20. Yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:714: 21. Yā pana bhikkhunī naggā nahāyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:716_0: 22. Udakasāṭikaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā kārayamānāya pamāṇikā kāretabbā, tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:716_1: dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo. Taṃ atikkāmentiyā
tika-vin04t:718: 23. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva sibbeyya, na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya aññatra catūhapañcāhā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:720: 24. Yā pana bhikkhunī pañcāhikaṃ saṅghāṭicāraṃ atikkāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:722: 25. Yā pana bhikkhunī cīvarasaṅkamanīyaṃ dhāreyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:724: 26. Yā pana bhikkhunī gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:726: 27. Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:728: 28. Yā pana bhikkhunī agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṃ dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:730: 29. Yā pana bhikkhunī dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:732: 30. Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:735: 31. Yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭeyyuṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:737: 32. Yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā tuvaṭṭeyyuṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:739: 33. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ kareyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:741: 34. Yā pana bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhaheyya, na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:743: 35. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:745_0: 36. Yā pana bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā, sā bhikkhunī
tika-vin04t:745_1: bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “māyye, saṃsaṭṭhā vihari gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenāpi,
tika-vin04t:745_2: viviccāyye, vivekaññeva bhaginiyā saṅgho vaṇṇetī”ti. Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin04t:745_3: vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā
tika-vin04t:745_4: tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ
tika-vin04t:747: 37. Yā pana bhikkhunī antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:749: 38. Yā pana bhikkhunī tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:751: 39. Yā pana bhikkhunī antovassaṃ cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:753: 40. Yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṃvuṭṭhā cārikaṃ na pakkameyya antamaso chappañcayojanānipi, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:756: 41. Yā pana bhikkhunī rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:758: 42. Yā pana bhikkhunī āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:760: 43. Yā pana bhikkhunī suttaṃ kanteyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:762: 44. Yā pana bhikkhunī gihiveyyāvaccaṃ kareyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:764_0: 45. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā “ehāyye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī”ti vuccamānā
tika-vin04t:764_1: “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vūpasameyya, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ
tika-vin04t:766: 46. Yā pana bhikkhunī agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:768: 47. Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjetvā paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:770: 48. Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkameyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:772: 49. Yā pana bhikkhunī tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:774: 50. Yā pana bhikkhunī tiracchānavijjaṃ vāceyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:777: 51. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā paviseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:779: 52. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuṃ akkoseyya vā paribhāseyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:781: 53. Yā pana bhikkhunī caṇḍīkatā gaṇaṃ paribhāseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:783: 54. Yā pana bhikkhunī nimantitā vā pavāritā vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:785: 55. Yā pana bhikkhunī kulamaccharinī assa, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:787: 56. Yā pana bhikkhunī abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vaseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:789: 57. Yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṃvuṭṭhā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāreyya diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:791: 58. Yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:793: 59. Anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā uposathapucchakañca ovādūpasaṅkamanañca. Taṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:795_0: 60. Yā pana bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ vā rudhitaṃ vā anapaloketvā saṅghaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:795_1: gaṇaṃ vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā bhedāpeyya vā phālāpeyya vā dhovāpeyya vā ālimpāpeyya
tika-vin04t:795_2: vā bandhāpeyya vā mocāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:798: 61. Yā pana bhikkhunī gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:800: 62. Yā pana bhikkhunī pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:802: 63. Yā pana bhikkhunī dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:804: 64. Yā pana bhikkhunī dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:806: 65. Yā pana bhikkhunī ūnadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:808: 66. Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:810: 67. Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:812: 68. Yā pana bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇheyya na anuggaṇhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:814: 69. Yā pana bhikkhunī vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:816: 70. Yā pana bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāseyya na vūpakāsāpeyya antamaso chappañcayojanānipi, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:819: 71. Yā pana bhikkhunī ūnavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:821: 72. Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:823: 73. Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:825: 74. Yā pana bhikkhunī ūnadvādasavassā vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:827: 75. Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:829: 76. Yā pana bhikkhunī “alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā”ti vuccamānā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā sā pacchā khiyyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:831_0: 77. Yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ “sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi, evāhaṃ taṃ
tika-vin04t:831_1: vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vuṭṭhāpeyya, na vuṭṭhāpanāya
tika-vin04t:833_0: 78. Yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ “sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi,
tika-vin04t:833_1: evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vuṭṭhāpeyya, na vuṭṭhāpanāya
tika-vin04t:835: 79. Yā pana bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:837: 80. Yā pana bhikkhunī mātāpitūhi vā sāmikena vā ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
