tika-vin04t:839: 81. Yā pana bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:841: 82. Yā pana bhikkhunī anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:843: 83. Yā pana bhikkhunī ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:846: 84. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:848: 85. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā yānena yāyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:850: 86. Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghāṇiṃ dhāreyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:852: 87. Yā pana bhikkhunī itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāreyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:854: 88. Yā pana bhikkhunī gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:856: 89. Yā pana bhikkhunī vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:858: 90. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:860: 91. Yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānāya ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:862: 92. Yā pana bhikkhunī sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:864: 93. Yā pana bhikkhunī gihiniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:866: 94. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:868: 95. Yā pana bhikkhunī anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ puccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:870: 96. Yā pana bhikkhunī asaṃkaccikā gāmaṃ paviseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:879: 100. Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vāceyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:881: 101. Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannāya uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:883: 102. Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:885: 103. Yā pana bhikkhunī purisassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ deseyya aññatra viññunā itthiviggahena, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:887: 104. Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannāya uttarimanussadhammaṃ āroceyya, bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:889: 105. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannāya āroceyya aññatra bhikkhunisammutiyā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:891: 106. Yā pana bhikkhunī pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:900_0: 110. Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse
tika-vin04t:900_1: santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamantī neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:902: 111. Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamantī neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyya, anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:904_0: 112. Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuniṃ anupakhajja
tika-vin04t:904_1: seyyaṃ kappeyya “yassā sambādho bhavissati, sā pakkamissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā
tika-vin04t:906: 113. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ kupitā anattamanā saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:908: 114. Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:910_0: 115. Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā vihāraṃ kārayamānāya yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya,
tika-vin04t:910_1: ālokasandhiparikammāya dvatticchadanassa pariyāyaṃ appaharite ṭhitāya adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:910_2: Tato ce uttari appaharitepi ṭhitā adhiṭṭhaheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:912: 116. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:915: 117. Agilānāya bhikkhuniyā eko āvasathapiṇḍo bhuñjitabbo. Tato ce uttari bhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:917_0: 118. Gaṇabhojane aññatra samayā pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo,
tika-vin04t:917_1: cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, nāvābhiruhanasamayo, mahāsamayo, samaṇabhattasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
tika-vin04t:919_0: 119. Bhikkhuniṃ paneva kulaṃ upagataṃ pūvehi vā manthehi vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya,
tika-vin04t:919_1: ākaṅkhamānāya bhikkhuniyā dvattipattapūrā paṭiggahetabbā. Tato ce uttari paṭiggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:919_2: pācittiyaṃ. Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvā tato nīharitvā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitabbaṃ, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
tika-vin04t:921: 120. Yā pana bhikkhunī vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:923: 121. Yā pana bhikkhunī sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:925: 122. Yā pana bhikkhunī adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya aññatra udakadantaponā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:927_0: 123. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ “ehāyye, gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti
tika-vin04t:927_1: tassā dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vā uyyojeyya “gacchāyye, na me tayā saddhiṃ kathā vā nisajjā
tika-vin04t:927_2: vā phāsu hoti, ekikāya me kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hotī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā
tika-vin04t:929: 124. Yā pana bhikkhunī sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:931: 125. Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:933: 126. Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:936_0: 127. Yā pana bhikkhunī nimantitā sabhattā samānā santiṃ bhikkhuniṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ
tika-vin04t:936_1: vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:936_2: samayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
tika-vin04t:938: 128. Agilānāya bhikkhuniyā catumāsappaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya, aññatra niccapavāraṇāya. Tato ce uttari sādiyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:940: 129. Yā pana bhikkhunī uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:942: 130. Siyā ca tassā bhikkhuniyā kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya, dirattatirattaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā senāya vasitabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari vaseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:944: 131. Dirattatirattaṃ ce bhikkhunī senāya vasamānā uyyodhikaṃ vā balaggaṃ vā senābyūhaṃ vā anīkadassanaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:954: 136. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ bhiṃsāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:957: 137. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā visibbanāpekkhā jotiṃ samādaheyya vā samādahāpeyya vā aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:959_0: 138. Yā pana bhikkhunī orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:959_1: samayo “diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhāna”nti “vassānassa paṭhamo māso” iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā
tika-vin04t:959_2: uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, vātavuṭṭhisamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
tika-vin04t:961_0: 139. Navaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā cīvaralābhāya tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:961_1: ādātabbaṃ nīlaṃ vā kaddamaṃ vā kāḷasāmaṃ vā. Anādā ce bhikkhunī tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ
tika-vin04t:961_2: aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:963: 140. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā apaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:965: 141. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā antamaso hasāpekkhāpi, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:967: 142. Yā pana bhikkhunī sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:969: 143. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:971: 144. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:973: 145. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:975_0: 146. Yā pana bhikkhunī evaṃ vadeyya “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
tika-vin04t:975_1: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
tika-vin04t:975_2: Sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “māyye evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi,
tika-vin04t:975_3: na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya, anekapariyāyenāyye
tika-vin04t:975_4: antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā, alañca pana te paṭisevato antarāyāyā”ti.
tika-vin04t:975_5: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin04t:975_6: yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya. Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā
tika-vin04t:975_7: taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce paṭinissajjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:978: 147. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ tathāvādiniyā bhikkhuniyā akaṭānudhammāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhāya saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā, saṃvaseyya vā, saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:980_0: 148. Samaṇuddesāpi ce evaṃ vadeyya “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā
tika-vin04t:980_1: yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti. Sā samaṇuddesā
tika-vin04t:980_2: bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “māyye, samaṇuddese evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi,
tika-vin04t:980_3: na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya, anekapariyāyenāyye,
tika-vin04t:980_4: samaṇuddese antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā, alañca pana te paṭisevato
tika-vin04t:980_5: antarāyāyā”ti. Evañca sā samaṇuddesā bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā
tika-vin04t:980_6: samaṇuddesā bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “ajjatagge te, ayye, samaṇuddese na ceva
tika-vin04t:980_7: so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo, yampi caññā samaṇuddesā labhanti bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:980_8: dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ, sāpi te natthi, cara pire, vinassā”ti. Yā pana bhikkhunī
tika-vin04t:980_9: jānaṃ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upalāpeyya vā, upaṭṭhāpeyya vā, sambhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:982_0: 149. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānā evaṃ vadeyya “na tāvāhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:982_1: ayye, etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi, yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuniṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ
tika-vin04t:982_2: paripucchāmī”ti, pācittiyaṃ. Sikkhamānāya, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā aññātabbaṃ paripucchitabbaṃ
tika-vin04t:984_0: 150. Yā pana bhikkhunī pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “kiṃ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi
tika-vin04t:984_1: sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṃvattantī”ti, sikkhāpadavivaṇṇake pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:986_0: 151. Yā pana bhikkhunī anvaddhamāsaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “idāneva
tika-vin04t:986_1: kho ahaṃ, ayye, jānāmi ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ
tika-vin04t:986_2: uddesaṃ āgacchatī”ti, tañce bhikkhuniṃ aññā bhikkhuniyo jāneyyuṃ nisinnapubbaṃ imāya
tika-vin04t:986_3: bhikkhuniyā dvattikkhattuṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne, ko pana vādo bhiyyo, na ca tassā
tika-vin04t:986_4: bhikkhuniyā aññāṇakena mutti atthi, yañca tattha āpattiṃ āpannā, tañca yathādhammo
tika-vin04t:986_5: kāretabbo, uttari cassā moho āropetabbo “tassā te, ayye, alābhā, tassā te dulladdhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:986_6: yaṃ tvaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne na sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karosī”ti, idaṃ tasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:988: 152. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā kupitā anattamanā pahāraṃ dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:990: 153. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā kupitā anattamanā talasattikaṃ uggireyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:992: 154. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:994: 155. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadaheyya “itissā muhuttampi aphāsu bhavissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:996_0: 156. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ
tika-vin04t:996_1: upassutiṃ tiṭṭheyya “yaṃ imā bhaṇissanti, taṃ sossāmī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā
tika-vin04t:999: 157. Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1001: 158. Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkameyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1003: 159. Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya “yathāsanthutaṃ bhikkhuniyo saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmentī”ti, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1005: 160. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1007_0: 161. Yā pana bhikkhunī ratanaṃ vā ratanasammataṃ vā aññatra ajjhārāmā vā ajjhāvasathā
tika-vin04t:1007_1: vā uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ. Ratanaṃ vā pana bhikkhuniyā ratanasammataṃ
tika-vin04t:1007_2: vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbaṃ “yassa
tika-vin04t:1007_3: bhavissati, so harissatī”ti, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
tika-vin04t:1009: 162. Yā pana bhikkhunī aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā visāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārāpeyya, bhedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1011: 163. Navaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārayamānāya aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugataṅgulena aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyā. Taṃ atikkāmentiyā chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1013: 164. Yā pana bhikkhunī mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpeyya, uddālanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1015_0: 165. Kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ pana bhikkhuniyā kārayamānāya pamāṇikā kāretabbā, tatridaṃ
tika-vin04t:1015_1: pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo. Taṃ
tika-vin04t:1017_0: 166. Yā pana bhikkhunī sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeyya, atirekaṃ vā, chedanakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1017_1: pācittiyaṃ. Tatridaṃ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ, dīghaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā,
tika-vin04t:1017_2: tiriyaṃ cha vidatthiyo, idaṃ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇanti.
tika-vin04t:1019_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, chasaṭṭhisatā pācittiyā dhammā. Tatthāyyāyo, pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:1019_1: parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:1019_2: parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyyāyo, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin04t:1025: 1. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā “gārayhaṃ, ayye, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī”ti.
tika-vin04t:1027: 2. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā telaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1029: 3. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā madhuṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1031: 4. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā phāṇitaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1033: 5. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā macchaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1035: 6. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1037: 7. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1039: 8. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā “gārayhaṃ, ayye, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī”ti.
tika-vin04t:1040_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, aṭṭha pāṭidesanīyā dhammā. Tatthāyyāyo, pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:1040_1: parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:1040_2: parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyyāyo, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin04t:1043: Ime kho panāyyāyo, sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
tika-vin04t:1057: 9. Na ukkhittakāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1058: 10. Na ukkhittakāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1061: 11. Na ujjagghikāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1062: 12. Na ujjagghikāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1067: 15. Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1068: 16. Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1070: 17. Na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1071: 18. Na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1073: 19. Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1074: 20. Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1077: 21. Na khambhakatā antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1078: 22. Na khambhakatā antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1080: 23. Na oguṇṭhitā antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1081: 24. Na oguṇṭhitā antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1083: 25. Na ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1085: 26. Na pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1104: 35. Na thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1106: 36. Na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāyāti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1108: 37. Na sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilānā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1110: 38. Na ujjhānasaññinī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1117: 41. Na anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivarissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1119: 42. Na bhuñjamānā sabbahatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1121: 43. Na sakabaḷena mukhena byāharissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1146: 55. Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1148: 56. Na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1150: 57. Na chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1152: 58. Na daṇḍapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1154: 59. Na satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1156: 60. Na āvudhapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1159: 61. Na pādukāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1161: 62. Na upāhanāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1163: 63. Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1165: 64. Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1167: 65. Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1169: 66. Na veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1171: 67. Na oguṇṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1173: 68. Na chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1175: 69. Na nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1177: 70. Na ṭhitā nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1179: 71. Na pacchato gacchantī purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1181: 72. Na uppathena gacchantī pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1183: 73. Na ṭhitā agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1185: 74. Na harite agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1187: 75. Na udake agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1189_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, sekhiyā dhammā. Tatthāyyāyo, pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā,
tika-vin04t:1189_1: dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā,
tika-vin04t:1194: Uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1201_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā. Tatthāyyāyo pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:1201_1: parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha
tika-vin04t:1201_2: parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyyāyo, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
tika-vin04t:1210_0: Uddiṭṭhā satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā, ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ
tika-vin04t:1210_1: anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchati, tattha sabbāheva samaggāhi sammodamānāhi avivadamānāhi sikkhitabbanti.
tika-vin04t:1229_0: Tattha pātimokkhanti paatimokkhaṃ atipamokkhaṃ atiseṭṭhaṃ atiuttamanti attho. Iti
tika-vin04t:1229_1: iminā vacanatthena ekavidhampi sīlaganthabhedato duvidhaṃ hoti. Tathā hi “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto
tika-vin04t:1229_2: viharatī”ti ca “ādimetaṃ mukhametaṃ pamukhametaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, tena vuccati
tika-vin04t:1229_3: pātimokkha”nti ca ādīsu sīlaṃ pātimokkhanti vuccati, “ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni
tika-vin04t:1229_4: vitthārena svāgatāni hontī”tiādīsu gantho pātimokkhanti vuccati. Tattha sīlaṃ yo
tika-vin04t:1229_5: naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti mocayati āpāyikādīhi dukkhehi, attānuvādādīhi vā
tika-vin04t:1229_6: bhayehīti pātimokkhaṃ. Gantho pana tassa pātimokkhassa jotakattā pātimokkhanti vuccati.
tika-vin04t:1229_7: Ādimhi pana vutto vacanattho ubhinnampi sādhāraṇo hoti.
tika-vin04t:1230_0: Tatthāyaṃ vaṇṇanā sīlapātimokkhassāpi yujjati ganthapātimokkhassāpi, ganthe hi vaṇṇite
tika-vin04t:1230_1: tassa attho vaṇṇitova hoti. Taṃ panetaṃ ganthapātimokkhaṃ bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ bhikkhunipātimokkhanti
tika-vin04t:1230_2: duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”tiādikaṃ pañcahi uddesaparicchedehi
tika-vin04t:1230_3: vavatthitaṃ bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ, “suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho”tiādikaṃ catūhi uddesaparicchedehi
tika-vin04t:1230_4: vavatthitaṃ bhikkhunipātimokkhaṃ. Tattha bhikkhupātimokkhe pañca uddesā nāma nidānuddeso,
tika-vin04t:1230_5: pārājikuddeso, saṅghādisesuddeso, aniyatuddeso, vitthāruddesoti. Tattha nidānuddeso
tika-vin04t:1230_6: tāva “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho…pe… āvikatā hissa phāsu hoti, tatthāyasmante pucchāmi,
tika-vin04t:1230_7: kaccittha parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhā, tatiyampi pucchāmi,
tika-vin04t:1230_8: kaccittha parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1230_9: vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”ntiādinā nayena avasese sutena sāvite uddiṭṭho
tika-vin04t:1230_10: hoti. Pārājikuddesādīnaṃ paricchedā nidānassa ādito paṭṭhāya pārājikādīni osāpetvā
tika-vin04t:1230_11: yojetabbā. Vitthāro vitthāroyeva. “Avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabba”nti vacanato pana pārājikuddesādīsu
tika-vin04t:1230_12: yasmiṃ vippakate antarāyo uppajjati, tena saddhiṃ avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ. Nidānuddese
tika-vin04t:1230_13: pana aniṭṭhite sutena sāvetabbaṃ nāma natthi. Bhikkhunipātimokkhe pana aniyatuddeso
tika-vin04t:1230_14: parihāyati, sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Evametesaṃ pañcahi ceva catūhi ca uddesaparicchedehi
tika-vin04t:1230_15: vavatthitānaṃ dvinnampi pātimokkhānaṃ ayaṃ vaṇṇanā bhavissati. Yasmā panettha bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1230_16: paṭhamaṃ, tasmā tassa tāva vaṇṇanatthamidaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin04t:1233_0: Ettha hi suṇātūtiidaṃ savanāṇattivacanaṃ. Meti yo sāveti, tassa attaniddesavacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1233_1: Bhanteti sagāravasappatissavacanaṃ. Saṅghoti puggalasamūhavacanaṃ. Sabbameva cetaṃ
tika-vin04t:1233_2: pātimokkhuddesakena paṭhamaṃ vattabbavacanaṃ. Bhagavatā hi pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantena
tika-vin04t:1233_3: rājagahe vuttaṃ, tasmā yo pātimokkhaṃ uddisati, tena sace saṅghatthero hoti, “āvuso”ti
tika-vin04t:1233_4: vattabbaṃ. Sace navakataro hoti, pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva “bhante”ti vattabbaṃ. Saṅghatthero
tika-vin04t:1233_5: vā hi pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya “therādhikaṃ pātimokkha”ntivacanato, navakataro vā “anujānāmi,
tika-vin04t:1233_6: bhikkhave, yo tattha bhikkhu byatto paṭibalo, tassādheyyaṃ pātimokkha”ntivacanato.
tika-vin04t:1234_0: “Saṅgho”tiiminā pana padena kiñcāpi avisesato puggalasamūho vutto, atha kho so dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho,
tika-vin04t:1234_1: sammutisaṅgho cāti duvidho hoti. Tattha dakkhiṇeyyasaṅghoti aṭṭha ariyapuggalasamūho
tika-vin04t:1234_2: vuccati. Sammutisaṅghoti avisesena bhikkhusamūho, so idha adhippeto. So panesa kammavasena
tika-vin04t:1234_3: pañcavidho hoti – catuvaggo pañcavaggo dasavaggo vīsativaggo atirekavīsativaggoti.
tika-vin04t:1234_4: Tattha catuvaggena ṭhapetvā upasampadapavāraṇaabbhānāni sabbaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin04t:1234_5: vaṭṭati. Pañcavaggena ṭhapetvā majjhimesu janapadesu upasampadañca abbhānakammañca
tika-vin04t:1234_6: sabbaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Dasavaggena abbhānakammamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ
tika-vin04t:1234_7: saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Vīsativaggena na kiñci saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1234_8: tathā atirekavīsativaggena.So pana catuvaggādinā saṅghena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ūnakatarena
tika-vin04t:1234_9: kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, atirekena pana vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vutto. Imasmiṃ panatthe catuvaggaṃ
tika-vin04t:1235_0: Ajjuposathoti ajja uposathadivaso, etena anuposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipati. Pannarasoti
tika-vin04t:1235_1: iminā aññaṃ uposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipati. Divasavasena hi tayo uposathā cātuddasiko
tika-vin04t:1235_2: pannarasiko sāmaggiuposathoti, evaṃ tayo uposathā vuttā. Tattha hemantagimhavassānānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1235_3: tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ tatiyasattamapakkhesu dve dve katvā cha cātuddasikā, avasesā aṭṭhārasa
tika-vin04t:1235_4: pannarasikāti evaṃ ekasaṃvacchare catuvīsati uposathā, idaṃ tāva pakaticārittaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1235_5: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase vā pātimokkhaṃ uddisitu”nti
tika-vin04t:1235_6: vacanato pana “āgantukehi āvāsikānaṃ anuvattitabba”ntiādivacanato ca tathārūpapaccaye
tika-vin04t:1235_7: sati aññasmimpi cātuddase uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ pana pubbakattikapuṇṇamā
tika-vin04t:1235_8: vā, tesaṃyeva sace bhaṇḍanakārakehi upaddutā pavāraṇaṃ paccukkaḍḍhanti, atha pubbakattikamāsassa
tika-vin04t:1235_9: kāḷapakkhacātuddaso vā, pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā vā, pacchimavassaṃvuṭṭhānañca pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā
tika-vin04t:1235_10: evāti ime tayo pavāraṇādivasāpi honti, idampi pakaticārittameva. Tathārūpapaccaye
tika-vin04t:1235_11: pana sati dvinnaṃ kattikapuṇṇamānaṃ purimesu cātuddasesupi pavāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1235_12: Yadā pana kosambakakkhandhake āgatanayena bhinne saṅghe osārite tasmiṃ bhikkhusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1235_13: saṅgho tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghassa sāmaggiṃ karoti, tadā “tāvadeva uposatho
tika-vin04t:1235_14: kātabbo, pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”nti vacanato ṭhapetvā cātuddasapannarase, aññopi
tika-vin04t:1235_15: yo koci divaso sāmaggiuposathadivaso nāma hoti, purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ pana kattikamāsabbhantare
tika-vin04t:1235_16: ayameva sāmaggipavāraṇādivaso nāma hoti. Iti imesu tīsu divasesu “pannaraso”tiiminā
tika-vin04t:1235_17: aññaṃ uposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipati. Tasmā yvāyaṃ “ajjuposatho”tivacanena anuposathadivaso
tika-vin04t:1235_18: paṭikkhitto, tasmiṃ uposatho na kātabboyeva. Yo panāyaṃ añño uposathadivaso, tasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1235_19: uposatho kātabbo. Karontena pana sace cātuddasiko hoti, “ajjuposatho cātuddaso”ti
tika-vin04t:1235_20: vattabbaṃ. Sace pannarasiko hoti, “ajjuposatho pannaraso”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace sāmaggiuposatho
tika-vin04t:1236: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallanti ettha patto kālo imassa kammassāti pattakālaṃ, pattakālameva pattakallaṃ. Tadetaṃ idha catūhi aṅgehi saṅgahitaṃ. Yathāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā –
tika-vin04t:1239: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti,
tika-vin04t:1241_0: Tattha uposathoti tīsu uposathadivasesu aññatarauposathadivaso. Tasmiñhi sati idaṃ
tika-vin04t:1241_1: saṅghassa uposathakammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati. Yathāha “na ca, bhikkhave,
tika-vin04t:1241_2: anuposathe uposatho kātabbo, yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
tika-vin04t:1242_0: Yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattāti yattakā bhikkhū tassa uposathakammassa pattā yuttā
tika-vin04t:1242_1: anurūpā, sabbantimena paricchedena cattāro pakatattā, te ca kho hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā.
tika-vin04t:1243_0: Sīmā ca nāmesā baddhasīmā abaddhasīmāti duvidhā hoti. Tattha ekādasa vipattisīmāyo
tika-vin04t:1243_1: atikkamitvā tividhasampattiyuttā nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā sammatā sīmā baddhasīmā
tika-vin04t:1243_2: nāma, “atikhuddakā, atimahatī, khaṇḍanimittā, chāyānimittā, animittā, bahisīme ṭhitā
tika-vin04t:1243_3: sammatā, nadiyā sammatā, samudde sammatā, jātassare sammatā, sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindantena
tika-vin04t:1243_4: sammatā, sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā”ti imā hi “ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato
tika-vin04t:1243_5: kammāni vipajjantī”ti vacanato ekādasa vipattisīmāyo nāma. Tattha atikhuddakā nāma
tika-vin04t:1243_6: yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkonti. Atimahatī nāma yā antamaso kesaggamattenāpi
tika-vin04t:1243_7: tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvā sammatā. Khaṇḍanimittā nāma aghaṭitanimittā vuccati, puratthimāya
tika-vin04t:1243_8: disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā anukkameneva dakkhiṇāya pacchimāya uttarāya disāya kittetvā
tika-vin04t:1243_9: puna puratthimāya disāya pubbakittitaṃ paṭikittetvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ akkhaṇḍanimittā
tika-vin04t:1243_10: hoti. Sace pana anukkamena āharitvā uttarāya disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā tattheva ṭhapeti,
tika-vin04t:1243_11: khaṇḍanimittā nāma hoti. Aparāpi khaṇḍanimittā nāma yā animittupagaṃ tacasārarukkhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1243_12: vā khāṇukaṃ vā paṃsupuñjavālukapuñjānaṃ vā aññataraṃ antarā ekaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1243_13: Chāyānimittā nāma pabbatacchāyādīnaṃ yaṃ kiñci chāyaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā. Animittā
tika-vin04t:1243_14: nāma sabbena sabbaṃ nimittāni akittetvā sammatā. Bahisīme ṭhitasammatā nāma nimittāni
tika-vin04t:1243_15: kittetvā nimittānaṃ bahiṭhitena sammatā. Nadiyā samudde jātassare sammatā nāma etesu
tika-vin04t:1243_16: nadiādīsu sammatā. Sā hi evaṃ sammatāpi “sabbā, bhikkhave, nadī asīmā, sabbo samuddo
tika-vin04t:1243_17: asīmo, sabbo jātassaro asīmo”ti vacanato asammatāva hoti. Sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindantena
tika-vin04t:1243_18: sammatā nāma attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ sambhindantena sammatā. Sace hi porāṇakassa
tika-vin04t:1243_19: vihārassa puratthimāya disāya ambo ceva jambū cāti dve rukkhā aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapā
tika-vin04t:1243_20: honti, tesu ambassa pacchimadisābhāge jambū, vihārasīmā ca jambuṃ anto katvā ambaṃ
tika-vin04t:1243_21: kittetvā baddhā hoti, atha pacchā tassa vihārassa puratthimāya disāya vihāre kate
tika-vin04t:1243_22: sīmaṃ bandhantā bhikkhū taṃ ambaṃ anto katvā jambuṃ kittetvā bandhanti, sīmāya sīmaṃ
tika-vin04t:1243_23: sambhinnā hoti. Sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā nāma attano sīmāya paresaṃ
tika-vin04t:1243_24: sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā. Sace hi paresaṃ baddhasīmaṃ sakalaṃ vā tassā padesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1243_25: vā anto katvā attano sīmaṃ sammannati, sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharitā nāma hoti. Iti
tika-vin04t:1244_1: yuttā. Tattha nimittasampattiyā yuttā nāma pabbatanimittaṃ, pāsāṇanimittaṃ, vananimittaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1244_2: rukkhanimittaṃ, magganimittaṃ, vammikanimittaṃ, nadinimittaṃ, udakanimittanti evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1244_3: vuttesu aṭṭhasu nimittesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge yathāladdhāni nimittupagāni nimittāni
tika-vin04t:1244_4: “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ, pabbato, bhante, eso pabbato nimitta”ntiādinā
tika-vin04t:1244_5: nayena sammā kittetvā sammatā. Tatrevaṃ saṅkhepato nimittupagatā veditabbā – suddhapaṃsusuddhapāsāṇaubhayamissakavasena
tika-vin04t:1244_6: hi tividhopi pabbato hatthippamāṇato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ nimittupago, tato omakataro
tika-vin04t:1244_7: na vaṭṭati. Pāsāṇanimitte ayoguḷampi pāsāṇasaṅkhameva gacchati, tasmā yo koci pāsāṇo
tika-vin04t:1244_8: ukkaṃsavasena hatthippamāṇato omakataraṃ ādiṃ katvā heṭṭhimaparicchedena dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍaparimāṇo
tika-vin04t:1244_9: nimittupago, na tato khuddakataro. Piṭṭhipāsāṇo pana atimahantopi vaṭṭati. Vananimitte
tika-vin04t:1244_10: antosārehi vā antosāramissakehi vā rukkhehi catupañcarukkhamattampi vanaṃ nimittupagaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1244_11: tato ūnakataraṃ na vaṭṭati. Rukkho jīvantoyeva antosāro bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito, antamaso
tika-vin04t:1244_12: ubbedhato aṭṭhaṅgulo, pariṇāhato sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇopi nimittupago, tato omakataro
tika-vin04t:1244_13: na vaṭṭati. Maggo jaṅghamaggo vā hotu sakaṭamaggo vā, yo vinivijjhitvā dve tīṇi gāmakhettāni
tika-vin04t:1244_14: gacchati, tādiso jaṅghasatthasakaṭasatthehi valañjiyamānoyeva nimittupago, avalañjito
tika-vin04t:1244_15: na vaṭṭati. Vammiko pana heṭṭhimaparicchedena taṃdivasaṃjāto aṭṭhaṅgulubbedho govisāṇamattopi
tika-vin04t:1244_16: vammiko nimittupago, tato omakataro na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana abaddhasīmālakkhaṇe nadiṃ
tika-vin04t:1244_17: vakkhāma, sā nimittupagā, aññā na vaṭṭati. Udakaṃ yaṃ asandamānaṃ āvāṭapokkharaṇītaḷākajātassaraloṇisamuddādīsu
tika-vin04t:1244_18: ṭhitaṃ, taṃ ādiṃ katvā antamaso taṅkhaṇeyeva pathaviyaṃ khaṇite āvāṭake ghaṭehi āharitvā
tika-vin04t:1244_19: pūritampi yāva kammavācāpariyosānā saṇṭhamānakaṃ nimittupagaṃ, itaraṃ sandamānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1244_20: vā vuttaparicchedakālaṃ atiṭṭhantaṃ vā bhājanagataṃ vā na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin04t:1245_0: Parisāsampattiyā yuttā nāma sabbantimena paricchedena catūhi bhikkhūhi sannipatitvā
tika-vin04t:1245_1: yāvatikā tasmiṃ gāmakhette baddhasīmaṃ vā nadisamuddajātassare vā anokkamitvā ṭhitā
tika-vin04t:1245_2: bhikkhū, te sabbe hatthapāse vā katvā chandaṃ vā āharitvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1246_0: Kammavācāsampattiyā yuttā nāma “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yāvatā samantā nimittā
tika-vin04t:1246_1: kittitā”tiādinā nayena vuttāya parisuddhāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya sammatā. Evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1246_2: ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā tividhasampattiyuttā nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā
tika-vin04t:1246_3: sammatā sīmā “baddhasīmā”ti veditabbā. Khaṇḍasīmā samānasaṃvāsasīmā avippavāsasīmāti tassāyeva pabhedo.
tika-vin04t:1247_0: Abaddhasīmā pana gāmasīmā, sattabbhantarasīmā, udakukkhepasīmāti tividhā. Tattha
tika-vin04t:1247_1: yāvatā ekaṃ gāmakkhettaṃ, ayaṃ gāmasīmā nāma. Agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā
tika-vin04t:1247_2: sattabbhantarasīmā nāma. Tattha agāmakaṃ nāma araññaṃ viñjhāṭaviādīsu vā samuddamajjhe
tika-vin04t:1247_3: vā macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathesu dīpakesu labbhati. Samantā sattabbhantarāti majjhe
tika-vin04t:1247_4: ṭhitānaṃ sabbadisāsu sattabbhantarā vinibbedhena cuddasa honti. Tattha ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ
tika-vin04t:1247_5: aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇaṃ hoti, ayañca sīmā parisāvasena vaḍḍhati, tasmā samantā
tika-vin04t:1247_6: parisāpariyantato paṭṭhāya abbhantaraparicchedo kātabbo. Sace pana dve saṅghā visuṃ
tika-vin04t:1247_7: uposathaṃ karonti, dvinnaṃ sattabbhantarānaṃ antare aññamekaṃ sattabbhantaraṃ upacāratthāya
tika-vin04t:1247_8: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Yā panesā “sabbā, bhikkhave, nadī asīmā”tiādinā nayena nadiādīnaṃ sīmabhāvaṃ
tika-vin04t:1247_9: paṭikkhipitvā puna “nadiyā vā, bhikkhave, samudde vā jātassare vā yaṃ majjhimassa
tika-vin04t:1247_10: purisassa samantā udakukkhepā, ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā”ti vuttā ayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1247_11: udakukkhepasīmā nāma. Tattha yassā dhammikānaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ anudasāhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1247_12: anupañcāhaṃ anatikkamitvā deve vassante valāhakesu vigatamattesu sotaṃ pacchijjati,
tika-vin04t:1247_13: ayaṃ nadisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati. Yassā pana īdise suvuṭṭhikāle vassānassa catumāse
tika-vin04t:1247_14: sotaṃ na pacchijjati, yattha titthena vā atitthena vā sikkhākaraṇīye āgatalakkhaṇena
tika-vin04t:1247_15: timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā antaravāsakaṃ anukkhipitvā uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā ekadvaṅgulamattampi
tika-vin04t:1247_16: antaravāsako temiyati, ayaṃ samuddaṃ vā pavisatu taḷākaṃ vā, pabhavato paṭṭhāya nadī
tika-vin04t:1247_17: nāma. Samuddo pākaṭoyeva. Yo pana kenaci khaṇitvā akato sayaṃjāto sobbho samantato
tika-vin04t:1247_18: āgatena udakena pūrito tiṭṭhati, yattha nadiyaṃ vuttappakāre vassakāle udakaṃ santiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1247_19: ayaṃ jātassaro nāma. Yopi nadiṃ vā samuddaṃ vā bhinditvā nikkhantaudakena khato sobbho
tika-vin04t:1248_0: Yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepāti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ thāmamajjhimassa purisassa
tika-vin04t:1248_1: samantato udakukkhepena paricchinnaṃ, tattha yathā akkhadhuttā dāruguḷaṃ khipanti,
tika-vin04t:1248_2: evaṃ udakaṃ vā vālukaṃ vā hatthena gahetvā majjhimena purisena sabbathāmena khipitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1248_3: tattha yattha evaṃ khittaṃ udakaṃ vā vālukaṃ vā patati, ayaṃ udakukkhepo nāma.
tika-vin04t:1249_0: Ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathāti ayaṃ tesu nadiādīsu udakukkhepaparicchinnā
tika-vin04t:1249_1: sīmā samānasaṃvāsā ceva ekūposathā ca, ayaṃ pana etesaṃ nadiādīnaṃ antoyeva labbhati,
tika-vin04t:1249_2: na bahi. Tasmā nadiyā vā jātassare vā yattakaṃ padesaṃ pakativassakāle catūsu māsesu
tika-vin04t:1249_3: udakaṃ ottharati, samudde yasmiṃ padese pakativīciyo ottharitvā saṇṭhahanti, tato
tika-vin04t:1249_4: paṭṭhāya kappiyabhūmi, tattha ṭhatvā uposathādikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Dubbuṭṭhikāle
tika-vin04t:1249_5: vā gimhe vā nadijātassaresu sukkhesupi sā eva kappiyabhūmi, sace pana sukkhe jātassare
tika-vin04t:1249_6: vāpiṃ vā khaṇanti, vappaṃ vā karonti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ gāmakkhettaṃ hoti. Yā panesā “kappiyabhūmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1249_7: vuttā, tato bahi udakukkhepasīmā na gacchati, antoyeva gacchati, tasmā tesaṃ anto
tika-vin04t:1249_8: parisāpariyantato paṭṭhāya samantā udakukkhepaparicchedo kātabbo. Sace pana dve saṅghā
tika-vin04t:1249_9: visuṃ visuṃ uposathādikammaṃ karonti, dvinnaṃ udakukkhepānaṃ antare añño eko udakukkhepo
tika-vin04t:1249_10: upacāratthāya ṭhapetabbo. Ayañhi sattabbhantarasīmā ca udakukkhepasīmā ca bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1249_11: ṭhitokāsato paṭṭhāya labbhati. Paricchedabbhantare hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitopi
tika-vin04t:1249_12: paricchedato bahi aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopeti,
tika-vin04t:1249_13: idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ abaddhasīmā veditabbā. Iti imaṃ baddhasīmābaddhasīmāvasena
tika-vin04t:1249_14: duvidhaṃ sīmaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “te ca kho hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā”ti.
tika-vin04t:1249_15: Tesu hi catūsu bhikkhūsu ekasīmāyaṃ hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ṭhitesvevetaṃ saṅghassa
tika-vin04t:1249_16: uposathakammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, na itarathā. Yathāha “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin04t:1250_0: Sabhāgāpattiyo ca na vijjantīti ettha yaṃ sabbo saṅgho vikālabhojanādinā sabhāgavatthunā
tika-vin04t:1250_1: lahukāpattiṃ āpajjati, evarūpā vatthusabhāgā “sabhāgā”ti vuccati, vikālabhojanapaccayā
tika-vin04t:1250_2: āpannaṃ pana āpattisabhāgaṃ anatirittabhojanapaccayā āpannassa santike desetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1250_3: Sabhāgāpattiyā pana sati tehi bhikkhūhi eko bhikkhu sāmantā āvāsā sajjukaṃ pāhetabbo
tika-vin04t:1250_4: “gacchāvuso, taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikaritvā āgaccha, mayaṃ te santike āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmā”ti,
tika-vin04t:1250_5: evañcetaṃ labhetha, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce labhetha, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena
tika-vin04t:1250_6: saṅgho ñāpetabbo “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ sabbo saṅgho sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno,
tika-vin04t:1250_7: yadā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ suddhaṃ anāpattikaṃ passissati, tadā tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin04t:1250_8: paṭikarissatī”ti vatvā uposatho kātabbo. Sace pana vematiko hoti, “suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1250_9: saṅgho, ayaṃ sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāya āpattiyā vematiko, yadā nibbematiko bhavissati,
tika-vin04t:1250_10: tadā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissatī”ti vatvā uposatho kātabbo. Sace panettha koci taṃ
tika-vin04t:1250_11: sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭatīti maññamāno ekassa santike deseti, desitā sudesitāva.
tika-vin04t:1250_12: Aññaṃ pana desanāpaccayā desako, paṭiggahaṇapaccayā paṭiggāhako cāti ubhopi dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin04t:1250_13: āpajjanti, taṃ nānāvatthukaṃ hoti, tasmā aññamaññaṃ desetabbaṃ. Ettāvatā te dve nirāpattikā
tika-vin04t:1250_14: honti, tesaṃ santike sesehi sabhāgāpattiyo desetabbā vā ārocetabbā vā. Sace te evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1250_15: akatvā uposathaṃ karonti, “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”tiādinā nayena sāpattikassa
tika-vin04t:1250_16: uposathakaraṇe paññattaṃ dukkaṭaṃ āpajjanti. Sace sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiyā sati
tika-vin04t:1250_17: vuttavidhiṃ akatvā uposathaṃ karoti, vuttanayeneva sabbo saṅgho āpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin04t:1250_18: tasmā sabhāgāpattiyā sati saṅghassa pattakallaṃ nāma na hoti, tena vuttaṃ “sabhāgāpattiyo
tika-vin04t:1250_19: ca na vijjantī”ti. Etāsu hi sabhāgāpattīsu avijjamānāsu visabhāgāpattīsu vijjamānāsupi
tika-vin04t:1251_0: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na hontīti “na, bhikkhave, sagahaṭṭhāya parisāya pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1251_1: uddisitabbaṃ, yo uddiseyya āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato gahaṭṭho, “na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin04t:1251_2: bhikkhuniyā nisinnaparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”ntiādinā nayena vuttā bhikkhunī,
tika-vin04t:1251_3: sikkhamānā, sāmaṇero, sāmaṇerī, sikkhāpaccakkhātako, antimavatthuajjhāpannako, āpattiyā
tika-vin04t:1251_4: adassane ukkhittako, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhittako, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge
tika-vin04t:1251_5: ukkhittako, paṇḍako, theyyasaṃvāsako, titthiyapakkantako, tiracchānagato, mātughātako,
tika-vin04t:1251_6: pitughātako arahantaghātako, bhikkhunidūsako, saṅghabhedako, lohituppādako, ubhatobyañjanakoti
tika-vin04t:1251_7: ime vīsati cāti ekavīsati puggalā vajjanīyā nāma, te hatthapāsato bahikaraṇavasena
tika-vin04t:1251_8: vajjetabbā. Etesu hi tividhe ukkhittake sati uposathaṃ karonto saṅgho pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1251_9: āpajjati, sesesu dukkaṭaṃ. Ettha ca tiracchānagatoti yassa upasampadā paṭikkhittā,
tika-vin04t:1251_10: titthiyā gahaṭṭheneva saṅgahitā. Etepi hi vajjanīyā nāma. Evaṃ pattakallaṃ imehi
tika-vin04t:1252_0: Saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyātiiminā ye te aparepi tayo uposathā saṅghe uposatho, gaṇe
tika-vin04t:1252_1: uposatho, puggale uposathoti, evaṃ kārakavasena tayo uposathā vuttā, tesu itare dve
tika-vin04t:1252_2: paṭikkhipitvā saṅghe uposathameva dīpeti. Pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyātiiminā ye te aparepi
tika-vin04t:1252_3: tayo uposathā suttuddeso, pārisuddhiuposatho, adhiṭṭhānauposathoti, evaṃ kattabbākāravasena
tika-vin04t:1252_4: tayo uposathā vuttā, tesu itare dve paṭikkhipitvā suttuddesameva dīpeti. Suttuddeso
tika-vin04t:1252_5: nāma pātimokkhuddeso vuccati, so duvidho ovādapātimokkhuddeso ca āṇāpātimokkhuddeso ca. Tattha
tika-vin04t:1256_0: Ādinā nayena vuttā tisso gāthāyo ovādapātimokkhaṃ nāma, taṃ buddhā eva uddisanti,
tika-vin04t:1256_1: na sāvakā. “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ nāma,
tika-vin04t:1256_2: taṃ sāvakā eva uddisanti, na buddhā. Idameva ca imasmiṃ atthe “pātimokkha”nti adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1257_0: Ye pana itare dve uposathā, tesu pārisuddhiuposatho tāva aññesañca santike, aññamaññañca
tika-vin04t:1257_1: ārocanavasena duvidho. Tattha yvāyaṃ aññesaṃ santike karīyati, sopi pavāritānañca
tika-vin04t:1257_2: appavāritānañca santike karaṇavasena duvidho. Tattha mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritānaṃ santike
tika-vin04t:1257_3: pacchimikāya upagatena vā anupagatena vā chinnavassena vā cātumāsiniyaṃ pana pavāritānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1257_4: santike purimikāya upagatena vā anupagatena vā chinnavassena vā kāyasāmaggiṃ datvā
tika-vin04t:1257_5: “parisuddho ahaṃ, bhante, ‘parisuddho’ti maṃ dhārethā”ti tikkhattuṃ vatvā kātabbo,
tika-vin04t:1257_6: ṭhapetvā ca pana pavāraṇādivasaṃ aññasmiṃ kāle āvāsikehi uddiṭṭhamatte pātimokkhe
tika-vin04t:1257_7: avuṭṭhitāya vā ekaccāya vuṭṭhitāya vā sabbāya vā vuṭṭhitāya parisāya ye aññe samasamā
tika-vin04t:1257_8: vā thokatarā vā āgacchanti, tehi tesaṃ santike vuttanayeneva pārisuddhi ārocetabbā.
tika-vin04t:1257_9: Yo panāyaṃ aññamaññaṃ ārocanavasena karīyati, so ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā ca aṭṭhapetvā ca
tika-vin04t:1257_10: karaṇavasena duvidho. Tattha yasmiṃ āvāse tayo bhikkhū viharanti, tesu uposathadivase
tika-vin04t:1257_11: sannipatitesu ekena bhikkhunā “suṇantu me āyasmantā ajjuposatho cātuddaso”ti vā “pannaraso”ti
tika-vin04t:1257_12: vā vatvā “yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kareyyāmā”ti
tika-vin04t:1257_13: ñattiyā ṭhapitāya therena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā
tika-vin04t:1257_14: añjaliṃ paggahetvā “parisuddho ahaṃ, āvuso, ‘parisuddho’ti maṃ dhārethā”ti tikkhattuṃ
tika-vin04t:1257_15: vattabbaṃ. Itarehi “bhante”ti vatvā evameva vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1257_16: Yattha pana dve bhikkhū viharanti, tatra ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā vuttanayeneva pārisuddhi
tika-vin04t:1258_0: Sace pana ekova bhikkhu hoti, sabbaṃ pubbakaraṇīyaṃ katvā aññesaṃ anāgamanaṃ ñatvā
tika-vin04t:1258_1: “ajja me uposatho cātuddaso”ti vā “pannaraso”ti vā vatvā “adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1258_2: Ayaṃ adhiṭṭhānuposathoti evaṃ kattabbākāravasena tayo uposathāti veditabbā. Ettāvatā
tika-vin04t:1258_3: nava uposathā dīpitā honti. Tesu divasavasena pannarasiko, kārakavasena saṅghuposatho,
tika-vin04t:1258_4: kattabbākāravasena suttuddesoti evaṃ tilakkhaṇasampanno uposatho idha niddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin04t:1258_5: veditabbo. Tasmiṃ pavattamāne uposathaṃ akatvā tadahuposathe aññaṃ abhikkhukaṃ nānāsaṃvāsakehi
tika-vin04t:1258_6: vā sabhikkhukaṃ āvāsaṃ vā anāvāsaṃ vā vāsatthāya aññatra saṅghena, aññatra antarāyā
tika-vin04t:1259_0: Kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakiccanti “saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti evaṃ uposathakaraṇasambandheneva
tika-vin04t:1259_1: vuttassa saṅghassa uposathe kattabbe yaṃ taṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, uposathāgāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1259_2: sammajjitu”ntiādinā nayena pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ, aṭṭhakathāsu ca –
tika-vin04t:1264_0: Evaṃ dvīhi nāmehi navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ dassitaṃ, kiṃ taṃ katanti pucchati. Na hi
tika-vin04t:1264_1: taṃ akatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā therena āṇattena agilānena bhikkhunā uposathāgāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1264_2: sammajjitabbaṃ, pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ, āsanaṃ paññāpetabbaṃ, padīpo
tika-vin04t:1264_3: kātabbo, akaronto dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, therenāpi patirūpaṃ ñatvā āṇāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1265_0: Chandapārisuddhīti ettha uposathakaraṇatthaṃ sannipatite saṅghe bahi uposathaṃ katvā
tika-vin04t:1265_1: āgatena sannipatitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kāyasāmaggiṃ adentena chando dātabbo. Yopi gilāno
tika-vin04t:1265_2: vā hoti kiccappasuto vā, tenāpi pārisuddhiṃ dentena chandopi dātabbo. Kathaṃ dātabbo?
tika-vin04t:1265_3: Ekassa bhikkhuno santike “chandaṃ dammi, chandaṃ me hara, chandaṃ me ārocehī”ti ayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1265_4: attho kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabbo, evaṃ dinno hoti chando. Akatūposathena
tika-vin04t:1265_5: pana gilānena vā kiccappasutena vā pārisuddhi dātabbā. Kathaṃ dātabbā? Ekassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin04t:1265_6: santike “pārisuddhiṃ dammi, pārisuddhiṃ me hara, pārisuddhiṃ me ārocehī”ti ayaṃ attho
tika-vin04t:1265_7: kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabbo, evaṃ dinnā hoti pārisuddhi, taṃ pana
tika-vin04t:1265_8: dentena chandopi dātabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe
tika-vin04t:1265_9: pārisuddhiṃ dentena chandampi dātuṃ, santi saṅghassa karaṇīya”nti. Tattha pārisuddhidānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1265_10: saṅghassapi attanopi uposathakaraṇaṃ sampādeti, na avasesaṃ saṅghakiccaṃ. Chandadānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1265_11: saṅghasseva uposathakaraṇañca sesakiccañca sampādeti, attano pana uposatho akatoyeva
tika-vin04t:1265_12: hoti. Tasmā pārisuddhiṃ dentena chandopi dātabbo. Pubbe vuttaṃ pana suddhikacchandaṃ
tika-vin04t:1265_13: vā imaṃ vā chandapārisuddhiṃ ekena bahūnampi āharituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana so antarāmagge
tika-vin04t:1265_14: aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā yesaṃ tena chando vā pārisuddhi vā gahitā, tesañca attano
tika-vin04t:1265_15: ca chandapārisuddhiṃ deti, tasseva sā āgacchati, itarā pana biḷālasaṅkhalikā chandapārisuddhi
tika-vin04t:1265_16: nāma hoti, sā nāgacchati, tasmā sayameva sannipatitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ārocetabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin04t:1265_17: pana sañcicca nāroceti, dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Chandapārisuddhi pana tasmiṃ hatthapāsaṃ
tika-vin04t:1266_0: Utukkhānanti “hemantādīnaṃ utūnaṃ ettakaṃ atikkantaṃ, ettakaṃ avasiṭṭha”nti evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1266_1: utūnaṃ ācikkhanaṃ. Bhikkhugaṇanāti “ettakā bhikkhū uposathagge sannipatitā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1266_2: gaṇanā. Idampi hi ubhayaṃ katvāva uposatho kātabbo. Ovādoti bhikkhunovādo. Na hi
tika-vin04t:1266_3: bhikkhunīhi yācitaṃ ovādaṃ anārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhuniyo hi “sve
tika-vin04t:1266_4: uposatho”ti āgantvā “ayaṃ uposatho cātuddaso pannaraso”ti pucchitvā puna uposathadivase
tika-vin04t:1266_5: āgantvā “bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayya, bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca
tika-vin04t:1266_6: yācati, labhatu kira, ayya, bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti evaṃ ovādaṃ yācanti.
tika-vin04t:1266_7: Taṃ ṭhapetvā bālagilānagamiye añño sacepi āraññiko hoti, apaṭiggahetuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin04t:1266_8: tasmā yena so paṭiggahito, tena bhikkhunā uposathagge pātimokkhuddesako bhikkhu evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1266_9: vattabbo “bhikkhunisaṅgho, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca
tika-vin04t:1266_10: yācati, labhatu kira, bhante, bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. Pātimokkhuddesakena
tika-vin04t:1266_11: vattabbaṃ “atthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato”ti. Sace hoti koci bhikkhu
tika-vin04t:1266_12: bhikkhunovādako sammato, tato tena so vattabbo “itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako
tika-vin04t:1266_13: sammato, taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho upasaṅkamatū”ti. Sace natthi, tato tena pucchitabbaṃ
tika-vin04t:1266_14: “ko āyasmā ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”nti. Sace koci ussahati, sopi ca aṭṭhahi
tika-vin04t:1266_15: aṅgehi samannāgato, taṃ tattheva sammannitvā ovādapaṭiggāhako vattabbo “itthannāmo
tika-vin04t:1266_16: bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho upasaṅkamatū”ti. Sace pana koci
tika-vin04t:1266_17: na ussahati, pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbaṃ “natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato,
tika-vin04t:1266_18: pāsādikena bhikkhunisaṅgho sampādetū”ti. Ettāvatā hi sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalaṃ
tika-vin04t:1266_19: sāsanaṃ ārocitaṃ hoti. Tena bhikkhunā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pāṭipadadivase bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1267_0: Bhikkhunisaṅghenāpi tā bhikkhuniyo pesetabbā, gacchatha, ayyā, pucchatha “kiṃ, ayya,
tika-vin04t:1267_1: labhati bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti, tāhi “sādhu, ayye”ti sampaṭicchitvā
tika-vin04t:1267_2: taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vattabbaṃ “kiṃ, ayya, labhati bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
tika-vin04t:1267_3: Tena vattabbaṃ “natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, pāsādikena bhikkhunisaṅgho
tika-vin04t:1267_4: sampādetū”ti, tāhi “sādhu ayyā”ti sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Idañca ekato āgatānaṃ dvinnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1267_5: tiṇṇaṃ vā vasena vuttaṃ. Tāsu pana ekāya bhikkhuniyā vattabbañceva sampaṭicchitabbañca,
tika-vin04t:1267_6: itarā tassā sahāyikā. Sace pana bhikkhusaṅgho vā bhikkhunisaṅgho vā na pūrati, ubhayatopi
tika-vin04t:1268_0: Tatrāyaṃ vacanakkamo – “bhikkhuniyo, ayya, bhikkhusaṅghassa pādevandanti, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca
tika-vin04t:1268_1: yācanti, labhantu kira, ayya, bhikkhuniyo ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti, “ahaṃ, ayya, bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-vin04t:1268_2: pāde vandāmi, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācāmi, labhāmahaṃ, ayya, ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti,
tika-vin04t:1268_3: “bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayyā, ayyānaṃ pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, labhatu
tika-vin04t:1268_4: kira, ayyā, bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. “Bhikkhuniyo, ayyā, ayyānaṃ pāde
tika-vin04t:1268_5: vandanti, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācanti, labhantu kira, ayyā, bhikkhuniyo ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti,
tika-vin04t:1268_6: “ahaṃ, ayyā, ayyānaṃ pāde vandāmi, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācāmi, labhāmahaṃ, ayyā,
tika-vin04t:1268_7: ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti, “bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayya, ayyassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca
tika-vin04t:1268_8: yācati, labhatu kira, ayya, bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. “Bhikkhuniyo, ayya,
tika-vin04t:1268_9: ayyassa pāde vandanti, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācanti, labhantu kira, ayya, bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin04t:1268_10: ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti, “ahaṃ, ayya, ayyassa pāde vandāmi, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācāmi,
tika-vin04t:1268_11: labhāmahaṃ, ayya, ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. Tenāpi bhikkhunā uposathakāle evaṃ vattabbaṃ
tika-vin04t:1268_12: “bhikkhuniyo, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandanti, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācanti,
tika-vin04t:1268_13: labhantu kira, bhante, bhikkhuniyo ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti, “bhikkhunī, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-vin04t:1268_14: pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, labhatu kira, bhante, bhikkhunī ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
tika-vin04t:1268_15: “Bhikkhunisaṅgho, bhante, bhikkhuniyo, bhante, bhikkhunī bhante āyasmantānaṃ pāde
tika-vin04t:1268_16: vandati, vandanti, vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, yācanti, yācati, labhatu
tika-vin04t:1268_17: kira, bhante, bhikkhunisaṅgho, labhantu kira, bhante, bhikkhuniyo, labhatu kira,
tika-vin04t:1268_18: bhante, bhikkhunī ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. Uposathaggepi pātimokkhuddesakena vā ñattiṭṭhapakena
tika-vin04t:1268_19: vā itarena vā bhikkhunā sace sammato bhikkhu atthi, purimanayeneva “taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho,
tika-vin04t:1268_20: taṃ bhikkhuniyo, taṃ bhikkhunī upasaṅkamatu, upasaṅkamantu, upasaṅkamatū”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1268_21: Sace natthi, “pāsādikena bhikkhunisaṅgho, bhikkhuniyo, bhikkhunī sampādetu, sampādentu,
tika-vin04t:1268_22: sampādetū”ti vattabbaṃ. Ovādappaṭiggāhakena pāṭipade taṃ paccāharitvā tatheva vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1268_23: ayamettha saṅkhepavinicchayo. Evaṃ bhikkhunīhi yācitaṃ ovādaṃ ārocetvāva uposatho
tika-vin04t:1271_0: Pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethāti attano parisuddhabhāvaṃ ārocetha, “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”tiidaṃ
tika-vin04t:1271_1: pārisuddhiārocanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. “Na ca, bhikkhave, sāpattikena pātimokkhaṃ sotabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1271_2: yo suṇeyya āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi vacanato aparisuddhehi pātimokkhaṃ sotuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1271_3: Tena vuttaṃ – pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocetha, pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmīti. Ettha siyā
tika-vin04t:1271_4: “saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyā”ti vuttattā idhāpi “pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1271_5: uddisissatī”ti vattabbaṃ, evañhi sati pubbenāparaṃ sandhiyatīti. Vuccate, vacanamattamevetaṃ
tika-vin04t:1271_6: na sandhiyati, lakkhaṇato pana sameti, saṅghassa sāmaggiyā, gaṇassa sāmaggiyā, puggalassa
tika-vin04t:1271_7: uddesā saṅghassa uddiṭṭhaṃ hoti pātimokkhanti idañhettha lakkhaṇaṃ, tasmā “pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1272_0: Taṃ sabbeva santā sādhukaṃ suṇoma manasi karomāti nti pātimokkhaṃ. Sabbeva santāti
tika-vin04t:1272_1: yāvatikā tassā parisāya therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca. Sādhukaṃ suṇomāti aṭṭhiṃ katvā
tika-vin04t:1272_2: manasi karitvā sotadvāravasena sabbacetasā samannāharāma. Manasi karomāti ekaggacittā
tika-vin04t:1272_3: hutvā citte ṭhapeyyāma. Ettha ca kiñcāpi “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti vuttattā “suṇotha
tika-vin04t:1272_4: manasi karothā”ti vattuṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati, “saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”tiiminā pana
tika-vin04t:1272_5: na sameti. Samaggassa hi saṅghassetaṃ uposathakaraṇaṃ, pātimokkhuddesako ca saṅghapariyāpannova,
tika-vin04t:1272_6: iccassa saṅghapariyāpannattā “suṇoma manasi karomā”ti idameva vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1273_0: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”ti, tattha yathā pārisuddhiārocanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1273_1: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyyāti āha. Tattha yassa siyāti yassa
tika-vin04t:1273_2: channaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarena āpannāpatti bhaveyya. Āpattiñhi āpajjanto alajjitā, aññāṇatā,
tika-vin04t:1273_3: kukkuccappakatatā, akappiye kappiyasaññitā, kappiye akappiyasaññitā, satisammosāti
tika-vin04t:1274: Kathaṃ alajjitāya āpajjati? Akappiyabhāvaṃ jānantoyeva madditvā vītikkamaṃ karoti.
tika-vin04t:1278: Kathaṃ aññāṇatāya āpajjati? Aññāṇapuggalo hi mando momūho kattabbākattabbaṃ ajānanto akattabbaṃ karoti, kattabbaṃ virādheti, evaṃ aññāṇatāya āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1279_0: Kathaṃ kukkuccappakatatāya āpajjati? Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vinayadharaṃ
tika-vin04t:1279_1: pucchitvā kappiyaṃ ce, kattabbaṃ siyā, akappiyaṃ ce, na kattabbaṃ, ayaṃ pana “vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1280: Kathaṃ akappiye kappiyasaññitāya āpajjati? Acchamaṃsaṃ “sūkaramaṃsa”nti khādati, vikāle kālasaññāya bhuñjati, evaṃ akappiye kappiyasaññitāya āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1281: Kathaṃ kappiye akappiyasaññitāya āpajjati? Sūkaramaṃsaṃ “acchamaṃsa”nti khādati, kāle vikālasaññāya bhuñjati, evaṃ kappiye akappiyasaññitāya āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1282_0: Kathaṃ satisammosā āpajjati? Sahaseyyacīvaravippavāsādīni satisammosā āpajjati, iti
tika-vin04t:1282_1: imesaṃ channaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarena ākārena āpannā yassa siyā sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1282_2: aññatarā āpatti therassa vā navassa vā majjhimassa vāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1283_0: So āvikareyyāti so taṃ āpattiṃ desetu vā pakāsetu vāti vuttaṃ hoti. Asantiyā āpattiyāti
tika-vin04t:1283_1: yassa pana evaṃ anāpannā vā āpattiṃ āpajjitvā ca pana vuṭṭhitā vā desitā vā ārocitā
tika-vin04t:1283_2: vā āpatti, tassa sā āpatti asantī nāma hoti, evaṃ asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1283_3: Tuṇhībhāvena kho panāyasmante “parisuddhā”ti vedissāmīti tuṇhībhāvenāpi hi kāraṇena
tika-vin04t:1283_4: ahaṃ āyasmante “parisuddhā”icceva jānissāmīti. Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1283_5: hotīti yathā ekeneko puṭṭho byākareyya, yathā ekeneko paccekapuṭṭho “maṃ esa pucchatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1284_0: Evamevaṃ evarūpāya parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hotīti ettha ekacce tāva ācariyā
tika-vin04t:1284_1: evaṃ vadanti “evamevaṃ imissāya bhikkhuparisāya yadetaṃ ‘yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyya,
tika-vin04t:1284_2: asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ, tuṇhībhāvena kho panāyasmante parisuddhāti vedissāmī’ti
tika-vin04t:1284_3: tikkhattuṃ anusāvitaṃ, taṃ ekamekena ‘maṃ esa pucchatī’ti evaṃ jānitabbaṃ hotīti
tika-vin04t:1284_4: attho”ti. Taṃ na yujjati, kasmā? Atthabyañjanabhedato. Anussāvanañhi nāma atthato
tika-vin04t:1284_5: ca byañjanato ca abhinnaṃ hoti “dutiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmī”tiādīsu viya, “yassa
tika-vin04t:1284_6: siyā”tiādivacanattayaṃ pana atthatopi byañjanatopi bhinnaṃ, tenassa anussāvanattayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1284_7: na yujjati. Yadi cetaṃ yāvatatiyānussāvanaṃ siyā, nidānuddese aniṭṭhitepi āpatti
tika-vin04t:1284_8: siyā. Na ca yuttaṃ anāpattikkhette āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ.
tika-vin04t:1285_1: upari uddesāvasāne “kaccittha parisuddhā…pe… tatiyampi pucchāmī”ti etaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin04t:1285_2: vuttanti āhu. Tampi na yujjati, kasmā? Atthayuttīnaṃ abhāvato. Idañhi padaṃ keci
tika-vin04t:1285_3: “anusāveta”nti sajjhāyanti, keci “anusāveta”nti, taṃ ubhayaṃ vāpi atītakālameva dīpeti,
tika-vin04t:1285_4: na anāgataṃ. Yadi cassa ayaṃ attho siyā, “anusāvitaṃ hessatī”ti vadeyya, evaṃ tāva
tika-vin04t:1285_5: atthābhāvato na yujjati. Yadi cetaṃ uddesāvasāne vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā, “na
tika-vin04t:1285_6: āvikarissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādentassa nidāne samattepi vuttamusāvādo na siyā, kasmā?
tika-vin04t:1285_8: siyā, kasmā? Nidānuddese yāvatatiyānussāvanassa abhāvatoti evaṃ yuttiabhāvato tampi
tika-vin04t:1285_9: na yujjati. “Yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ pana lakkhaṇavacanamattaṃ, tena
tika-vin04t:1285_10: imamatthaṃ dasseti – idaṃ pātimokkhaṃ nāma yāvatatiyaṃ anussāviyati, tasmiṃ yāvatatiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1285_11: anussāviyamāne yo saramāno santiṃ āpattiṃ nāvikaroti, tassa yāvatatiyānussāvanāvasāne
tika-vin04t:1286_0: Tadetaṃ yathā anusāvitaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ tatthāyasmante
tika-vin04t:1286_1: pucchāmītiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ pārājikādīnaṃ avasāne dissati, na nidānāvasāne.
tika-vin04t:1286_2: Kiñcāpi na dissati, atha kho uddesakāle “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1286_3: kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ, tatthāyasmante pucchāmī”tiādinā nayena vattabbameva. Evañhi
tika-vin04t:1286_4: nidānaṃ suuddiṭṭhaṃ hoti, aññathā duuddiṭṭhaṃ. Imameva ca atthaṃ sandhāya uposathakkhandhake
tika-vin04t:1286_5: vuttaṃ “yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hotīti sakimpi anusāvitaṃ hoti, dutiyampi anusāvitaṃ
tika-vin04t:1286_6: hoti, tatiyampi anusāvitaṃ hotī”ti. Ayamettha ācariyaparamparābhato vinicchayo.
tika-vin04t:1287_0: Yo pana bhikkhu…pe… sampajānamusāvādassa hotīti sampajānamusāvādo assa hoti, tenassa
tika-vin04t:1287_1: dukkaṭāpatti hoti, sā ca kho pana na musāvādalakkhaṇena, “sampajānamusāvāde kiṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1287_2: dukkaṭaṃ hotī”ti iminā pana bhagavato vacanena vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānāpatti hotīti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1293_1: adhigamāya antarāyaṃ karoti. Tasmāti yasmā ayaṃ anāvikaraṇasaṅkhāto sampajānamusāvādo
tika-vin04t:1293_2: antarāyiko hoti, tasmā. Saramānenāti attani santiṃ āpattiṃ jānantena. Visuddhāpekkhenāti
tika-vin04t:1293_3: vuṭṭhātukāmena visujjhitukāmena. Santī āpattīti āpajjitvā avuṭṭhitā āpatti. Āvikātabbāti
tika-vin04t:1293_4: saṅghamajjhe vā gaṇamajjhe vā ekapuggale vā pakāsetabbā, antamaso anantarassāpi bhikkhuno
tika-vin04t:1293_5: “ahaṃ, āvuso, itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, ito vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1293_6: vattabbaṃ. Sacepi vematiko hoti, “ahaṃ, āvuso, itthannāmāya āpattiyā vematiko, yadā
tika-vin04t:1293_7: nibbematiko bhavissāmi, tadā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ. Āvikatā hissa
tika-vin04t:1293_8: phāsu hotītiettha āvikatāti āvikatāya, pakāsitāyāti attho. Alajjitātiādīsu viya hi
tika-vin04t:1293_9: idampi karaṇatthe paccattavacanaṃ. Hīti nipātamattaṃ. Assāti etassa bhikkhuno. Phāsu
tika-vin04t:1293_10: hotīti paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya phāsu hoti, avippaṭisāramūlakānaṃ pāmojjādīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1297_0: Idāni yadetaṃ nidānānantaraṃ tatrime cattārotiādi pārājikakaṇḍaṃ, tattha tatrāti
tika-vin04t:1297_1: tasmiṃ “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti evaṃ vutte pātimokkhe. Imeti idāni vattabbānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1297_2: abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ. Cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Pārājikāti evaṃnāmakā. Dhammāti āpattiyo.
tika-vin04t:1297_3: Uddesaṃ āgacchantīti sarūpena uddisitabbataṃ āgacchanti, na nidāne viya “yassa siyā
tika-vin04t:1299_0: Yo panāti rassadīghādinā liṅgādibhedena yo koci. Bhikkhūti ehibhikkhuupasampadā,
tika-vin04t:1299_3: upasampadāsu ñatticatutthena upasampadākammena akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampanno.
tika-vin04t:1299_4: Tassa pana kammassa vatthuñattianussāvana sīmā parisāsampattivasena akuppatā veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1300_0: Tattha vatthūti upasampadāpekkho puggalo, so ṭhapetvā ūnavīsativassaṃ antimavatthuajjhāpannapubbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1300_1: paṇḍakādayo ca ekādasa abhabbapuggale veditabbo. Tattha ūnavīsativasso nāma paṭisandhiggahaṇato
tika-vin04t:1300_2: paṭṭhāya aparipuṇṇavīsativasso. Antimavatthuajjhāpannapubbo nāma catunnaṃ pārājikānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1300_3: aññataraṃ ajjhāpannapubbo. Paṇḍakādayo vajjanīyapuggalakathāyaṃ vuttā. Tesu āsittapaṇḍakañca
tika-vin04t:1300_4: usūyapaṇḍakañca ṭhapetvā opakkamikapaṇḍako napuṃsakapaṇḍako paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe ṭhito
tika-vin04t:1301_0: Theyyasaṃvāsako pana tividho liṅgatthenako saṃvāsatthenako ubhayatthenakoti. Tattha
tika-vin04t:1301_1: yo sayaṃ pabbajitvā na bhikkhuvassāni gaṇeti, na yathāvuḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā sāmaṇerānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1301_2: vā vandanaṃ sādiyati, na āsanena paṭibāhati, na uposathādīsu sandissati, ayaṃ asuddhacittatāya
tika-vin04t:1301_3: liṅgamattasseva thenitattā liṅgatthenako nāma. Yo pana bhikkhūhi pabbajito sāmaṇero
tika-vin04t:1301_4: samāno kāsāyāni apanetvā tesu saussāhova methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā puna nivāsetvā
tika-vin04t:1301_5: sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ paṭijānāti, ayaṃ bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa apariccattattā na liṅgatthenako,
tika-vin04t:1301_6: na liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassa sāditattā nāpi saṃvāsatthenako. Antimavatthuajjhāpannakepi
tika-vin04t:1301_7: eseva nayo. Yo ca kho sāmaṇero samāno videsaṃ gantvā bhikkhuvassāni gaṇeti, yathāvuḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1301_8: vandanaṃ sādiyati, āsanena paṭibāhati, uposathādīsu sandissati, ayaṃ saṃvāsamattasseva
tika-vin04t:1301_9: thenitattā saṃvāsatthenako nāma. Bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko hi sabbopi kiriyabhedo imasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1301_10: atthe “saṃvāso”ti veditabbo. Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya “na maṃ koci jānātī”ti puna evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1301_11: paṭipajjantepi eseva nayo. Yo pana sayaṃ pabbajitvā vihāraṃ gantvā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1301_12: sādiyati, āsanena paṭibāhati, bhikkhuvassāni gaṇeti, uposathādīsu sandissati, ayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1301_13: liṅgassa ceva saṃvāsassa ca thenitattā ubhayatthenako nāma. Dhuranikkhepavasena kāsāyāni
tika-vin04t:1301_14: apanetvā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpajjitvā puna tāni acchādetvā evaṃ paṭipajjantepi eseva
tika-vin04t:1301_15: nayo, ayaṃ tividhopi theyyasaṃvāsako idha adhippeto. Ṭhapetvā pana imaṃ tividhaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1305: Theyyasaṃvāsako nāma, tāva esa na vuccatī”ti. ;
tika-vin04t:1306_0: Yo pana upasampanno titthiyabhāvaṃ patthayamāno sayaṃ vā kusacīrādikaṃ titthiyaliṅgaṃ
tika-vin04t:1306_1: ādiyati, tesaṃ vā santike pabbajati, naggo vā hutvā ājīvakānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā tesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1306_2: vatāni ādiyati, ayaṃ titthiyapakkantako nāma. Ṭhapetvā pana manussajātikaṃ avaseso
tika-vin04t:1306_3: sabbopi tiracchānagato nāma. Yena manussajātikā janetti sayampi manussabhūteneva
tika-vin04t:1306_4: sañcicca jīvitā voropitā, ayaṃ mātughātako nāma. Pitughātakepi eseva nayo. Yena antamaso
tika-vin04t:1306_5: gihiliṅge ṭhitopi manussajātiko khīṇāsavo sañcicca jīvitā voropito, ayaṃ arahantaghātako
tika-vin04t:1306_6: nāma. Yo pana pakatattaṃ bhikkhuniṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ magge dūseti, ayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1306_7: bhikkhunidūsako nāma. Yo devadatto viya sāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ katvā catunnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1306_8: kammānaṃ aññataravasena saṅghaṃ bhindati, ayaṃ saṅghabhedako nāma. Yo devadatto viya
tika-vin04t:1306_9: duṭṭhacittena vadhakacittena tathāgatassa jīvamānakasarīre khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi
tika-vin04t:1306_10: lohitaṃ uppādeti, ayaṃ lohituppādako nāma. Yassa itthinimittuppādanakammato ca purisanimittuppādanakammato
tika-vin04t:1306_11: ca ubhato duvidhampi byañjanaṃ atthi, ayaṃ ubhatobyañjanako nāma. Iti ime terasa
tika-vin04t:1306_12: puggalā upasampadāya avatthū, ime pana ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ upasampadāpekkhe sati upasampadākammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1307_0: Kathaṃ ñattisampattivasena akuppaṃ hoti? Vatthusaṅghapuggalañattīnaṃ aparāmasanāni,
tika-vin04t:1307_1: pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanañcāti ime tāva pañca ñattidosā. Tattha “ayaṃ itthannāmo”ti upasampadāpekkhassa
tika-vin04t:1307_2: akittanaṃ vatthuaparāmasanaṃ nāma. “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”tiettha “suṇātu me,
tika-vin04t:1307_3: bhante”ti vatvā “saṅgho”ti abhaṇanaṃ saṅghaaparāmasanaṃ nāma. “Itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho”ti
tika-vin04t:1307_4: upajjhāyassa akittanaṃ puggalaaparāmasanaṃ nāma. Sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiyā anuccāraṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1307_5: ñattiaparāmasanaṃ nāma. Paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā “esā ñattī”ti vatvā “khamati
tika-vin04t:1307_6: saṅghassā”ti evaṃ ñattikittanaṃ pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanaṃ nāma. Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya
tika-vin04t:1308_0: Anussāvanavasena akuppatāyapi vatthusaṅghapuggalānaṃ aparāmasanāni, sāvanāya hāpanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1308_1: akāle sāvananti ime pañca anussāvanadosā. Tattha vatthādīnaṃ aparāmasanāni ñattiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1308_2: vuttasadisāneva. Tīsu pana anussāvanāsu yattha katthaci etesaṃ aparāmasanaṃ aparāmasanameva.
tika-vin04t:1308_3: Sabbena sabbaṃ pana kammavācaṃ avatvā catukkhattuṃ ñattikittanameva, atha vā pana
tika-vin04t:1308_4: kammavācābbhantare akkharassa vā padassa vā anuccāraṇaṃ vā duruccāraṇaṃ vā sāvanāya
tika-vin04t:1308_5: hāpanaṃ nāma. Sāvanāya anokāse paṭhamaṃ ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā anussāvanakaraṇaṃ akāle
tika-vin04t:1308_6: sāvanaṃ nāma. Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya anussāvanāya sampannaṃ anussāvanasampattivasena akuppaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1309_0: Pubbe vuttaṃ vipattisīmālakkhaṇaṃ samatikkantāya pana sīmāya kataṃ sīmāsampattivasena
tika-vin04t:1309_1: akuppaṃ hoti. Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, tesaṃ anāgamanaṃ, chandārahānaṃ chandassa
tika-vin04t:1309_2: anāharaṇaṃ, sammukhībhūtānaṃ paṭikkosananti ime pana tayo parisādosā, tehi vimuttāya
tika-vin04t:1309_3: parisāya kataṃ parisāsampattivasena akuppaṃ hoti. Kāraṇārahattā pana satthu sāsanārahattā
tika-vin04t:1309_4: ṭhānārahaṃ nāma hoti. Iti yo iminā evaṃ akuppena ṭhānārahena ñatticatutthena upasampadākammena
tika-vin04t:1309_5: upasampanno, ayaṃ idha “bhikkhū”ti adhippeto. Paṇṇattivajjesu pana aññepi saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin04t:1310_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca,
tika-vin04t:1310_1: yattha cete saha jīvanti, ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino honti, taṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1310_2: sikkhāpadasaṅkhātaṃ sājīvañca, tattha sikkhanabhāvena samāpannoti bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamaāpanno.
tika-vin04t:1310_3: Samāpannoti sikkhañca paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti
tika-vin04t:1310_4: attho. Sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti yaṃ sikkhaṃ samāpanno, taṃ apaṭikkhipitvā,
tika-vin04t:1310_5: yañca sājīvaṃ samāpanno, tasmiṃ dubbalabhāvaṃ appakāsetvā. Tattha cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānanavasena
tika-vin04t:1310_6: sikkhāya paccakkhānaṃ ñatvā tadabhāvena apaccakkhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Upasampannabhāvato
tika-vin04t:1310_7: cavitukāmatācitteneva hi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na davā vā ravā vā bhaṇantassa.
tika-vin04t:1310_8: Evaṃ cittavasena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena. Tathā “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmi,
tika-vin04t:1310_9: dhammaṃ paccakkhāmi, saṅghaṃ paccakkhāmi, sikkhaṃ, vinayaṃ, pātimokkhaṃ, uddesaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1310_10: upajjhāyaṃ, ācariyaṃ, saddhivihārikaṃ, antevāsikaṃ, samānupajjhāyakaṃ, samānācariyakaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1310_11: sabrahmacāriṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ, “gihīti maṃ dhārehi,
tika-vin04t:1310_12: upāsako, ārāmiko, sāmaṇero, titthiyo, titthiyasāvako, asamaṇo, ‘asakyaputtiyo’ti
tika-vin04t:1310_13: maṃ dhārehī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ gihiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannañcāti imesaṃ dvāvīsatiyā khettapadānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1310_14: yassa kassaci savevacanassa vasena tesu yaṃkiñci vattukāmassa yaṃkiñci vadato sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1310_15: hoti, na rukkhādīnaṃ aññatarassa nāmaṃ gahetvā paccācikkhantassa. Evaṃ khettavasena
tika-vin04t:1311_0: Tattha yadetaṃ “paccakkhāmī”ti ca, “maṃ dhārehī”ti ca vuttaṃ vattamānakālavacanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1311_1: yāni ca “alaṃ me buddhena, kiṃ nu me buddhena, na mamattho buddhena, sumuttāhaṃ buddhenā”tiādinā
tika-vin04t:1311_2: nayena ākhyātavasena kālaṃ anāmasitvā purimehi cuddasahi padehi saddhiṃ yojetvā vuttāni
tika-vin04t:1311_3: “alaṃ me”tiādīni cattāri padāni, tesaṃyeva ca savevacanānaṃ vasena paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1311_4: na “paccakkhāsi”nti vā “paccakkhissa”nti vā “maṃ dhāresī”ti vā “maṃ dhāressatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1311_6: Evaṃ vattamāna kālavasena ceva anāmaṭṭhakālavasena ca paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.
tika-vin04t:1312_0: Payogo pana duvidho kāyiko ca vācasiko ca. Tattha “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin04t:1312_1: yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vacībhedaṃ katvā vācasikappayogeneva paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na akkharalikhanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1312_2: vā hatthamuddādidassanaṃ vā kāyappayogaṃ karontassa. Evaṃ vācasikappayogeneva paccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1313_0: Puggalo pana duvidho – yo ca paccakkhāti, yassa ca paccakkhāti. Tattha yo paccakkhāti,
tika-vin04t:1313_1: so sace ummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭānaṃ aññataro na hoti. Yassa pana paccakkhāti,
tika-vin04t:1313_2: so sace manussajātiko hoti, na ca ummattakādīnaṃ aññataro, sammukhībhūto ca sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1313_3: hoti. Na hi asammukhībhūtassa dūtena vā paṇṇena vā ārocanaṃ ruhati. Evaṃ yathāvuttapuggalavasena
tika-vin04t:1314_0: Vijānanampi niyamitāniyamitavasena duvidhaṃ. Tattha yassa yesaṃ vā niyametvā “imassa,
tika-vin04t:1314_1: imesaṃ vā ārocemī”ti vadati, sace te yathā pakatiyā loke manussā vacanaṃ sutvā āvajjanasamaye
tika-vin04t:1314_2: jānanti, evaṃ tassa vacanānantarameva tassa “ayaṃ ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā “gihibhāvaṃ patthayatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1314_3: vā yena kenaci ākārena sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ jānanti, paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā.
tika-vin04t:1314_4: Atha aparabhāge “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti cintetvā jānanti, aññe vā jānanti, apaccakkhātāva
tika-vin04t:1314_5: hoti sikkhā. Aniyametvā ārocentassa pana sace vuttanayena yo koci manussajātiko vacanatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1314_6: jānāti, paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Evaṃ vijānanavasena paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.
tika-vin04t:1314_7: Yo pana antamaso davāyapi paccakkhāti, tena apaccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Iti imesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1314_8: vuttappakārānaṃ cittādīnaṃ vā vasena, sabbaso vā pana apaccakkhānena sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya
tika-vin04t:1314_9: sikkhāpaccakkhānasseva ca atthabhūtaṃ ekaccaṃ dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā.
tika-vin04t:1315_0: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyāti ettha methunaṃ dhammanti rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1315_1: ubhinnaṃ dhammaṃ. Paṭiseveyyāti paṭiseveyya ajjhāpajjeyya. Antamasoti sabbantimena
tika-vin04t:1315_2: paricchedena. Tiracchānagatāyapīti paṭisandhivasena tiracchānesu gatāyapi, ayamettha
tika-vin04t:1315_3: anupaññatti. Pārājiko hotīti parājito hoti, parājayaṃ āpanno. Asaṃvāsoti pakatattā
tika-vin04t:1315_4: bhikkhū saha vasanti etthāti ekakammādikova tividhopi vidhi saṃvāso nāma, so tena
tika-vin04t:1315_5: saddhiṃ natthīti asaṃvāso. Saṅghakammesu hi esa gaṇapūrakopi na hoti, ayaṃ tāva padavaṇṇanā.
tika-vin04t:1316_0: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – manussāmanussatiracchānagatavasena hi tisso itthiyo, tāsaṃ
tika-vin04t:1316_1: vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhamaggavasena tayo tayo katvā nava maggā, tathā ubhatobyañjanakānaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1316_2: Purisānaṃ pana vaccamaggamukhamaggavasena dve dve katvā cha maggā, tathā paṇḍakānanti
tika-vin04t:1316_3: evaṃ tiṃsa maggā. Tesu attano vā paresaṃ vā yassa kassaci maggassa santhatassa vā
tika-vin04t:1316_4: asanthatassa vā, paresaṃ pana matānampi akkhāyitassa vā yebhuyyena akkhāyitassa vā
tika-vin04t:1316_5: pakativātena asaṃphuṭṭhe allokāse yo bhikkhu ekatilabījamattampi attano aṅgajātaṃ
tika-vin04t:1316_6: santhataṃ vā asanthataṃ vā sevanacittena paveseti, parena vā pavesiyamāne pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭṭhitauddharaṇesu
tika-vin04t:1316_7: yaṃkiñci sādiyati, ayaṃ pārājikāpattiṃ āpanno nāma hoti, ayaṃ tāvettha asādhāraṇavinicchayo.
tika-vin04t:1322: Ñatvā yojeyya medhāvī, tattha tattha yathārahanti.
tika-vin04t:1323_1: sattavidhaṃ paññattiṭṭhānaṃ, idañhi sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ nidānaṃ. Puggalo nāma yaṃ
tika-vin04t:1323_2: yaṃ ārabbha taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ. Vatthu nāma tassa tassa puggalassa ajjhācāro
tika-vin04t:1323_5: nāma anuppanne dose paññattā, sā aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇavasena bhikkhunīnaṃyeva
tika-vin04t:1323_6: āgatā, aññatra natthi. Vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā, gaṇaṅgaṇūpāhanā dhuvanhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1323_7: cammattharaṇanti etesaṃ vasena catubbidhā padesapaññatti nāma. Majjhimadeseyeva hi
tika-vin04t:1323_8: etehi āpatti hoti, tesupi dhuvanhānaṃ paṭikkhepamattameva pātimokkhe āgataṃ, tato
tika-vin04t:1323_9: aññā padesapaññatti nāma natthi. Sabbāni sabbatthapaññattiyeva honti, sādhāraṇapaññattidukañca
tika-vin04t:1323_10: ekatopaññattidukañca atthato ekaṃ, tasmā anuppannapaññattiñca sabbatthapaññattidukañca
tika-vin04t:1323_11: ekatopaññattidukañca ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ catassannaṃ paññattīnaṃ vasena sabbattha vinicchayo
tika-vin04t:1323_12: veditabbo. Āṇattāpattināpattivipattintiettha āṇattītiāṇāpanā vuccati. Āpattīti pubbappayogādivasena
tika-vin04t:1323_13: āpattibhedo. Anāpattīti ajānanādivasena anāpatti. Vipattīti sīlaācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1323_14: aññatarā. Iti imāsaṃ āṇattādīnampi vasena sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo. Aṅganti
tika-vin04t:1324_0: Samuṭṭhānavidhinti sabbāpattīnaṃ kāyo vācā kāyavācā kāyacittaṃ vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti
tika-vin04t:1324_1: imāni ekaṅgikadvaṅgikativaṅgikāni. Cha samuṭṭhānāni nāma yāni “sikkhāpadasamauṭṭhānānī”tipi
tika-vin04t:1324_2: vuccanti. Tattha purimāni tīṇi acittakāni, pacchimāni sacittakāni. Tesu ekena vā
tika-vin04t:1324_3: dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā chahi vā samuṭṭhānehi āpattiyo samuṭṭhahanti, pañcasamuṭṭhānā
tika-vin04t:1324_4: nāma natthi. Tattha ekasamuṭṭhānā nāma catutthena ca pañcamena ca chaṭṭhena ca samuṭṭhānena
tika-vin04t:1324_5: samuṭṭhāti, na aññena. Dvisamuṭṭhānā nāma paṭhamacatutthehi ca dutiyapañcamehi ca
tika-vin04t:1324_6: tatiyachaṭṭhehi ca catutthachaṭṭhehi ca pañcamachaṭṭhehi ca samuṭṭhānehi, samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin04t:1324_7: na aññehi. Tisamuṭṭhānā nāma paṭhamehi ca tīhi, pacchimehi ca tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin04t:1324_8: na aññehi. Catusamuṭṭhānā nāma paṭhamatatiyacatutthachaṭṭhehi ca dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi
tika-vin04t:1324_9: ca samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, na aññehi. Cha samuṭṭhānā nāma chahipi samuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin04t:1328_0: Samuṭṭhānavasena sabbāva terasa āpattiyo honti, tā paṭhamapaññattisikkhāpadavasena
tika-vin04t:1328_3: Tattha yā kāyacittato samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā sacittakehi
tika-vin04t:1328_4: tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā chahipi samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin04t:1328_5: ayaṃ sañcarittasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā chaṭṭheneva samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānā
tika-vin04t:1328_6: nāma. Yā tatiyachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ kathinasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā paṭhamacatutthehi
tika-vin04t:1328_7: samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā dutiyapañcamehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ padasodhammasamuṭṭhānā
tika-vin04t:1328_8: nāma. Yā paṭhamatatiyacatutthachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ addhānasamuṭṭhānā nāma.
tika-vin04t:1328_9: Yā catutthachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā pañcameneva
tika-vin04t:1328_10: samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā acittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin04t:1328_11: ayaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā pañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānā
tika-vin04t:1328_12: nāma. Yā dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānā nāmāti.
tika-vin04t:1328_13: Iti imassa samuṭṭhānavidhinopi vasena sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1329_0: Kiriyāsaññācittehi nānattanti etehi kiriyādīhi sabbāpattīnaṃ nānābhāvaṃ ñatvā sabbattha
tika-vin04t:1329_1: vinicchayo veditabbo. Sabbāpattiyo hi kiriyāvasena pañcavidhā honti, seyyathidaṃ
tika-vin04t:1329_2: – atthāpatti kiriyato samuṭṭhāti, atthi akiriyato, atthi kiriyākiriyato, atthi siyā
tika-vin04t:1329_3: kiriyato siyā akiriyato, atthi siyā kiriyato siyā kiriyākiriyatoti. Tattha yā kāyena
tika-vin04t:1329_4: vā vācāya vā pathavikhaṇanādīsu viya vītikkamaṃ karontassa hoti, ayaṃ kiriyato samuṭṭhāti
tika-vin04t:1329_5: nāma. Yā kāyavācāhi kattabbaṃ akarontassa hoti paṭhamakathināpatti viya, ayaṃ akiriyato
tika-vin04t:1329_6: samuṭṭhāti nāma. Yā karontassa ca akarontassa ca hoti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato
tika-vin04t:1329_7: cīvarappaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya, ayaṃ kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma. Yā siyā karontassa
tika-vin04t:1329_8: ca, siyā akarontassa ca hoti rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya, ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā
tika-vin04t:1329_9: akiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma. Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā karontākarontassa ca hoti kuṭikārāpatti
tika-vin04t:1329_10: viya, ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma.
tika-vin04t:1330_0: Sabbāpattiyo ca saññāvasena duvidhā honti saññāvimokkhā nosaññāvimokkhāti. Tattha
tika-vin04t:1330_1: yato vītikkamasaññāya abhāvena muccati, ayaṃ saññāvimokkhā, itarā nosaññāvimokkhā.
tika-vin04t:1330_2: Puna ca sabbāpi cittavasena duvidhā honti sacittakā acittakā cāti. Tattha yā sacittakasamuṭṭhānavaseneva
tika-vin04t:1330_3: samuṭṭhāti ayaṃ sacittakā. Yā acittakena vā sacittakamissakena vā samuṭṭhāti ayaṃ acittakā.
tika-vin04t:1331_0: Vajjakammappabhedanti ettha sabbāpattiyo vajjavasena duvidhā honti lokavajjā paṇṇattivajjā
tika-vin04t:1331_1: cāti. Tattha yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, ayaṃ lokavajjā, sesā
tika-vin04t:1331_2: paṇṇattivajjā. Sabbā ca kāyakammavacīkammatadubhayavasena tividhā honti. Tattha kāyadvāre
tika-vin04t:1331_3: āpajjitabbā kāyakammanti vuccati, vacīdvāre āpajjitabbā vacīkammanti vuccati, ubhayattha
tika-vin04t:1331_4: āpajjitabbā kāyakammaṃ vacīkammañcāti, manodvāre āpatti nāma natthi. Iti iminā vajjakammappabhedenāpi
tika-vin04t:1332_0: Tikadvayavidhinti kusalattikavedanāttikavidhiṃ. Āpattiṃ āpajjamāno hi akusalacitto
tika-vin04t:1332_1: vā āpajjati kusalābyākatacitto vā, tathā dukkhavedanāsamaṅgī vā itaravedanādvayasamaṅgī
tika-vin04t:1332_2: vā. Evaṃ santepi sabbasikkhāpadesu akusalacittavasena ekaṃ cittaṃ, kusalābyākatacittavasena
tika-vin04t:1332_3: dve cittāni, sabbesaṃ vasena tīṇi cittāni. Dukkhavedanāvasena ekā vedanā, sukhaupekkhāvasena
tika-vin04t:1332_4: dve, sabbāsaṃ vasena tisso vedanāti. Ayameva pabhedo labbhati, na añño.
tika-vin04t:1333_0: Lakkhaṇaṃ sattarasadhā, ṭhitaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ idaṃ, ñatvāti idaṃ nidānādivedanāttikapariyosānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1333_1: sattarasappakāraṃ lakkhaṇaṃ jānitvā yojeyya medhāvī. Tattha tattha yathārahanti paṇḍito
tika-vin04t:1333_2: bhikkhu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yathānurūpaṃ yojeyyāti attho. Taṃ
tika-vin04t:1333_3: pana ayojitaṃ dubbijānaṃ hoti, tasmā naṃ sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ asādhāraṇavinicchayapariyosāne
tika-vin04t:1334_0: Idha panassa ayaṃ yojanā – idaṃ vesāliyaṃ sudinnattheraṃ ārabbha methunavītikkamavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1334_1: paññattaṃ. “Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti ayamettha paññatti, “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti
tika-vin04t:1334_2: ca “antamaso tiracchānagatāyapī”ti ca dve anupaññattiyo. Anupaññatti ca nāmesā āpattikarā
tika-vin04t:1334_3: ca hoti aññavādakasikkhāpadādīsu viya, anāpattikarā ca aññatra supinantātiādīsu viya,
tika-vin04t:1334_4: āpattiupatthambhakarā ca adinnādānādīsu viya, idha pana upatthambhakarāti veditabbā.
