tika-vin04t:1613_2: tikapācittiyaṃ, upasampanne anupasampannasaññino vematikassa vā upaddhacchannaparicchannādīsu
tika-vin04t:1613_3: ca dukkaṭaṃ. Ūnakadirattatirattaṃ vasantassa, tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā
tika-vin04t:1613_4: puna vasantassa, sabbacchannasabbāparicchannādīsu vasantassa, itarasmiṃ nisinne nipajjantassa,
tika-vin04t:1613_5: nipanne vā nisīdantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Pācittiyavatthukasenāsanaṃ, tattha
tika-vin04t:1613_6: anupasampannena saha nipajjanaṃ, catutthadivase sūriyatthaṅgamananti imānettha tīṇi
tika-vin04t:1616: Chaṭṭhe mātugāmenāti antamaso tadahujātāyapi manussitthiyā. Dissamānarūpā pana yakkhipetiyo paṇḍako methunavatthubhūtā ca tiracchānitthiyo idha dukkaṭavatthukā honti.
tika-vin04t:1617_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha mātugāmena sahaseyyavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1617_1: sesaṃ anantarasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ aññatra rattiparicchedā, tatra
tika-vin04t:1617_2: hi catutthadivase āpatti, idha pana paṭhamadivasepīti.
tika-vin04t:1620_0: Sattame uttarichappañcavācāhītiettha eko gāthāpādo ekā vācāti evaṃ sabbattha vācāpamāṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1620_1: veditabbaṃ. Dhammaṃ deseyyāti padasodhammasikkhāpade vuttalakkhaṇaṃ dhammaṃ vā aṭṭhakathādhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1620_2: vā bhāseyya. Aññatra viññunā purisaviggahenāti vinā viññunā purisena. Manussaviggahaṃ
tika-vin04t:1620_3: gahetvā ṭhitena pana yakkhena vā petena vā tiracchānena vā saddhiṃ ṭhitāyapi dhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1620_4: desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pācittiyanti dutiyāniyate vuttalakkhaṇena manussena vinā viññumanussitthiyā
tika-vin04t:1620_5: channaṃ vācānaṃ upari padādivasena dhammaṃ desentassa padādigaṇanāya, bahūnaṃ desayato
tika-vin04t:1621_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha mātugāmassa dhammadesanāvatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “aññatra
tika-vin04t:1621_1: viññunā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1621_3: desentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Chahi vācāhi, tato vā oraṃ desentassa, vuttalakkhaṇe vā purise
tika-vin04t:1621_4: sati, sayaṃ vā uṭṭhāya, puna nisīditvā mātugāmassa vā uṭṭhahitvā puna nisinnassa,
tika-vin04t:1621_5: aññassa vā mātugāmassa desayato, “dīghanikāyo nāma bhante kimatthiyo”ti evaṃ pana
tika-vin04t:1621_6: puṭṭhe sabbampi dīghanikāyaṃ desentassa, aññassatthāya vuccamānaṃ mātugāme suṇante,
tika-vin04t:1621_7: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Vuttalakkhaṇassa dhammassa channaṃ vācānaṃ upari desanā,
tika-vin04t:1621_9: imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni padasodhammasadisāneva, kevalaṃ idha kiriyākiriyaṃ hotīti.
tika-vin04t:1624_0: Aṭṭhame uttarimanussadhammanti catutthapārājike vuttalakkhaṇaṃ uttarimanussānaṃ jhāyīnañceva
tika-vin04t:1624_1: ariyānañca dhammaṃ. Bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyanti attani jhānādidhamme sati taṃ bhikkhuñca
tika-vin04t:1625_0: Vesāliyaṃ vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha tesaṃ bhūtārocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1625_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, nippariyāyena attani vijjamānaṃ jhānādidhammaṃ ārocentassa
tika-vin04t:1625_2: sace yassa āroceti, so anantarameva “ayaṃ jhānalābhī”ti vā “ariyo”ti vā yena kenaci
tika-vin04t:1625_3: ākārena tamatthaṃ jānāti, pācittiyaṃ. No ce jānāti, dukkaṭaṃ. Pariyāyena ārocitaṃ
tika-vin04t:1625_4: pana jānātu vā, mā vā, dukkaṭameva. Tathārūpe kāraṇe sati upasampannassa ārocayato,
tika-vin04t:1625_5: ādikammikassa ca anāpatti. Yasmā pana ariyānaṃ ummattakādibhāvo natthi, jhānalābhino
tika-vin04t:1625_6: pana tasmiṃ sati jhānā parihāyanti, tasmā te idha na gahitā. Uttarimanussadhammassa
tika-vin04t:1625_7: bhūtatā, anupasampannassa ārocanaṃ, taṅkhaṇavijānanā, anaññāpadesoti imānettha cattāri
tika-vin04t:1625_8: aṅgāni. Bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1625_9: kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, kusalābyākatacittehi dvicittaṃ, sukhamajjhattavedanāhi dvivedananti.
tika-vin04t:1628_0: Navame bhikkhussāti pārājikaṃ anajjhāpannassa. Duṭṭhullanti kiñcāpi dvinnaṃ āpattikkhandhānametaṃ
tika-vin04t:1628_1: adhivacanaṃ, idha pana saṅghādisesameva adhippetaṃ. Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ
tika-vin04t:1628_2: saṅgho abhiṇhāpattikassa bhikkhuno āyatiṃ saṃvaratthāya āpattīnañca kulānañca pariyantaṃ
tika-vin04t:1628_3: katvā vā akatvā vā tikkhattuṃ apaloketvā katikaṃ karoti, taṃ ṭhapetvā, ayathākatikāya
tika-vin04t:1628_4: “ayaṃ asuciṃ mocetvā saṅghādisesaṃ āpanno”tiādinā nayena vatthunā saddhiṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin04t:1629_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha duṭṭhullāpattiārocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1629_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, aduṭṭhullāya duṭṭhullasaññino vematikassa
tika-vin04t:1629_2: vā dukkaṭaṃ, avasese cha āpattikkhandhe, anupasampannassa purimapañcasikkhāpadavītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin04t:1629_3: duṭṭhullaṃ vā itaraṃ aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāraṃ ārocentassāpi dukkaṭameva. Vatthumattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1629_4: vā āpattimattaṃ vā ārocentassa, bhikkhusammutiparicchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ārocentassa,
tika-vin04t:1629_5: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Vuttalakkhaṇassa bhikkhuno savatthuko saṅghādiseso, anupasampannassa
tika-vin04t:1629_6: ārocanaṃ, bhikkhusammutiyā abhāvoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni,
tika-vin04t:1632_0: Dasame pathavinti duvidhā pathavī jātapathavī ajātapathavīti. Tattha jātapathavī
tika-vin04t:1632_1: suddhamissapuñjavasena tividhā, tattha suddhapathavī nāma pakatiyā suddhapaṃsu vā
tika-vin04t:1632_2: suddhamattikā vā. Missapathavī nāma yattha paṃsuto vā mattikāto vā pāsāṇasakkharakathalamarumbavālukāsu
tika-vin04t:1632_3: aññatarassa tatiyabhāgo hoti. Puñjapathavī nāma “atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho paṃsupuñjo
tika-vin04t:1632_4: vā mattikāpuñjo vā”ti vuttaṃ, vuttalakkhaṇena pana missakapuñjopi piṭṭhipāsāṇe ṭhitasukhumarajampi
tika-vin04t:1632_5: ca deve phusāyante sakiṃ tintaṃ catumāsaccayena tintokāso puñjapathavisaṅkhameva
tika-vin04t:1632_6: gacchati. Tividhāpi cesā pathavī uddhanapattapacanādivasena vā yathā tathā vā adaḍḍhā
tika-vin04t:1632_7: ‘jātapathavī’ti vuccati, daḍḍhā pana vuttappamāṇato adhikatarapāsāṇādimissā vā ajātapathavī
tika-vin04t:1632_8: nāma hoti, ko pana vādo suddhapāsāṇādibhedāya. Tattha yā ‘jātapathavī’ti vuttā, ayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1632_9: akappiyapathavī. Yo bhikkhu taṃ evarūpaṃ pathaviṃ sayaṃ khaṇati, khaṇanabhedanavilekhanapacanādīhi
tika-vin04t:1632_10: vikopeti, tassa payogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ. Yo pana khaṇāpeti, vuttanayeneva vikopāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1632_11: tassa “imaṃ padesa”nti vā “imaṃ pathavi”nti vā evaṃ niyametvā “khaṇa, bhindā”tiādinā
tika-vin04t:1632_12: nayena āṇāpentassa āṇattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, sakiṃ āṇatte divasampi khaṇante āṇāpakassa
tika-vin04t:1632_13: ekameva pācittiyaṃ, sace itaro punappunaṃ āṇāpeti, vācāya vācāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1633_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavake bhikkhū ārabbha pathavikhaṇanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1633_1: sāṇattikaṃ, pathaviyā vematikassa, apathaviyā pathavisaññino ceva vematikassa ca
tika-vin04t:1633_2: dukkaṭaṃ. Okāsaṃ aniyametvā “pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇa, āvāṭaṃ khaṇa, kandaṃ khaṇā”tiādīni
tika-vin04t:1633_3: bhaṇantassa, ātapena sussitvā phalitakaddamaṃ vā gokaṇṭakaṃ vā heṭṭhā pathaviyā asambaddhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1633_4: bhijjitvā patitanaditaṭaṃ vā mahantampi naṅgalacchinnamattikāpiṇḍantievamādīni sabbañca
tika-vin04t:1633_5: ajātapathaviṃ vikopentassa, “imassa thambhassa āvāṭaṃ jāna, mattikaṃ dehi, mattikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1633_6: āhara, paṃsunā me attho, mattikaṃ kappiyaṃ karohī”ti bhaṇantassa, asañcicca rukkhādipavaṭṭanena
tika-vin04t:1633_7: bhindantassa, asatiyā pādaṅguṭṭhakādīhi vilekhantassa, jātapathavibhāvaṃ vā, “khaṇāmi
tika-vin04t:1633_8: vā aha”nti ajānantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Jātapathavī, pathavisaññitā, khaṇanakhaṇāpanānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1633_9: aññataranti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1638_0: Bhūtagāmavaggassa paṭhame bhūtagāmapātabyatāyāti ettha bhavanti ahesuñcāti bhūtā,
tika-vin04t:1638_1: jāyanti vaḍḍhanti jātā vaḍḍhitā cāti attho. Gāmoti rāsi, bhūtānaṃ gāmo, bhūtā eva
tika-vin04t:1638_2: vā gāmoti bhūtagāmo, patiṭṭhitaharitatiṇarukkhādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Pātabyassa
tika-vin04t:1638_3: bhāvo pātabyatā, chedanabhedanādīhi yathāruci paribhuñjitabbatāti attho, tassaṃ bhūtagāmapātabyatāya,
tika-vin04t:1638_4: nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ, bhūtagāmapātabyatāhetu bhūtagāmassa chedanādipaccayā
tika-vin04t:1638_5: pācittiyanti attho. Tasmā yo bhikkhu pathaviudakapākārādīsu yatthakatthaci jātaṃ
tika-vin04t:1638_7: vikopeti vā pathavikhaṇane vuttanayena vikopāpeti vā pācittiyaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1639_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavake bhikkhū ārabbha rukkhachindanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1639_2: bhājanagataṃ vā rāsikataṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ ropitampi nikkhantamūlamattaṃ vā nikkhantaaṅkuramattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1639_3: vā sacepissa vidatthimattā pattavaṭṭi niggacchati, anikkhante vā mūle nikkhante vā
tika-vin04t:1639_4: mūle yāva aṅkuro harito na hoti, tāva taṃ vikopentassa dukkaṭaṃ, tathā bhūtagāmabījagāme
tika-vin04t:1639_5: vematikassa, abhūtagāmabījagāme bhūtagāmabījagāmasaññino ceva vematikassa ca. Ubhayattha
tika-vin04t:1639_6: pana atathāsaññissa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti, asañcicca asatiyā ajānitvā vā vikopentassa,
tika-vin04t:1639_7: ‘imaṃ rukkha’nti evaṃ aniyametvā “rukkhaṃ chinda, valliṃ chindā”tiādīni bhaṇantassa,
tika-vin04t:1639_8: “imaṃ pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā jāna, imaṃ dehi, imaṃ āhara, iminā me attho, imaṃ kappiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1639_9: karohī”ti bhaṇantassa ca anāpatti. Evaṃ kappiyavacanena bhūtagāmato viyojitaṃ pana
tika-vin04t:1639_10: bījajātaṃ puna pi “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti kāretvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Evañhissa bījagāmaparimocanampi kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1640_0: Kappiyaṃ karontena pana agginā vā nakhena vā satthena vā kattabbaṃ, agginā karontena
tika-vin04t:1640_1: ca yena kenaci agginā ekadese phusantena ‘kappiya’nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ. Satthena
tika-vin04t:1640_2: karontena yassa kassaci tikhiṇasatthassa antamaso sūcinakhacchedanādīnampi tuṇḍena
tika-vin04t:1640_3: vā dhārāya vā vedhaṃ vā chedaṃ vā dassentena tatheva kātabbaṃ. Nakhena karontena
tika-vin04t:1640_4: ṭhapetvā gomahiṃsādīnaṃ khure yena kenaci apūtinā manussānaṃ vā tiracchānānaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:1640_5: nakhena antamaso chinditvā āhaṭenāpi satthe vuttanayeneva kātabbaṃ. Tattha sacepi
tika-vin04t:1640_6: bījānaṃ pabbatamatto rāsi, rukkhasahassaṃ vā chinditvā ekābaddhaṃ, ucchūnaṃ vā mahābhāro
tika-vin04t:1640_7: bandhitvā ṭhapito hoti, ekasmiṃ bīje vā rukkhasākhāya vā ucchumhi vā kappiye kate
tika-vin04t:1640_8: sabbaṃ kataṃ hoti. Ucchuṃ “kappiyaṃ karissāmī”ti tehi saddhiṃ baddhaṃ dārukaṃ vijjhati,
tika-vin04t:1640_9: vaṭṭatiyeva. Sace pana yāya valliyā bhāro baddho, taṃ vijjhati, na vaṭṭati. Maricapakkādīhi
tika-vin04t:1640_10: missetvā bhattaṃ āharanti, “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti vutte sacepi bhattasitthe vijjhati,
tika-vin04t:1640_11: vaṭṭatiyeva, tilataṇḍulesupi eseva nayo. Yāguyā pakkhittāni pana ekābaddhāni hutvā
tika-vin04t:1640_12: na santiṭṭhanti, tattha ekekaṃ vijjhitvāva kātabbaṃ. Kapiṭṭhaphalādīnaṃ anto miñjaṃ
tika-vin04t:1640_13: kaṭāhaṃ muñcitvā sañcarati, bhindāpetvā kappiyaṃ kāretabbaṃ. Ekābaddhā ce, kaṭāhepi
tika-vin04t:1640_14: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana phalaṃ taruṇaṃ hoti abījaṃ yañca nibbattabījaṃ bījaṃ apanetvā
tika-vin04t:1640_15: paribhuñjitabbaṃ, tattha kappiyakaraṇakiccaṃ natthi. Bhūtagāmo, bhūtagāmasaññitā,
tika-vin04t:1640_16: vikopanaṃ vā vikopāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni pathavikhaṇanasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1643_0: Dutiye yamatthaṃ saṅghamajjhe vinayadharo pucchati, tato aññaṃ vadatīti aññavādako,
tika-vin04t:1643_1: aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Vihesatīti vihesako, tuṇhībhāvassetaṃ nāmaṃ, tasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1643_2: aññavādake vihesake. Pācittiyanti vatthudvaye pācittiyadvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā yo bhikkhu
tika-vin04t:1643_3: sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno saṅghamajjhe anuyuñjiyamāno taṃ na kathetukāmo aññena vacanena
tika-vin04t:1643_4: aññaṃ chādento tathā tathā vikkhipati, yo ca tuṇhībhāvena viheseti, tesaṃ yaṃ bhagavatā
tika-vin04t:1643_5: aññavādakakammañceva vihesakakammañca anuññātaṃ, tasmiṃ saṅghena kate puna tathā
tika-vin04t:1644_0: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1644_1: anāṇattikaṃ, dhammakamme tikapācittiyaṃ, adhammakamme tikadukkaṭaṃ, anāropite pana
tika-vin04t:1644_2: aññavādake vā vihesake vā tathā karontassa dukkaṭameva. Āpattiṃ āpannabhāvaṃ vā ajānantassa
tika-vin04t:1644_3: “kiṃ tumhe bhaṇathā”ti pucchato, gelaññena vā, “saṅghassa bhaṇḍanādīni vā bhavissanti,
tika-vin04t:1644_4: adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṃ karissantī”ti iminā adhippāyena
tika-vin04t:1644_5: na kathentassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Dhammakammena āropitatā, āpattiyā vā vatthunā
tika-vin04t:1644_6: vā anuyuñjiyamānatā, chādetukāmatāya aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ vā tuṇhībhāvo vāti imānettha
tika-vin04t:1644_7: tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana siyā kiriyaṃ, siyā akiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1647_0: Tatiye yena vacanena ujjhāpenti “chandāya itthannāmo idaṃ nāma karotī”tiādīni vadantā
tika-vin04t:1647_1: upasampannaṃ saṅghena sammataṃ senāsanapaññāpakādibhedaṃ tassa ayasakāmā hutvā bhikkhūhi
tika-vin04t:1647_2: avajānāpenti, avaññāya olokāpenti, lāmakato vā cintāpenti, taṃ vacanaṃ ujjhāpanakaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1647_3: Yena ca tatheva vadantā khiyyanti, sabbattha tassa avaṇṇaṃ pakāsenti, taṃ khiyyanakaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1647_4: tasmiṃ ujjhāpanake khiyyanake. Pācittiyanti vatthudvaye pācittiyadvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā
tika-vin04t:1647_5: yo sammatassa bhikkhuno ayasakāmatāya upasampannassa vadanto ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati
tika-vin04t:1648_0: Rājagahe mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha ujjhāpanakhiyyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1648_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, yaṃ tassa upasampannassa sammutikammaṃ kataṃ, tasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1648_2: dhammakamme tikapācittiyaṃ, adhammakamme tikadukkaṭaṃ, anupasampannassa pana santike
tika-vin04t:1648_3: tathā bhaṇantassa, asammatassa ca avaṇṇaṃ yassa kassaci santike bhaṇantassa, anupasampannassa
tika-vin04t:1648_4: pana sammatassa vā asammatassa vā avaṇṇaṃ yassa kassacideva santike bhaṇantassa ca
tika-vin04t:1648_5: dukkaṭameva. Pakatiyāva chandādivasena karontaṃ ujjhāpentassa vā khiyyantassa vā,
tika-vin04t:1648_6: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Dhammakammena sammatatā, upasampannatā, agatigamanābhāvo,
tika-vin04t:1648_7: tassa avaṇṇakāmatā, yassa santike vadati, tassa upasampannatā, ujjhāpanaṃ vā khiyyanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1648_8: vāti imānettha cha aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedanamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1651_0: Catutthe saṅghikanti saṅghassa santakaṃ. Mañcādīsu yokoci mañcasaṅkhepena kato sabbopi
tika-vin04t:1651_1: mañcoyeva, pīṭhepi eseva nayo. Yena kenaci pana coḷena vā kappiyacammena vā chaviṃ
tika-vin04t:1651_2: katvā ṭhapetvā manussalomaṃ tālīsapattañca yehi kehici lomapaṇṇatiṇavākacoḷehi pūretvā
tika-vin04t:1651_3: katasenāsanaṃ bhisīti vuccati. Tattha nisīditumpi nipajjitumpi vaṭṭati, pamāṇaparicchedopi
tika-vin04t:1651_4: cettha natthi. Kocchaṃ pana vākausīramuñjapabbajādīnaṃ aññataramayaṃ anto saṃvellitvā
tika-vin04t:1651_5: baddhaṃ heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthataṃ paṇavasaṇṭhānaṃ majjhe sīhacammādiparikkhittaṃ
tika-vin04t:1651_6: hoti, akappiyacammaṃ nāmettha natthi. Senāsanañhi sovaṇṇamayampi vaṭṭati. Ajjhokāseti
tika-vin04t:1651_7: ettha ye avassikasaṅketā vassānamāsāti evaṃ asaññitā aṭṭha māsā, te ṭhapetvā itaresu
tika-vin04t:1651_8: catūsu māsesu sacepi devo na vassati. Tathāpi pakatiajjhokāse ca ovassakamaṇḍape
tika-vin04t:1651_9: ca santharituṃ na vaṭṭati. Yattha pana hemante vassati, tattha aparepi cattāro māse
tika-vin04t:1651_10: na vaṭṭati. Gimhe pana sabbattha vigatavalāhakaṃ visuddhaṃ nabhaṃ hoti, tasmā tadā
tika-vin04t:1651_11: kenacideva karaṇīyena gacchati, vaṭṭati. Kākādīnaṃ nibaddhavāsarukkhamūle pana kadācipi
tika-vin04t:1651_12: na vaṭṭati. Iti yattha ca yadā ca santharituṃ na vaṭṭati, taṃ sabbamidha ajjhokāsasaṅkhameva gatanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1652_0: Santharitvāti tathārūpe ṭhāne attano vā parassa vā atthāya santharitvā. Aññassatthāya
tika-vin04t:1652_1: santhatampi hi yāva so tattha na nisīdati, ‘gaccha tva’nti vā na bhaṇati, tāva santhārakasseva
tika-vin04t:1652_2: bhāro. Santharāpetvāti anupasampannena santharāpetvā. Etadeva hi tassa palibodho
tika-vin04t:1652_3: hoti, upasampannena santhataṃ santhārakasseva bhāro, tañca kho yāva āṇāpako tattha
tika-vin04t:1652_4: na nisīdati, ‘gaccha tva’nti vā na bhaṇati. Yasmiñhi attanā santharāpite vā pakatisanthate
tika-vin04t:1652_5: vā upasampanno nisīdati, sabbaṃ taṃ nisinnasseva bhāro, tasmā santharāpitantveva
tika-vin04t:1652_6: saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyyāti attanā vā uddharitvā
tika-vin04t:1652_7: patirūpe ṭhāne na ṭhapeyya, parena vā tathā na kārāpeyya. Anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyāti
tika-vin04t:1652_8: yo bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hoti, attano palibodhaṃ viya maññati,
tika-vin04t:1652_9: tathārūpaṃ anāpucchitvā taṃ senāsanaṃ tassa aniyyātetvā nirapekkho gacchati, thāmamajjhimassa
tika-vin04t:1652_10: purisassa leḍḍupātaṃ atikkameyya, tassa ekena pādena leḍḍupātātikkame dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapādātikkame
tika-vin04t:1652_11: pācittiyaṃ. Bhojanasālāya ṭhito pana “asukasmiṃ nāma divāvihāraṭṭhāne paññapetvā
tika-vin04t:1652_12: gacchāhī”ti pesetvā tato nikkhamitvā aññattha gacchanto pāduddhārena kāretabbo.
tika-vin04t:1653_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha santhataṃ anuddharitvā anāpucchaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1653_1: paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, puggalike tikadukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1653_2: cimilikaṃ vā uttarattharaṇaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā taṭṭikaṃ vā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ vā pādapuñchanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1653_3: vā phalakapīṭhaṃ vā yaṃ vā panaññaṃ kañci dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ antamaso pattādhārakampi
tika-vin04t:1653_4: vuttalakkhaṇe ajjhokāse ṭhapetvā gacchantassa dukkaṭameva. Āraññakena pana asati
tika-vin04t:1653_5: anovassake sabbaṃ rukkhe laggetvāpi yathā vā upacikāhi na khajjati, evaṃ katvāpi
tika-vin04t:1653_6: gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Abbhokāsikena pana cīvarakuṭikaṃ katvāpi rakkhitabbaṃ. Attano santake,
tika-vin04t:1653_7: vissāsikapuggalike, uddharaṇādīni katvā gamane, otāpentassa, “āgantvā uddharissāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1653_8: gacchato, vuḍḍhatarā uṭṭhāpenti, amanusso tattha nisīdati, koci issaro gaṇhāti, sīhādayo
tika-vin04t:1653_9: taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā tiṭṭhanti, evaṃ senāsanaṃ palibuddhaṃ hoti, tathā palibuddhe vā
tika-vin04t:1653_10: senāsane, jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyakarāsu āpadāsu vā gacchantassa, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1653_11: anāpatti. Mañcādīnaṃ saṅghikatā, vuttalakkhaṇe dese santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1653_12: vā, apalibuddhatā, āpadāya abhāvo, nirapekkhatā, leḍḍupātātikkamoti imānettha cha
tika-vin04t:1653_13: aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisāneva, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriyanti.
tika-vin04t:1656_0: Pañcame vihāreti gabbhe vā aññatarasmiṃ vā sabbaparicchanne vuttasenāsane. Seyyanti
tika-vin04t:1656_1: seyyā nāma bhisī cimilikā uttarattharaṇaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ taṭṭikā cammakkhaṇḍo nisīdanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1656_2: paccattharaṇaṃ tiṇasanthāro paṇṇasanthāroti vuttaṃ. Tattha cimilikā nāma parikammakatāya
tika-vin04t:1656_3: bhūmiyā vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ katā. Uttarattharaṇaṃ nāma mañcapīṭhādīnaṃ upari attharitabbayuttakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1656_4: paccattharaṇaṃ. Bhūmattharaṇaṃ nāma cimilikāya sati tassā upari, asati suddhabhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1656_5: attharitabbā kaṭasārakādi vikati. Taṭṭikā nāma tālapaṇṇādīhi katataṭṭikā. Cammakkhaṇḍo
tika-vin04t:1656_6: nāma yaṃkiñci cammaṃ, sīhacammādīnañhi pariharaṇeyeva parikkhepo, senāsanaparibhoge
tika-vin04t:1656_7: pana akappiyacammaṃ nāma natthi. Paccattharaṇaṃ nāma pāvāro kojavoti ettakameva,
tika-vin04t:1656_8: sesaṃ pākaṭameva. Iti imāsu dasasu seyyāsu ekampi seyyaṃ attano vassaggena gahetvā
tika-vin04t:1656_9: vuttalakkhaṇe vihāre santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā yo bhikkhu disaṃgamiko yathā
tika-vin04t:1656_10: ṭhapitaṃ upacikāhi na khajjati, tathā ṭhapanavasena neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:1656_11: purimasikkhāpade vuttanayena anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya, tassa parikkhittassa ārāmassa
tika-vin04t:1656_12: parikkhepaṃ, aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ atikkamantassa paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapāde
tika-vin04t:1656_13: pācittiyaṃ. Yattha pana upacikāsaṅkā natthi, tato anāpucchāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭati, āpucchanaṃ pana vattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1657_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā
tika-vin04t:1657_1: anāpucchā pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1657_2: puggalike tikadukkaṭaṃ, vuttalakkhaṇassa pana vihārassa upacāre bahi āsanne upaṭṭhānasālāya
tika-vin04t:1657_3: vā aparicchannamaṇḍape vā paricchanne vāpi bahūnaṃ sannipātabhūte rukkhamūle vā santharitvā
tika-vin04t:1657_4: vā santharāpetvā vā, mañcapīṭhañca vihāre vā vuttappakāre vihārūpacāre vā santharitvā
tika-vin04t:1657_5: vā santharāpetvā vā uddharaṇādīni akatvā gacchantassa dukkaṭameva. Attano santake,
tika-vin04t:1657_6: vissāsikapuggalike, uddharaṇādīni katvā, purimanayeneva palibuddhaṃ chaḍḍetvā gamane,
tika-vin04t:1657_7: yo ca “ajjeva āgantvā paṭijaggissāmī”ti evaṃ sāpekkho nadipāraṃ vā gāmantaraṃ vā
tika-vin04t:1657_8: gantvā yatthassa gamanacittaṃ uppannaṃ, tattheva ṭhito kañci pesetvā vā āpucchati,
tika-vin04t:1657_9: nadipūrarājacorādīsu vā kenaci palibuddho na sakkoti paccāgantuṃ, tassa ca, āpadāsu
tika-vin04t:1657_10: ca, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Vuttalakkhaṇaseyyā, tassā saṅghikatā, vuttalakkhaṇe
tika-vin04t:1657_11: vihāre santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā, apalibuddhatā, āpadāya abhāvo, anapekkhassa
tika-vin04t:1657_12: disāpakkamanaṃ, upacārasīmātikkamoti imānettha satta aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni anantarasikkhāpade vuttanayānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1660_0: Chaṭṭhe jānanti “anuṭṭhāpanīyo aya”nti jānanto, tenevassa padabhājane “vuḍḍho’ti
tika-vin04t:1660_1: jānāti, ‘gilāno’ti jānāti, ‘saṅghena dinno’ti jānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Vuḍḍho hi attano
tika-vin04t:1660_2: vuḍḍhatāya anuṭṭhāpanīyo, gilāno gilānatāya, saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharagaṇavācakācariyānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1660_3: vā bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhetvā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin04t:1660_4: sammannitvā deti, tasmā yassa saṅghena dinno, sopi anuṭṭhāpanīyo. Pubbupagatanti
tika-vin04t:1660_5: pubbaṃ upagataṃ. Anupakhajjāti mañcapīṭhānaṃ vā tassa vā bhikkhuno pavisantassa vā
tika-vin04t:1660_6: nikkhamantassa vā upacāraṃ anupavisitvā. Tattha mañcapīṭhānaṃ tāva mahallake vihāre
tika-vin04t:1660_7: samantā diyaḍḍho hattho upacāro, khuddake yato pahoti, tato diyaḍḍho hattho, tassa
tika-vin04t:1660_8: pana pavisantassa pādadhovanapāsāṇato yāva mañcapīṭhaṃ, nikkhamantassa mañcapīṭhato
tika-vin04t:1660_9: yāva passāvaṭṭhānaṃ, tāva upacāro. Seyyaṃ kappeyyāti tassa sambādhaṃ kattukāmatāya
tika-vin04t:1660_10: tasmiṃ upacāre dasasu seyyāsu ekampi santharantassa vā santharāpentassa vā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1660_11: tattha nisīdantassa vā nipajjantassa vā pācittiyaṃ, dvepi karontassa dve pācittiyāni,
tika-vin04t:1661_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anupakhajja seyyakappanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1661_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, puggalike tikadukkaṭaṃ, vuttūpacārato
tika-vin04t:1661_2: vā bahi, upaṭṭhānasālādike vā, vihārassa upacāre vā, santharaṇasantharāpanesupi nisajjasayanesupi
tika-vin04t:1661_3: dukkaṭameva. Attano vā, vissāsikassa vā santake pana vihāre santharantassa, yo ca
tika-vin04t:1661_4: gilāno vā sītuṇhapīḷito vā pavisati, tassa ca, āpadāsu ca, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1661_6: vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisāneva,
tika-vin04t:1664_0: Sattame kupitoti kuddho. Anattamanoti atuṭṭhacitto. Nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya
tika-vin04t:1664_1: vā pācittiyanti ettha ye anekabhūmakā pāsādā, anekakoṭṭhakāni vā catussālāni, tādisesu
tika-vin04t:1664_2: senāsanesu gahetvā antarā aṭṭhapetvā ekeneva payogena atikkāmentassa ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1664_3: ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā nānāpayogehi atikkāmentassa dvāragaṇanāya pācittiyāni, hatthena
tika-vin04t:1664_4: anāmasitvā ‘nikkhamā’ti vatvā vācāya nikkaḍḍhantassāpi eseva nayo. Nikkaḍḍhāpentassa
tika-vin04t:1664_5: pana ‘nikkaḍḍhā’ti āṇattamatte dukkaṭaṃ, sakiṃ āṇatte pana tasmiṃ bahukepi dvāre
tika-vin04t:1664_6: nikkhamante itarassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana “ettakāni dvārāni nikkaḍḍhāhī”ti
tika-vin04t:1664_7: vā, “yāva mahādvāraṃ, tāva nikkaḍḍhāhī”ti vā evaṃ niyametvā āṇatto hoti, dvāragaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
tika-vin04t:1665: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha bhikkhuṃ saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1666_0: Paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, sāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, puggalike tikadukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1666_1: tassa parikkhāranikkaḍḍhane, upaṭṭhānasālādikā vihārūpacārā tassa vā tassa parikkhārassa
tika-vin04t:1666_2: vā nikkaḍḍhane, anupasampannassa pana anupasampannaparikkhārassa vā vihārā vā vihārūpacārā
tika-vin04t:1666_3: vā nikkaḍḍhane nikkaḍḍhāpane ca dukkaṭameva. Tañca kho asambaddhesu parikkhāresu
tika-vin04t:1666_4: parikkhāragaṇanāya veditabbaṃ. Attano vā, vissāsikassa vā santakā vihārā nikkaḍḍhane,
tika-vin04t:1666_5: sakalasaṅghārāmatopi bhaṇḍanakārakassa vā tassa parikkhārassa vā nikkaḍḍhane nikkaḍḍhāpane
tika-vin04t:1666_6: vā, attano vasanaṭṭhānato alajjissa, ummattakassa, na sammāvattantānaṃ antevāsikasaavihārikānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1666_7: tesaṃ parikkhārassa vā nikkaḍḍhane ca, sayaṃ ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Saṅghikavihāro,
tika-vin04t:1666_8: upasampannassa bhaṇḍanakārakabhāvādivinimuttatā, kopena nikkaḍḍhanaṃ vā nikkaḍḍhāpanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1666_9: vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1669_0: Aṭṭhame uparivehāsakuṭiyāti upari acchannatalāya dvibhūmikakuṭiyā vā tibhūmikakuṭiyā
tika-vin04t:1669_1: vā, padabhājane pana idha adhippetaṃ kuṭiṃ dassetuṃ “majjhimassa purisassa asīsaghaṭṭā”ti
tika-vin04t:1669_2: vuttaṃ. Āhaccapādakanti aṅge vijjhitvā pavesitapādakaṃ. Abhinisīdeyyāti abhibhavitvā
tika-vin04t:1669_3: ajjhottharitvā nisīdeyya, bhummatthe vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdeyya
tika-vin04t:1669_4: vā nipajjeyya vāti attho. Abhīti idaṃ pana padasobhaṇatthe upasaggamattameva, tasmā
tika-vin04t:1669_5: yo bhikkhu vuttalakkhaṇāya vehāsakuṭiyā sabbantimena paricchedena yāva pamāṇamajjhimassa
tika-vin04t:1669_6: purisassa sabbaso heṭṭhimāhi tulāhi sīsaṃ na ghaṭṭeti, ettakaṃ uccāya tulānaṃ upari
tika-vin04t:1669_7: ṭhapite āhaccapādake mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdati vā nipajjati vā, tassa anupakhajjasikkhāpade
tika-vin04t:1670_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ pīṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1670_2: tikapācittiyaṃ, puggalike tikadukkaṭaṃ, attano vā, vissāsikassa vā santake vihāre,
tika-vin04t:1670_3: avehāsakuṭiyā, sīsaghaṭṭāya, yassa vā heṭṭhā dabbasambhārādīnaṃ nikkhittattā aparibhogaṃ
tika-vin04t:1670_4: hoti, uparitalaṃ vā padarasañcitaṃ sudhādiparikammakataṃ vā, tattha āhaccapādake
tika-vin04t:1670_5: nisīdantassa, yo ce tasmiṃ vehāsaṭṭhepi āhaccapādake ṭhito kiñci gaṇhāti vā laggati
tika-vin04t:1670_6: vā, yassa ca paṭāṇī dinnā hoti, pādasīsānaṃ upari āṇī pavesitā, tattha nisīdantassa,
tika-vin04t:1670_7: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Saṅghiko vihāro, asīsaghaṭṭā vehāsakuṭi, heṭṭhā saparibhogaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1670_8: apaṭāṇidinne āhaccapādake nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1673_0: Navame mahallakanti sassāmikaṃ. Vihāranti ullittāvallittaṃ. Yāva dvārakosātiettha
tika-vin04t:1673_1: dvārakoso nāma ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa sāmantā aḍḍhateyyahattho padeso.
tika-vin04t:1673_2: Aggaḷaṭṭhapanāyāti sakavāṭakassa dvārabandhassa niccalabhāvatthāya. Kavāṭañhi lahuparivattakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1673_3: vivaraṇakāle bhittiṃ āhanati, pidahanakāle dvārabandhaṃ. Tena āhanena bhitti kampati,
tika-vin04t:1673_4: tato mattikā calati, calitvā sithilā vā hoti patati vā, tenāha bhagavā “yāva dvārakosā
tika-vin04t:1673_5: aggaḷaṭṭhapanāyā”ti. Tattha kiñcāpi “idaṃ nāma kattabba”nti neva mātikāyaṃ, na padabhājane
tika-vin04t:1673_6: vuttaṃ, aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ pana “punappunaṃ chādāpesi, punappunaṃ lepāpesī”ti adhikārato
tika-vin04t:1673_7: yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya punappunaṃ limpitabbo vā lepāpetabbo vāti evamattho
tika-vin04t:1673_9: Te vivaraṇakāle vidatthimattampi atirekampi bhittippadesaṃ paharanti, upacāro panettha
tika-vin04t:1673_10: sabbadisāsu labbhati, tasmā sabbadisāsu kavāṭavitthārappamāṇo okāso ālokasandhiparikammatthāya
tika-vin04t:1673_11: limpitabbo vā lepāpetabbo vāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin04t:1674_0: Evaṃ lepakamme yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ dassetvā idāni chadane kattabbaṃ dassetuṃ dvatticchadanassātiādimāha.
tika-vin04t:1674_1: Tattha dvatticchadanassa pariyāyanti chadanassa dvattipariyāyaṃ, pariyāyaṃ vuccati
tika-vin04t:1674_2: parikkhepo, parikkhepadvayaṃ vā parikkhepattayaṃ vā adhiṭṭhātabbanti attho. Appaharite
tika-vin04t:1674_3: ṭhitenāti aharite ṭhitena. Haritanti cettha sattadhaññādibhedaṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ, muggamāsatilakulatthaalābukumbhaṇḍādibhedañca
tika-vin04t:1674_4: aparaṇṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Yaṃ tasmiṃ khette vuttaṃ na tāva sampajjati, vasse pana patite
tika-vin04t:1674_5: sampajjissati, tampi haritasaṅkhameva gacchati. Tasmā tasmiṃ ṭhatvā adhiṭṭhahanto
tika-vin04t:1674_6: dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Appaharite ṭhatvā adhiṭṭhahantassāpi ayaṃ paricchedo, piṭṭhivaṃsassa
tika-vin04t:1674_7: vā kūṭāgārathūpikāya vā passe nisinno puriso chadanamukhavaṭṭiantena olokento yasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1674_8: bhūmibhāge ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati, yasmiñca ṭhito taṃ upari nisinnakaṃ tatheva ullokento
tika-vin04t:1674_9: passati, tasmiṃ ṭhātabbaṃ, tassa anto aharitepi ṭhātuṃ na labhati. Tato ce uttarīti
tika-vin04t:1674_10: maggena chādiyamāne tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ, pariyāyena chādiyamāne tiṇṇaṃ pariyāyānaṃ upari
tika-vin04t:1675_0: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha punappunaṃ chādāpanalepāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1675_2: vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Setavaṇṇādikaraṇe, dvattipariyāye vā ūnakadvattipariyāye
tika-vin04t:1675_3: vā, leṇaguhātiṇakuṭikādīsu, aññassatthāya, attano dhanena kārentassa, vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:1675_4: sesāni adhiṭṭhahantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Mahallakavihāratā, attano vāsāgāratā,
tika-vin04t:1675_5: uttari adhiṭṭhānanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni sañcaritte vuttanayānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1678_0: Dasame jānaṃ sappāṇakanti “sappāṇakaṃ eta”nti disvā vā sutvā vā yena kenaci ākārena
tika-vin04t:1678_1: jānanto. Siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vāti tena udakena sayaṃ vā siñceyya, aññaṃ vā āṇāpetvā
tika-vin04t:1678_2: siñcāpeyya. Tattha dhāraṃ avicchinditvā siñcantassa ekasmiṃ ghaṭe ekāva āpatti, vicchindantassa
tika-vin04t:1678_3: payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo. Mātikaṃ pamukhaṃ karoti, divasampi sandatu, ekāva āpatti.
tika-vin04t:1678_4: Tattha tattha bandhitvā aññato nentassa payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo. Bahukampi tiṇapaṇṇasākhādiṃ
tika-vin04t:1678_5: ekappayogena udake pakkhipantassa ekāva āpatti, ekekaṃ pakkhipantassa payogagaṇanāya
tika-vin04t:1678_6: āpattiyo. Idañca yaṃ evaṃ pakkhipiyamāne pariyādānaṃ gacchati, āvilaṃ vā hoti, yathā
tika-vin04t:1678_7: pāṇakā maranti, tādisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na mahāudakaṃ. Siñcāpane āṇattiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1678_8: ekāṇattiyā bahukampi siñcatu, āṇāpakassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1679_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavake bhikkhū ārabbha siñcanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1679_1: sāṇattikaṃ, appāṇake sappāṇakasaññino, ubhosu vematikassa dukkaṭaṃ. Appāṇakasaññino,
tika-vin04t:1679_2: asañcicca assatiyā vā siñcantassa, ajānantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Udakassa
tika-vin04t:1679_3: sappāṇakatā, “siñcanena pāṇakā marissantī”ti jānanaṃ, tañca udakaṃ tādisameva, vinā
tika-vin04t:1679_4: vadhakacetanāya yena kenaci karaṇīyena tiṇādīnaṃ siñcananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1679_5: Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana paṇṇattivajjaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
tika-vin04t:1684_0: Ovādavaggassa paṭhame asammatoti yā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno bhagavatā ñatticatutthena
tika-vin04t:1684_1: kammena bhikkhunovādakasammuti anuññātā, tāya asammato. Ovadeyyāti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ
tika-vin04t:1684_2: vā sambahulā vā ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vā “vassasatūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadahupasampannassa
tika-vin04t:1684_3: bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabba”nti ādike aṭṭha
tika-vin04t:1684_4: garudhamme ovādavasena osārento ovadeyya. Pācittiyanti ovādapariyosāne pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1685_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha ovadanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1685_1: anāṇattikaṃ, aññena vā dhammena bhikkhunīsu upasampannamattaṃ vā ovadato dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1685_2: Sammatassāpi tañce sammutikammaṃ adhammakammaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ adhammakamme adhammakammasaññino
tika-vin04t:1685_3: vagge bhikkhunisaṅghe ovadato tikapācittiyaṃ, tathā vematikassa dhammakammasaññino
tika-vin04t:1685_4: cāti nava pācittiyāni, samaggepi bhikkhunisaṅghena vāti adhammakammavasena aṭṭhārasa.
tika-vin04t:1685_5: Sace pana taṃ dhammakammaṃ hoti, “dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ
tika-vin04t:1685_6: samaggasaññī ovadatī”ti idaṃ avasānapadaṃ ṭhapetvā teneva nayena sattarasa dukkaṭāni,
tika-vin04t:1685_7: “samaggamhāyyā”ti ca vutte aññaṃ dhammaṃ, “vaggamhāyyā”ti ca vutte aṭṭha garudhamme
tika-vin04t:1685_8: bhaṇantassa, ovādañca aniyyātetvā aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa dukkaṭameva. Yo pana
tika-vin04t:1685_9: dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadati, garudhammapāḷiṃ
tika-vin04t:1685_10: uddesaṃ deti, paripucchaṃ deti, “osārehi ayyā”ti vuccamāno osāreti, pañhaṃ puṭṭho
tika-vin04t:1685_11: katheti, bhikkhunīnaṃ suṇamānānaṃ aññassatthāya bhaṇati, sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā
tika-vin04t:1685_12: vā bhaṇati, tassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Asammatatā, bhikkhuniyā paripuṇṇūpasampannatā,
tika-vin04t:1685_13: ovādavasena aṭṭhagarudhammabhaṇananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni padasodhammasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1688: Dutiye ovadeyyāti aṭṭhagarudhammehi vā aññena vā dhammena ovadantassa sammatassāpi pācittiyameva.
tika-vin04t:1689_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ ārabbha atthaṅgate sūriye ovadanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1689_1: paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, sūriye atthaṅgate atthaṅgatasaññino
tika-vin04t:1689_2: vematikassa vā, ekatoupasampannaṃ ovadantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Purimasikkhāpade viya
tika-vin04t:1689_3: uddesādinayena anāpatti. Atthaṅgatasūriyatā, paripuṇṇūpasampannatā, ovadananti imānettha
tika-vin04t:1692_0: Tatiye bhikkhunupassayanti bhikkhuniyā ekarattaṃ vasanaṭṭhānampi. Ovadeyyāti idha
tika-vin04t:1692_1: garudhammehi ovadantasseva pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana asammato hoti, dve pācittiyāni.
tika-vin04t:1692_2: Sace pana sūriyepi atthaṅgate ovadati, tīṇi honti. Sammatassa pana rattiṃ ovadantassapi
tika-vin04t:1692_3: dve eva honti. Sammatattā hi bhikkhussa garudhammovādamūlakaṃ pācittiyaṃ natthi.
tika-vin04t:1692_4: Gilānāti na sakkoti ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā gantuṃ.
tika-vin04t:1693_0: Sakkesu chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ovadanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1693_1: paññattaṃ, “aññatra samayā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1693_2: tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampannāya upasampannasaññino vematikassa vā, ekatoupasampannaṃ
tika-vin04t:1693_3: yena kenaci, itaraṃ aññena dhammena ovadantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Samaye, anupasampannāya,
tika-vin04t:1693_4: purimasikkhāpade viya uddesādinayena ca anāpatti. Upassayūpagamanaṃ, paripuṇṇūpasampannatā,
tika-vin04t:1693_5: samayābhāvo, garudhammehi ovadananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisāni,
tika-vin04t:1696: Catutthe āmisahetūti cīvarādīnaṃ aññatarahetu. Bhikkhūti sammatā bhikkhū idhādhippetā. Pācittiyanti evarūpe bhikkhū avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1697_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha “āmisahetu ovadantī”ti bhaṇanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1697_1: paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, dhammakamme tikapācittiyaṃ, adhammakamme
tika-vin04t:1697_2: tikadukkaṭaṃ, asammataṃ upasampannañca, anupasampannañca sammataṃ vā asammataṃ vā
tika-vin04t:1697_3: evaṃ bhaṇantassa dukkaṭameva. Tattha yo bhikkhu kāle sammutiṃ labhitvā sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1697_4: saṇṭhito, ayaṃ sammato nāma anupasampanno. Pakatiyā cīvarādihetu ovadantaṃ pana evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1697_5: bhaṇantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Upasampannatā, dhammena laddhasammutitā,
tika-vin04t:1697_6: anāmisantaratā, avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1700_0: Pañcame sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha cīvaradānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesakathāmaggo
tika-vin04t:1700_1: panettha cīvarappaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tatra hi bhikkhu paṭiggāhako,
tika-vin04t:1700_2: idha bhikkhunī, ayaṃ viseso, sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1703_0: Chaṭṭhe cīvaranti nivāsanapārupanupagaṃ. Sibbeyya vā sibbāpeyyā vāti ettha sayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1703_1: sibbantassa sūciṃ pavesetvā pavesetvā nīharaṇe pācittiyaṃ, satakkhattumpi vijjhitvā
tika-vin04t:1703_2: sakiṃ nīharantassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ. ‘Sibbā’ti vutto pana sacepi sabbaṃ sūcikammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1703_3: niṭṭhāpeti, āṇāpakassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ. Atha “yaṃ ettha cīvare kattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ
tika-vin04t:1703_4: taṃ tava bhāro”ti vutto niṭṭhāpeti, tassa ārāpathe ārāpathe pācittiyaṃ. Āṇāpakassa
tika-vin04t:1703_5: ekavācāya sambahulānipi, punappunaṃ āṇattiyaṃ pana vattabbameva natthi.
tika-vin04t:1704_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha cīvarasibbanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1704_1: sāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ñātikāya aññātikasaññino vā vematikassa vā, ekatoupasampannāya
tika-vin04t:1704_2: sibbantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Aññaṃ thavikādiparikkhāraṃ sibbantassa, ñātikāya, sikkhamānasāmaṇerīnañca
tika-vin04t:1704_3: cīvarampi sibbantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā santakatā,
tika-vin04t:1704_4: nivāsanapārupanupagatā, vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sibbanaṃ vā sibbāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi
tika-vin04t:1707_0: Sattame saṃvidhāyāti saṃvidahitvā, gamanakāle saṅketaṃ katvāti attho. Ekaddhānamagganti
tika-vin04t:1707_1: ekaṃ addhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ, ekato vā addhānamaggaṃ. Satthagamanīyoti satthena saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1707_2: gantabbo, sesaṃ uttānapadatthameva. Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – akappiyabhūmiyaṃ saṃvidahantassa
tika-vin04t:1707_3: saṃvidahanapaccayā tāva dukkaṭaṃ. Tattha ṭhapetvā bhikkhunupassayaṃ antarārāmaṃ āsanasālaṃ
tika-vin04t:1707_4: titthiyaseyyañca sesā akappiyabhūmi, tattha ṭhatvā saṃvidahantassāti attho. Saṃvidahitvā
tika-vin04t:1707_5: pana “ajja vā sve vā”ti niyamitaṃ kālaṃ visaṅketaṃ akatvā, dvāravisaṅketaṃ pana maggavisaṅketaṃ
tika-vin04t:1707_6: vā katvāpi bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ gacchantassa yāva āsannassāpi aññassa gāmassa “ayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1707_7: imassa upacāro”ti manussehi ṭhapitaṃ upacāraṃ na okkamati, tāva anāpatti. Taṃ okkamantassa
tika-vin04t:1707_8: pana paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapāde pācittiyaṃ, iti gāmūpacārokkamanagaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
tika-vin04t:1707_9: Addhayojanātikkame pana gāme asati addhayojanagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1708_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha ekaddhānamaggappaṭipajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1708_1: “aññatra samayā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1708_2: asaṃvidahite saṃvidahitasaññino vematikassa vā, yo ca bhikkhuniyā asaṃvidahantiyā
tika-vin04t:1708_3: kevalaṃ attanāva saṃvidahati, tassa dukkaṭaṃ. Samaye saṃvidahitvāpi gacchantassa,
tika-vin04t:1708_4: attanā asaṃvidahantassa, visaṅketena vā, āpadāsu gacchantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1708_5: Dvinnampi saṃvidahitvā maggappaṭipatti, avisaṅketatā, samayābhāvo, anāpadā, gāmantarokkamanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1708_6: vā addhayojanātikkamo vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Ekatoupasampannādīhi pana saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1708_7: mātugāmasikkhāpadena āpatti, addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1711_0: Aṭṭhame saṃvidhāyāti kīḷāpurekkhāro saṃvidahitvā, abhiruhanakāle saṅketaṃ katvāti
tika-vin04t:1711_1: attho. Uddhaṃgāmininti kīḷāvasena uddhaṃ nadiyā paṭisotaṃ gacchantiṃ. Adhogāmininti
tika-vin04t:1711_2: tatheva adho anusotaṃ gacchantiṃ. Yaṃ pana titthappaṭipādanatthaṃ uddhaṃ vā adho
tika-vin04t:1711_3: vā haranti, ettha anāpatti. Aññatra tiriyaṃ taraṇāyāti upayogatthe nissakkavacanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1711_4: yā tiriyaṃ taraṇā, taṃ ṭhapetvāti attho. Pācittiyanti sagāmakatīrapassena gamanakāle
tika-vin04t:1711_5: gāmantaragaṇanāya, agāmakatīrapassena vā yojanavitthatāya nadiyā majjhena vā gamanakāle
tika-vin04t:1711_6: addhayojanagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ, samudde pana yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1712: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha nāvābhiruhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “aññatra tiriyaṃ taraṇāyā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, sesaṃ anantarasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:1715_0: Navame bhikkhuniparipācitanti bhikkhuniyā paripācitaṃ, neva tassa nāttano ñātakappavāritānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1715_1: gihīnaṃ santike bhikkhussa guṇaṃ pakāsetvā “detha ayyassa, karotha ayyassā”ti evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1715_2: nipphāditaṃ laddhabbaṃ katanti attho. Pubbe gihisamārambhāti ettha samārambhoti samāraddhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1715_3: paṭiyāditassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Gihīnaṃ samārambho gihisamārambho, bhikkhuniyā paripācanato
tika-vin04t:1715_4: pubbe paṭhamataraṃyeva yaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya gihīnaṃ paṭiyāditabhattaṃ, ñātakappavāritānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1715_5: vā santakaṃ, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ jānaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyanti attho. Tañca kho
tika-vin04t:1716_1: “aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1716_2: ekatoupasampannāya paripācitaṃ bhuñjantassa, aparipācite paripācitasaññino, ubhayattha
tika-vin04t:1716_3: vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Ubhayattha aparipācitasaññino, gihisamārambhe, sikkhamānasāmaṇerādīhi
tika-vin04t:1716_4: paripācite, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā avasese, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin04t:1716_6: tassa ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasaasāni,
tika-vin04t:1719_0: Dasame sabbopi kathāmaggo dutiyaaniyate vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Idañhi sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin04t:1719_1: dutiyaaniyatena ca upari upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadena ca ekaparicchedaṃ, aṭṭhuppattivasena
tika-vin04t:1724_0: Bhojanavaggassa paṭhame agilānenāti addhayojanampi gantuṃ samatthena. Ekoti ekadivasiko.
tika-vin04t:1724_1: Āvasathapiṇḍoti “imesaṃ vā ettakānaṃ vā”ti ekaṃ pāsaṇḍaṃ vā, “ettakamevā”ti evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1724_2: bhattaṃ vā anodissa sālādīsu yattha katthaci puññakāmehi paññattaṃ bhojanaṃ. Bhuñjitabboti
tika-vin04t:1724_3: ekakulena vā nānākulehi vā ekato hutvā ekasmiṃ vā ṭhāne, nānāṭhānesu vā “ajja ekasmiṃ,
tika-vin04t:1724_4: sve ekasmi”nti evaṃ aniyataṭṭhāne vā paññatto ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ekadivasameva bhuñjitabbo.
tika-vin04t:1724_5: Tato ce uttarīti dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya tasmiṃ vā ṭhāne aññasmiṃ vā ṭhāne tesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1724_6: santakassa paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1725_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍabhuñjanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1725_1: paññattaṃ, “agilānenā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1725_2: gilānassa agilānasaññino vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Gilānassa gilānasaññino, yo ca
tika-vin04t:1725_3: sakiṃ bhuñjati, gacchanto vā antarāmagge ekadivasaṃ, gataṭṭhāne ekadivasaṃ, paccāgantopi
tika-vin04t:1725_4: antarāmagge ekadivasaṃ, āgataṭṭhāne ekadivasaṃ, gamissāmī’ti ca bhuñjitvā nikkhanto
tika-vin04t:1725_5: kenaci upaddavena nivattitvā khemabhāvaṃ ñatvā gacchanto puna ekadivasaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:1725_6: yassa vā sāmikā nimantetvā denti, yo vā bhikkhūnaṃyeva uddissa paññattaṃ, na yāvadatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1725_7: paññattaṃ, ṭhapetvā vā pañca bhojanāni aññaṃ bhuñjati, tassa ca, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1725_8: anāpatti. Āvasathapiṇḍatā, agilānatā, anuvasitvā paribhojananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1728_0: Dutiye gaṇabhojaneti gaṇassa bhojane. Idha ca gaṇoti cattāro vā tatuttari vā bhikkhū,
tika-vin04t:1728_1: tesaṃ nimantanato vā viññattito vā laddhe odanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarabhojaneti
tika-vin04t:1728_2: attho. Tatthāyaṃ vinicchayo – sace hi koci cattāro bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā yena kenaci
tika-vin04t:1728_3: vevacanena vā bhāsantarena vā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā “odanena nimantemi,
tika-vin04t:1728_4: odanaṃ me gaṇhathā”tiādinā nayena nimanteti, te ce evaṃ ekato vā nānāto vā nimantitā
tika-vin04t:1728_5: ekato vā nānāto vā gantvā ekato gaṇhanti, pacchā ekato vā nānāto vā bhuñjanti, gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1728_6: hoti. Paṭiggahaṇameva hettha pamāṇaṃ. Sace odanādīnaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā ekato vā nānāto
tika-vin04t:1728_7: vā viññāpetvā ca gantvā ca ekato gaṇhanti, evampi gaṇabhojanameva. Tassa duvidhassāpi
tika-vin04t:1728_8: evaṃ paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre pācittiyaṃ. Gilānasamayādīsu yadā
tika-vin04t:1728_9: pādānampi phalitattā na sakkā piṇḍāya carituṃ, ayaṃ gilānasamayo. Atthatakathinānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1728_10: pañca māsā, itaresaṃ kattikamāsoti ayaṃ cīvaradānasamayo. Yadā yo cīvare kariyamāne
tika-vin04t:1728_11: kiñcideva cīvare kattabbaṃ kammaṃ karoti, ayaṃ cīvarakārasamayo. Yadā addhayojanampi
tika-vin04t:1728_12: gantukāmo vā hoti gacchati vā gato vā, ayaṃ addhānagamanasamayo. Nāvābhiruhanasamayepi
tika-vin04t:1728_13: eseva nayo. Yadā gocaragāme cattāro bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā na yāpenti, ayaṃ mahāsamayo.
tika-vin04t:1728_14: Yadā yokoci pabbajito bhattena nimanteti, ayaṃ samaṇabhattasamayo, etesu samayesu bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1729_0: Rājagahe devadattaṃ ārabbha viññāpetvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “aññatra samayā”ti
tika-vin04t:1729_1: ayamettha sattavidhā anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1729_2: nagaṇabhojane gaṇabhojanasaññissa vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Nagaṇabhojanasaññissa
tika-vin04t:1729_3: pana, ye ca dve tayo ekato gaṇhanti, bahūnaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā ekato bhuñjantānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1729_4: niccabhattikādīsu, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1729_5: Gaṇabhojanatā, samayābhāvo, ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1732_0: Tatiye paramparabhojaneti gaṇabhojane vuttanayeneva pañcahi bhojanehi nimantitassa
tika-vin04t:1732_1: yena yena paṭhamaṃ nimantito, tassa tassa bhojanato uppaṭipāṭiyā vā avikappetvā vā
tika-vin04t:1732_2: parassa parassa bhojane. Tasmā yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa “mayhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1732_3: bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī”ti vā “vikappemī”ti vā evaṃ sammukhā vā “itthannāmassa
tika-vin04t:1732_4: dammī”ti vā “vikappemī”ti vā evaṃ parammukhāvā paṭhamanimantanaṃ avikappetvā pacchā
tika-vin04t:1732_5: nimantitakule laddhabhikkhato ekasitthampi ajjhoharati, pācittiyaṃ. Samayā vuttanayā eva.
tika-vin04t:1733_0: Vesāliyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha aññatra nimantitabhojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1733_1: “aññatra samayā”ti ayamettha tividhā anupaññatti, parivāre pana vikappanampi gahetvā
tika-vin04t:1733_3: naparamparabhojane paramparabhojanasaññino vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Naparamparabhojanasaññissa
tika-vin04t:1733_4: pana, yo ca samaye vā vikappetvā vā ekasaṃsaṭṭhāni vā dve tīṇi nimantanāni ekato
tika-vin04t:1733_5: vā katvā bhuñjati, nimantanappaṭipāṭiyā bhuñjati, sakalena gāmena vā pūgena vā nimantito
tika-vin04t:1733_6: tesu yatthakatthaci bhuñjati, nimantiyamāno vā “bhikkhaṃ gahessāmī”ti vadati, tassa,
tika-vin04t:1733_7: niccabhattikādīsu, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1733_8: Paramparabhojanatā, samayābhāvo, ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1736_0: Catutthe pūvehīti paheṇakatthāya paṭiyattehi atirasakamodakasakkhalikādīhi yehi kehici
tika-vin04t:1736_1: khajjakehi. Manthehīti pātheyyatthāya paṭiyattehi yehi kehici sattutilataṇḍulādīhi.
tika-vin04t:1736_2: Dvattipattapūrāti mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhaṃ anatikkantā dve vā tayo vā pattapūrā.
tika-vin04t:1736_3: Tato ce uttarīti sacepi tatiyaṃ pattaṃ thūpīkataṃ gaṇhāti, mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhato
tika-vin04t:1736_4: upariṭṭhitapūvagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ. Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvāti ettha yena dve
tika-vin04t:1736_5: gahitā honti, tena bahi bhikkhuṃ disvā “ettha mayā dve pattapūrā gahitā, tvaṃ ekaṃ
tika-vin04t:1736_6: gaṇheyyāsī”ti vattabbaṃ, tenāpi aññaṃ passitvā “paṭhamaṃ āgatena dve pattapūrā gahitā,
tika-vin04t:1736_7: mayā eko gahito, tvaṃ mā gaṇhī”ti vattabbaṃ. Yena paṭhamaṃ eko gahito, tassāpi paramparārocane
tika-vin04t:1736_8: eseva nayo. Yena pana sayameva tayo gahitā, tena aññaṃ disvā “mā kho tvaṃ ettha paṭiggaṇhīti
tika-vin04t:1736_9: vattabbaṃ, avadantassa dukkaṭaṃ, taṃ sutvā gaṇhantassāpi dukkaṭameva. Tato nīharitvā
tika-vin04t:1736_10: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitabbanti laddhaṭṭhānato sabbāsannaṃ āsanasālaṃ vā vihāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1736_11: vā yattha vā pana nibaddhaṃ paṭikkamati, tattha gantvā ekaṃ pattapūraṃ attano ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:1736_12: sesaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa dātabbaṃ. Yathāmittaṃ pana dātuṃ na labbhati. Yena eko gahito,
tika-vin04t:1736_13: na tena kiñci akāmā dātabbaṃ, yathāruci kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1737_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha na mattaṃ jānitvā paṭiggahaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1737_2: vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Ūnakasaññissa pana, na paheṇakatthāya na pātheyyatthāya
tika-vin04t:1737_3: vā paṭiyattaṃ, tadatthāya paṭiyattasesakaṃ vā, gamane vā paṭippassaddhe, ñātakappavāritānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1737_4: vā dentānaṃ, attano dhanena gaṇhantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Vuttalakkhaṇapūvamanthatā,
tika-vin04t:1740_0: Pañcame bhuttāvīti bhuttavā, yena pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ sāsapamattampi ajjhoharitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1740_1: so evaṃ vuccati. Pavāritoti “asanaṃ paññāyati, bhojanaṃ paññāyati, hatthapāse ṭhito
tika-vin04t:1740_2: abhiharati, paṭikkhepo paññāyatī”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttapañcaṅgavasena katappavāraṇo,
tika-vin04t:1740_3: katappaṭikkhepoti attho. Tattha yasmā “asanaṃ paññāyatī”ti iminā vippakatabhojano
tika-vin04t:1740_4: ‘pavārito’ti vutto. Yo ca vippakatabhojano, tena kiñci bhuttaṃ, kiñci abhuttaṃ, yañca
tika-vin04t:1740_5: bhuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāya ‘bhuttāvī’tipi saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Tasmā ‘bhuttāvī’tivacanena
tika-vin04t:1740_6: visuṃ kiñci atthasiddhiṃ na passāma, “dirattatiratta”ntiādīsu pana dirattādivacanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1740_7: viya pavāritapadassa parivārabhāvena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1741_0: Pavāraṇaṅgesu pana asanaṃ paññāyatīti vippakatabhojanaṃ dissati, taṃ bhuñjamāno cesa
tika-vin04t:1741_1: puggalo hotīti attho. Bhojanaṃ paññāyatīti pavāraṇappahonakaṃ bhojanaṃ dissati, odanādīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1741_2: ce aññataraṃ paṭikkhipitabbaṃ bhojanaṃ hotīti attho. Hatthapāse ṭhitoti pavāraṇappahonakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1741_3: ce bhojanaṃ gaṇhitvā dāyako aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇe okāse ṭhito hotīti attho. Abhiharatīti
tika-vin04t:1741_4: so ce dāyako tassa taṃ bhojanaṃ kāyena abhisaṃharatīti attho. Paṭikkhepo paññāyatīti
tika-vin04t:1741_5: paṭikkhepo dissati, taṃ ce abhihaṭaṃ so bhikkhu kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipatīti
tika-vin04t:1741_6: attho. Evaṃ pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena pavārito hoti.
tika-vin04t:1742_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – ‘asana’ntiādīsu tāva yañca asnāti, yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse
tika-vin04t:1742_1: ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipati, taṃ odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsanti imesaṃ aññatarameva
tika-vin04t:1742_2: veditabbaṃ. Tattha odano nāma sāli vīhi yavo godhumo kaṅgu varako kudrūsakoti imesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1742_3: sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ taṇḍule gahetvā “bhattaṃ pacāmā”ti vā “yāguṃ pacāmā”ti vā yaṃkiñci
tika-vin04t:1742_4: sandhāya pacantu, sace uṇhaṃ vā sītalaṃ vā bhuñjantānaṃ bhojanakāle gahitagahitaṭṭhāne
tika-vin04t:1742_5: odhi paññāyati, odano hoti, pavāraṇaṃ janeti. Yo pana pāyāso vā ambilayāgu vā uddhanato
tika-vin04t:1742_6: otāritamattā abbhuṇhā sakkā hoti āvijjhitvā pivituṃ, sā yassa hatthena gahitokāsepi
tika-vin04t:1742_7: odhi na paññāyati, pavāraṇaṃ na janeti. Sace pana usumāya vigatāya ghanabhāvaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1742_8: odhiṃ dasseti, puna pavāraṇaṃ janeti, pubbe tanukabhāvo na rakkhati. Sacepi bahū
tika-vin04t:1742_9: paṇṇaphalakaḷīre pakkhipitvā muṭṭhimattāpi taṇḍulā pakkhittā honti, bhojanakāle ce
tika-vin04t:1742_10: odhi paññāyati, pavāraṇaṃ janeti. Ayāguke nimantane “yāguṃ dassāmā”ti bhatte udakakañjikakhīrādīni
tika-vin04t:1742_11: ākiritvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti denti, kiñcāpi tanukā hoti, pavāraṇaṃ janetiyeva. Sace
tika-vin04t:1742_12: pana pakkuthitesu udakādīsu pakkhipitvā pacitvā denti, yāgusaṅgahameva gacchati.
tika-vin04t:1742_13: Sace yāguyāpi sāsapamattampi macchamaṃsakkhaṇḍaṃ vā nhāru vā pakkhittaṃ hoti, pavāraṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1742_14: janeti. Ṭhapetvā sānulomānaṃ vuttadhaññānaṃ taṇḍule aññehi veḷutaṇḍulādīhi vā kandamūlaphalehi
tika-vin04t:1742_15: vā yehi kehici katabhattaṃ pavāraṇaṃ na janeti. Kummāso nāma yavehi kato. Aññehi
tika-vin04t:1742_16: pana muggādīhi katakummāso pavāraṇaṃ na janeti. Sattu nāma satta dhaññāni bhajjitvā
tika-vin04t:1742_17: kato. Antamaso kharapākabhajjitānaṃ vīhīnaṃ taṇḍule koṭṭetvā katacuṇṇampi kuṇḍakampi
tika-vin04t:1742_18: sattusaṅgahameva gacchati. Samapākabhajjitānaṃ pana ātapasukkhānaṃ kuṇḍakaṃ vā, ye
tika-vin04t:1742_19: keci taṇḍulā vā lājā vā, lājehi katabhattasattuādīni vā na pavārenti. Macchamaṃsesu
tika-vin04t:1742_20: sace yāguṃ pivantassa yāgusitthamattāneva dve macchakkhaṇḍāni vā maṃsakkhaṇḍāni vā
tika-vin04t:1742_21: ekabhājane vā nānābhājane vā denti, tāni ce akhādanto aññaṃ pavāraṇappahonakaṃ yaṃkiñci
tika-vin04t:1742_22: paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Tato ekaṃ khāditaṃ, ekaṃ hatthe vā patte vā hoti, sace
tika-vin04t:1742_23: aññaṃ paṭikkhipati pavāreti. Dvepi khāditāni honti, mukhe sāsapamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1742_24: natthi, sacepi aññaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Yo pana akappiyamaṃsaṃ kuladūsanavejjakammauttarimanussadhammārocanasāditarūpiyādīhi
tika-vin04t:1742_25: nibbattaṃ akappiyabhojanañca aññaṃ kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā khādanto paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti.
tika-vin04t:1743_0: Evaṃ yañca asnāti, yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipanto pavāraṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1743_1: janeti, taṃ ñatvā idāni yathā āpajjati, tassa jānanatthaṃ ayaṃ vinicchayo veditabbo
tika-vin04t:1743_2: – “asanaṃ bhojana”nti ettha tāva yena ekasitthampi ajjhohaṭaṃ hoti, so sace pattamukhahatthesu
tika-vin04t:1743_3: yatthakatthaci bhojane sati sāpekkhova aññaṃ vuttalakkhaṇaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1743_4: pavāreti. Sace pana nirapekkho hoti, yaṃ pattādīsu avasiṭṭhaṃ, taṃ na ca ajjhoharitukāmo,
tika-vin04t:1743_5: aññassa vā dātukāmo, aññatra vā gantvā bhuñjitukāmo, so paṭikkhipantopi na pavāreti.
tika-vin04t:1743_6: “Hatthapāse ṭhito”ti ettha pana sace bhikkhu nisinno hoti, ānisadassa pacchimantato
tika-vin04t:1743_7: paṭṭhāya, sace ṭhito, paṇhīnaṃ antato paṭṭhāya, sace nipanno, yena passena nipanno,
tika-vin04t:1743_8: tassa pārimantato paṭṭhāya dāyakassa nisinnassa vā ṭhitassa vā nipannassa vā ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:1743_9: pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ, tassa orimantena paricchinditvā aḍḍhateyyahattho
tika-vin04t:1743_10: ‘hatthapāso’ti veditabbo. Tasmiṃ ṭhatvā abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipantasseva pavāraṇā hoti,
tika-vin04t:1743_11: na tato paraṃ. ‘Abhiharatī’ti hatthapāsabbhantare ṭhito gahaṇatthaṃ upanāmeti. Sace
tika-vin04t:1743_12: pana anantaranisinnopi bhikkhu hatthe vā ādhārake vā ṭhitaṃ pattaṃ anabhiharitvāva
tika-vin04t:1743_13: “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā natthi. Bhattapacchiṃ ānetvā
tika-vin04t:1743_14: purato bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā evaṃ vuttepi eseva nayo. Īsakaṃ pana uddharitvā vā apanāmetvā
tika-vin04t:1743_15: vā ‘gaṇhathā’ti vutte taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti. Bhattapacchiṃ gahetvā parivisantassa
tika-vin04t:1743_16: añño “ahaṃ dhāressāmī”ti gahitamattameva karoti, parivesakoyeva pana taṃ dhāreti,
tika-vin04t:1743_17: tasmā sā abhihaṭāva hoti, tato dātukāmatāya gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1743_18: Sace pana parivesakena phuṭṭhamattāva hoti, itarova naṃ dhāreti, tato dātukāmatāya
tika-vin04t:1743_19: gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā na hoti. Kaṭacchunā uddhaṭe pana hoti, dvinnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1743_20: samabhārepi paṭikkhipanto pavāretiyeva. Anantarassa diyyamāne itaro pattaṃ pidahati,
tika-vin04t:1743_21: aññassa abhihaṭaṃ nāma paṭikkhittaṃ hoti, tasmā pavāraṇā natthi. ‘Paṭikkhepo’ti ettha
tika-vin04t:1743_22: vācāya abhihaṭe paṭikkhepo na ruhati, kāyena abhihaṭaṃ pana aṅgulicalanādinā kāyavikārena
tika-vin04t:1743_23: vā “alaṃ, mā dehī”tiādinā vacīvikārena vā paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1744_0: Eko samaṃsakaṃ rasaṃ abhiharati, “rasaṃ paṭiggaṇhathā”ti vadati, taṃ sutvā paṭikkhipato
tika-vin04t:1744_1: pavāraṇā natthi. ‘Maṃsarasa’nti vutte pana paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti. “Imaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin04t:1744_2: vuttepi hotiyeva. Maṃsaṃ visuṃ katvā ‘maṃsarasa’nti vuttepi sace sāsapamattampi khaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin04t:1744_3: atthi, paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti. Sace natthi, vaṭṭati. Kaḷīrapanasādīhi missetvā
tika-vin04t:1744_4: macchamaṃsaṃ pacanti, taṃ gahetvā “kaḷīrasūpaṃ gaṇhatha, panasabyañjanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin04t:1744_5: vadati, evampi na pavāreti. Kasmā? Apavāraṇārahassa nāmena vuttattā. “Macchamaṃsaṃ
tika-vin04t:1744_6: byañjana”nti vā “imaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā vutte pana pavāreti, ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro
tika-vin04t:1744_7: pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto. Gamanādīsu pana yasmiṃ iriyāpathe pavāreti, taṃ avikopenteneva bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1745_0: Anatirittanti na atirittaṃ, na adhikanti attho. Taṃ pana kappiyakatādīhi sattahi
tika-vin04t:1745_1: vinayakammākārehi akataṃ vā gilānassa anadhikaṃ vā hoti. Tasmā padabhājane ‘akappiyakata’ntiādi
tika-vin04t:1745_2: vuttaṃ, tattha yaṃ phalaṃ vā kandamūlādi vā pañcahi samaṇakappiyehi kappiyaṃ akataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1745_3: yañca akappiyamaṃsaṃ vā akappiyabhojanaṃ vā, etaṃ akappiyaṃ nāma, taṃ akappiyaṃ “alametaṃ
tika-vin04t:1745_4: sabba”nti evaṃ atirittaṃ kataṃ akappiyakatanti veditabbaṃ. Appaṭiggahitakatanti bhikkhunā
tika-vin04t:1745_5: appaṭiggahitaṃyeva purimanayena atirittaṃ kataṃ. Anuccāritakatanti kappiyaṃ kāretuṃ
tika-vin04t:1745_6: āgatena bhikkhunā īsakampi anukkhittaṃ vā anapanāmitaṃ vā kataṃ. Ahatthapāse katanti
tika-vin04t:1745_7: kappiyaṃ kāretuṃ āgatassa hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitena kataṃ. Abhuttāvinā katanti yo
tika-vin04t:1745_8: atirittaṃ karoti, tena pavāraṇappahonakaṃ bhojanaṃ abhuttena kataṃ. Bhuttāvinā pavāritena
tika-vin04t:1745_9: āsanā vuṭṭhitena katanti idaṃ uttānameva. “Alametaṃ sabba”nti avuttanti vacībhedaṃ
tika-vin04t:1745_10: katvā evaṃ avuttaṃ hoti. Iti imehi sattahi vinayakammākārehi yaṃ atirittaṃ kappiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1745_11: akataṃ, yañca pana na gilānātirittaṃ, tadubhayampi anatirittaṃ. Atirittaṃ pana tasseva
tika-vin04t:1746_0: Apicettha bhuttāvinā kataṃ hotīti antamaso anantaranisinnassa pattato ekampi sitthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1746_1: vā maṃsahīraṃ vā khāditvā katampi bhuttāvinā kataṃ hoti, yo pātova evaṃ bhuttāvī
tika-vin04t:1746_2: pavārito nisīdatiyeva, so upakaṭṭhepi kāle abhihaṭaṃ piṇḍaṃ bhikkhunā upanītaṃ kappiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1746_3: kātuṃ labhati. Sace pana tasmiṃ kappiye kate bhuñjantassa aññaṃ āmisaṃ ākiranti,
tika-vin04t:1746_4: taṃ so puna kātuṃ na labhati. Yañhi akataṃ, taṃ kātabbaṃ. Yena ca akataṃ, tena ca
tika-vin04t:1746_5: kātabbanti vuttaṃ, tasmā tasmiṃ bhājane kariyamāne paṭhamakatena saddhiṃ kataṃ hotīti
tika-vin04t:1746_6: taṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Aññasmiṃ pana bhājane tena vā aññena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1746_7: kataṃ paṭhamakatena missetvāpi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, na kevalañca tassa yena pana kataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1746_8: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ pavāritānampi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Yathā pana akatena missaṃ na
tika-vin04t:1746_9: hoti, evaṃ mukhañca hatthañca suddhaṃ katvā bhuñjitabbaṃ. Gilānātirittaṃ pana na
tika-vin04t:1746_10: kevalaṃ gilānassa bhuttāvasesameva, atha kho yaṃkiñci gilānaṃ uddissa “ajja vā sve
tika-vin04t:1746_11: vā yadā vā icchati, tadā khādissatī”ti āhaṭaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ ‘gilānātiritta’nti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1746_12: Khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vāti yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ. Khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyanti
tika-vin04t:1746_13: ettha vuttanayena pavāritassa anatirittaṃ yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya paṭiggaṇhato
tika-vin04t:1747_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha aññatra bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “anatiritta”nti
tika-vin04t:1747_1: ayamettha anupaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, yāmakālikādīni
tika-vin04t:1747_2: āhāratthāya gaṇhato, nirāmisāni ajjhoharato ca dukkaṭaṃ, tathā atiritte anatirittasaññino
tika-vin04t:1747_3: ceva vematikassa ca. Atirittasaññino pana, “atirittaṃ kārāpetvā bhuñjissāmī”ti gaṇhantassa,
tika-vin04t:1747_4: aññassatthāya gaṇhantassa, yāmakālikādīni tesaṃ anuññātaparibhogavasena nirāmisāni
tika-vin04t:1747_5: paribhuñjantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Pavāritabhāvo, āmisassa anatirittatā,
tika-vin04t:1747_6: kālena ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisāneva,
tika-vin04t:1750_0: Chaṭṭhe abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyāti abhiharitvā “handa, bhikkhu khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti
tika-vin04t:1750_1: evaṃ pavāreyya. Jānanti sutvā vā disvā vā tassa pavāritabhāvaṃ jānanto. Āsādanāpekkhoti
tika-vin04t:1750_2: āsādanaṃ codanaṃ maṅkukaraṇabhāvaṃ apekkhamāno. Bhuttasmiṃ pācittiyanti ettha abhihāre
tika-vin04t:1750_3: tāva dukkaṭaṃ, sace so taṃ gaṇhāti, puna abhihārakassa dukkaṭaṃ, tasmiṃ pana bhuñjante
tika-vin04t:1750_4: abhihārakassa tassa ajjhohāre ajjhohāre dukkaṭaṃ, bhojanapariyosāne pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1751_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anatirittena bhojanena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāraṇāvatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1751_1: paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, pavārite pavāritasaññino pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1751_2: Vematikassa, yāmakālikādīni āhāratthāya abhiharantassa, tesañca paṭiggahaṇaajjhohāresu,
tika-vin04t:1751_3: appavārite ca pavāritasaññino, vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Appavāritasaññissa pana,
tika-vin04t:1751_4: yo ca atirittaṃ kārāpetvā deti, “kārāpetvā vā bhuñjāhī”ti deti, yo vā “aññassatthāya
tika-vin04t:1751_5: haranto gacchāhī”ti deti, yo ca yāmakālikādīni “sati paccaye paribhuñjāhī”ti deti,
tika-vin04t:1751_6: tassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Pavāritatā, pavāritasaññitā, āsādanāpekkhatā, anatirittena
tika-vin04t:1751_7: abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāraṇatā, bhojanapariyosānanti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1754_0: Sattame vikāleti vigate kāle, majjhanhikātikkamanato yāva aruṇuggamanāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin04t:1754_1: Tasmā yo bhikkhu etasmiṃ antare yaṃkiñci vanamūlaphalaṃ upādāya āmaṃ vā pakkaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:1754_2: āmisasaṅkhepagataṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhoharaṇatthāya paṭiggaṇhāti, tassa
tika-vin04t:1755_0: Rājagahe sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha vikāle bhojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1755_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, yāmakālikādīni āhāratthāya paṭiggahaṇaajjhohāresu, kāle
tika-vin04t:1755_2: vikālasaññissa, vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ, kāle kālasaññissa yāmakālikādīni sati paccaye
tika-vin04t:1755_4: romaṭṭhaṃ, na ca bhikkhave bahimukhadvārā nīharitvā ajjhoharitabba”nti anuññātanayena
tika-vin04t:1755_5: romaṭṭhakassāpi anāpatti. Vikālatā, yāvakālikatā, ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1758_0: Aṭṭhame sannidhikārakanti kāro karaṇaṃ kiriyāti atthato ekaṃ, sannidhi kāro assāti
tika-vin04t:1758_1: sannidhikāraṃ, sannidhikārameva sannidhikārakaṃ, paṭiggahetvā ekarattiṃ vītināmitassetaṃ
tika-vin04t:1758_2: nāmaṃ. Tasmā evaṃ sannidhikataṃ yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā ‘ajjhoharissāmī’ti
tika-vin04t:1758_3: gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre pācittiyaṃ. Sacepi patto duddhoto
tika-vin04t:1758_4: hoti, yaṃ aṅguliyā ghaṃsantassa lekhā paññāyati, gaṇṭhikapattassa vā gaṇṭhikantare
tika-vin04t:1758_5: sneho paviṭṭho hoti, yo uṇhe otāpentassa paggharati, uṇhayāguyā vā gahitāya sandissati,
tika-vin04t:1758_6: tādise pattepi punadivase bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ. Yaṃ pana bhikkhu nirapekkho sāmaṇerānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1758_7: pariccajitvā tehi nihitaṃ labhitvā bhuñjati, taṃ vaṭṭati. Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva
tika-vin04t:1758_8: hi dutiyadivase kappiyabhojanaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ. Akappiyesu pana manussamaṃse
tika-vin04t:1758_9: thullaccayena saddhiṃ pācittiyaṃ, sesesu pana dukkaṭena saddhiṃ. Yāmakālikaṃ sati
tika-vin04t:1758_10: paccaye ajjhoharato pācittiyaṃ, āhāratthāya ajjhoharato dukkaṭena saddhiṃ. Yo pana
tika-vin04t:1758_11: pavārito hutvā anatirittakataṃ ajjhoharati, tassa sabbavikappesu aparampi pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1758_12: vaḍḍhati. Sace vikāle ajjhoharati, anatirittapaccayā sabbavikappesu anāpatti, sati
tika-vin04t:1758_13: paccaye vikālapaccayā yāmakālikādīsu ca anāpatti. Avasesesu vikālapaccayā pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1758_14: vaḍḍhatiyeva. Bhikkhussa pana sannidhi bhikkhuniyā vaṭṭati, bhikkhuniyā ca sannidhi
tika-vin04t:1759_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ belaṭṭhasīsaṃ ārabbha sannidhikārakabhojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1759_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, sattāhakālika yāvajīvikānaṃ pana
tika-vin04t:1759_2: āhāratthāya paṭiggahaṇe ajjhohāre ca dukkaṭaṃ. Yathā cetāni āhāratthāya na kappanti,
tika-vin04t:1759_3: evaṃ yāvakālikādīhi saṃsaṭṭhānipi, vuttañhetaṃ “yāvakālikena, bhikkhave, yāmakālikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1759_4: tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappati, vikāle na kappatī”tiādi. Tasmā sacepi taṃ taṃ tena
tika-vin04t:1759_5: tena saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ labhati, sace asambhinnarasaṃ vā hoti sudhotaṃ vā, yathā
tika-vin04t:1759_6: itarena saṃsaggo na paññāyati, attano kālānurūpena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1760_0: Sace pana sambhinnarasaṃ vā hoti duddhotaṃ vā, na vaṭṭati. Yāvakālikañhi attanā saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1760_1: sambhinnarasāni tīṇipi yāmakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti, yāmakālikaṃ dvepi
tika-vin04t:1760_2: sattāhakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti, sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikameva attano sabhāvaṃ
tika-vin04t:1760_3: upaneti. Tasmā tena tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā pure paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin04t:1760_4: vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ kappati, dvīhappaṭiggahitena chāhaṃ, tīhappaṭiggahitena pañcāhaṃ…pe…
tika-vin04t:1760_5: sattāhappaṭiggahitena tadaheva kappatīti veditabbaṃ. Tasmāyeva hi “sattāhakālikena,
tika-vin04t:1760_6: bhikkhave, yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita”nti avatvā “paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1760_8: vasena āpattiyo veditabbā, imesu pana catūsu kālikesu yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikanti imameva
tika-vin04t:1760_9: dvayaṃ antovuṭṭhañceva sannidhikārakañca, sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca akappiyakuṭiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1760_10: nikkhipitumpi vaṭṭati, sannidhimpi na janeti. Akappiyakuṭiyaṃ antovuṭṭhena pana tena
tika-vin04t:1760_11: saddhiṃ itaradvayaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitampi na vaṭṭati, mukhasannidhi nāma hoti, mahāpaccariyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1760_12: pana antovuṭṭhaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ. Tattha nāmamattameva nānākaraṇaṃ, āpatti pana dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1760_13: Tattha akappiyakuṭi nāma saṅghassa vā upasampannapuggalassa vā santakaṃ vasanatthāya
tika-vin04t:1760_14: katagehaṃ, tattha sahaseyyappahonake padese vuṭṭhaṃ yāvakālikañca yāmakālikañca saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1760_15: vā upasampannapuggalassa vā santakaṃ antovuṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti, tattha pakkaṃ antopakkaṃ
tika-vin04t:1760_16: nāma, yattha katthaci pana sayaṃ pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ nāma, taṃ sabbaṃ anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1760_17: Tena tena saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhampi taṃgatikameva, sabbaṃ ajjhoharantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Tasmā
tika-vin04t:1760_18: antovuṭṭhaantopakkamocanatthaṃ bhagavatā catasso kappiyabhūmiyo anuññātā, tāsaṃ vinicchayo
tika-vin04t:1760_19: samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto. Yattha panetā na santi, tattha anupasampannassa santakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1760_20: katvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sāmaṃ pākampi punapākaṃ vaṭṭati, asannidhikārake sannidhikārakasaññino,
tika-vin04t:1760_21: vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Asannidhikārakasaññino, yāvakālikādīni tīṇi nidahitvā sakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1760_22: sakaṃ kālaṃ anatikkamitvā, yāvajīvikaṃ sadāpi sati paccaye paribhuñjantassa, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1760_23: anāpatti. Āmisaṃ, sannidhibhāvo, tassa ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1763_0: Navame paṇītabhojanānīti paṇītasaṃsaṭṭhāni sattadhaññanibbattāni bhojanāni. Yathā
tika-vin04t:1763_1: hi ājaññayutto ratho ‘ājaññaratho’ti vuccati, evamidhāpi paṇītasaṃsaṭṭhāni bhojanāni
tika-vin04t:1763_2: paṇītabhojanānīti. Yehi pana paṇītehi saṃsaṭṭhāni, tāni ‘paṇītabhojanānī’ti vuccanti,
tika-vin04t:1763_3: tesaṃ pabhedadassanatthaṃ seyyathidaṃ sappi navanītantiādimāha, tattha sappiādīni
tika-vin04t:1763_4: bhesajjasikkhāpade vuttalakkhaṇeneva veditabbāni. Macchādīsu pana sabbopi ‘odako’ti
tika-vin04t:1763_5: vuttalakkhaṇo maccho macchoyeva. Yesaṃ pana maṃsaṃ kappati, tesaṃ maṃsañca khīradadhīni
tika-vin04t:1763_6: ca idhādhippetāni. Evarūpāni paṇītabhojanānīti yāni etehi sappiādīhi saṃsaṭṭhattā
tika-vin04t:1763_7: ‘paṇītabhojanānī’ti vuccanti, tathārūpāni paṇītabhojanāni. Agilānoti yassa tehi vināpi
tika-vin04t:1763_8: phāsu hoti. Attano atthāya viññāpetvāti ettha pana yo agilāno suddhāni sappiādīni
tika-vin04t:1763_9: bhesajjatthāya viññāpeti, so mahānāmasikkhāpadena kāretabbo, macchādīni cattāri viññāpento
tika-vin04t:1763_10: sūpodanaviññattiyā kāretabbo, sappiādīhi saṃsaṭṭhabhojanāni viññāpento iminā kāretabbo.
tika-vin04t:1763_11: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – “sappinā bhattaṃ dehi, sappiṃ ākiritvā dehi, sappimissakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1763_12: katvā dehi, saha sappinā dehi, sappiñca bhattañca dehī”ti evaṃ viññāpentassa tāva
tika-vin04t:1763_13: viññattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhoharaṇe ajjhoharaṇe pācittiyaṃ. “Sappibhattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1763_14: dehī”ti vutte pana yasmā sālibhattaṃ viya sappibhattaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā sūpodanaviññattiyā
tika-vin04t:1763_15: dukkaṭameva hoti. Sace pana “sappinā bhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte bhattaṃ datvā “sappiṃ
tika-vin04t:1763_16: katvā bhuñjāhī”ti navanītakhīrādīni vā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ vā deti “iminā sappiṃ gahetvā
tika-vin04t:1763_17: bhuñjāhī”ti, yathāvatthukameva. “Gosappinā bhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte pana gosappiṃ vā
tika-vin04t:1763_18: detu, tasmiṃ asati purimanayena navanītādīni vā, gāviṃyeva vā detu “ito sappinā bhuñjāhī”ti,
tika-vin04t:1763_19: yathāvatthukameva. Sace pana “gosappinā dehī”ti yācito ajikāsappiādīhi deti, visaṅketaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1763_20: Evañhi sati aññaṃ yācitena aññaṃ dinnaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā anāpatti, esa nayo “ajikāsappinā
tika-vin04t:1763_21: dehī”tiādīsupi. “Kappiyasappinā dehī”ti vutte akappiyasappinā deti, visaṅketameva.
tika-vin04t:1763_22: “Akappiyasappinā dehī”ti vutte akappiyasappināva deti, paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi
tika-vin04t:1763_23: dukkaṭameva. Iminā nayena sabbapadesu vinicchayo veditabbo. Sace pana sabbehipi sappiādīhi
tika-vin04t:1763_24: ekaṭṭhāne vā nānāṭṭhāne vā viññāpetvā paṭiladdhaṃ ekato sambhinnarasaṃ katvā tato
tika-vin04t:1764_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paṇītabhojanaviññattivatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1764_2: gilānassa agilānasaññino, vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Gilānasaññissa, gilānakāle viññāpetvā
tika-vin04t:1764_3: agilānassa bhuñjato, gilānassa sesake, ñātakappavāritaṭṭhānato, aññassatthāya viññatte,
tika-vin04t:1764_4: attano dhanena gahite, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Paṇītabhojanatā, agilānatā, kataviññattiyā
tika-vin04t:1764_5: paṭilābho, ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1764_6: nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
tika-vin04t:1767_0: Dasame adinnanti kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā gaṇhantassa hatthapāse ṭhatvā kāyakāyappaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1767_1: aññatarena na dinnaṃ, appaṭiggahitakassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Appaṭiggahitakañhi bhikkhuno attano
tika-vin04t:1767_2: santakampi ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati. Paṭiggahitaṃ antamaso vissāsikasantakampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1767_3: tassa lakkhaṇaṃ vuttavipallāsena veditabbaṃ. Sace hi yo koci anupasampanno antamaso
tika-vin04t:1767_4: tiracchānopi bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā hatthapāse ṭhito kāyādīnaṃ aññatarena deti,
tika-vin04t:1767_5: tañce bhikkhunā yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena vā, tappaṭibaddhena vā, saṃhārimena ca
tika-vin04t:1767_6: antamaso mañcenāpi, dhāretuṃ samatthena ca antamaso atatthajātakarukkhapaṇṇenāpi,
tika-vin04t:1767_7: sūciyā parāmaṭṭhamattenāpi paṭiggahitaṃ, paṭiggahitameva hoti. Paṭibaddhappaṭibaddhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1767_8: nāma idha natthi, yampi natthukaraṇiyā diyyamānaṃ nāsikāya, akallako vā mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1767_9: sabbaṃ vaṭṭati, ābhogamattameva hettha pamāṇaṃ. Pubbābhoge ca sati pacchā niddāyantassa
tika-vin04t:1767_10: patte dinnampi hatthapāse sati paṭiggahitameva hoti. Yampi “pattena paṭiggaṇhissāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1767_11: nisinnasseva hatthe patati, taṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Abhihaṭabhājanato patitarajampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1767_12: tattha ṭhitanisinnanipannānaṃ pavāraṇāsikkhāpade vuttanayeneva hatthapāso veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1768_0: Sace pana dāyakappaṭiggāhakesu eko ākāse hoti, eko bhūmiyaṃ, bhūmaṭṭhassa sīsena
tika-vin04t:1768_1: ākāsaṭṭhassa ca ṭhapetvā dātuṃ vā gahetuṃ vā pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1768_2: tassa orimantena hatthapāsappamāṇaṃ paricchinditabbaṃ. Sacepi eko kūpe hoti, eko
tika-vin04t:1768_3: kūpataṭe, eko vā rukkhe, eko pathaviyaṃ, vuttanayeneva hatthapāsappamāṇaṃ paricchinditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1768_4: Tasmiṃ ṭhatvā sacepi dve tayo vā sāmaṇerā yaṃ majjhimo puriso ukkhipituṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin04t:1768_5: evarūpaṃ bhāraṃ pavaṭṭentā bhikkhuno bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitahatthaṃ āropenti, ukkhipitvā
tika-vin04t:1768_6: vā bhikkhuno pasāritahatthe ekadesenāpi ṭhapenti, taṃ paṭiggahitameva hoti. Yaṃ pana
tika-vin04t:1768_7: piṇḍāya carantassa patte rajaṃ patati, taṃ appaṭiggahitameva hoti, tasmā paṭiggahetvāva
tika-vin04t:1768_8: bhikkhā gaṇhitabbā. Appaṭiggahetvā gaṇhantassa vinayadukkaṭaṃ, taṃ pana puna paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin04t:1768_9: bhuñjantassa anāpatti. Sace “paṭiggahetvā dethā”ti vutte vacanaṃ assutvā vā anādiyitvā
tika-vin04t:1768_10: vā bhikkhaṃ dentiyeva, vinayadukkaṭā muccati, puna paṭiggahetvā aññā bhikkhā paṭiggahetabbā.
tika-vin04t:1768_11: Sace mahāvāto tato tato rajaṃ pāteti, na sakkā hoti bhikkhaṃ gahetuṃ, “anupasampannassa
tika-vin04t:1768_12: dassāmī”ti suddhacittena ābhogaṃ katvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Taṃ anupasampannassa datvā
tika-vin04t:1768_13: puna tena dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsena vā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Assukheḷasiṅghāṇikādīsu
tika-vin04t:1768_14: yaṃ ṭhānato cavitvā hatthe vā patte vā patati, taṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ, aṅgalaggaṃ paṭiggahitameva.
tika-vin04t:1768_15: Patantampi vocchinnañce antarā na gahetabbaṃ, uggahitakaṃ nāma hoti, taṃ pacchā paṭiggahitampi
tika-vin04t:1768_16: na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana bhesajjaṃ vā mūlaphalaṃ vā mātādīnaṃ atthāya gahetvā chāyatthāya
tika-vin04t:1768_17: vā phalinisākhaṃ ukkhipitvā gacchati, tato yaṃ icchati, taṃ puna paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin04t:1768_18: vaṭṭati. Yo pana tattha jātakaphalinisākhāya vā valliyā vā gahetvā cāleti. Tassa
tika-vin04t:1768_19: tato laddhaṃ phalaṃ na vaṭṭati, durupaciṇṇadukkaṭañca āpajjati, aññassa taṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1768_20: phalirukkhaṃ pana apassayituṃ vā ālambituṃ vā vaṭṭati, paṭiggahetvā ṭhapite yaṃ aññaṃ
tika-vin04t:1768_21: aṅkurādi uppajjati, paṭiggahitameva taṃ. Yāva hi hatthato mutte nirapekkho na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1768_22: nirapekkhatāya vā hatthato na muccati, tāva na paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati, ayamettha saṅkhepo,
tika-vin04t:1769_0: Mukhadvāranti galanāḷikaṃ. Mukhena vā hi paviṭṭhaṃ hotu, nāsikāya vā, galena ajjhoharaṇīyatāya
tika-vin04t:1769_1: sabbampi taṃ mukhadvāraṃ pavesitameva hoti. Āhāranti yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1769_2: vā sattāhakālikaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ vā. Sabbañhetaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyattā ‘āhāro’ti vuccati,
tika-vin04t:1769_3: tattha sabbampi dhaññaṃ vā dhaññānulomaṃ vā tālanāḷikerapanasalabujaalābukumbhaṇḍapussaphalatipusaphalaeḷālukasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin04t:1769_4: navavidhaṃ mahāphalañceva aparaṇṇañca, yañcaññaṃ vanamūlapattapupphaphalādi āhāratthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1769_5: pharati, taṃ sabbaṃ yāva majjhanhikakālo, tāva paribhuñjitabbato yāvakālikaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1769_6: Ambapānaṃ jambupānaṃ cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ madhukapānaṃ muddikapānaṃ sālūkapānaṃ phārusakapānanti
tika-vin04t:1769_7: imāni aṭṭha pānāni, yāni ca tesaṃ anulomāni vettatintiṇikamātuluṅgakapiṭṭhakosambakaramandādikhuddakaphalapānāni,
tika-vin04t:1769_8: etāni sabbāni anupasampannehi sītodakena madditvā katāni ādiccapākāni vā yāva rattiyā
tika-vin04t:1769_9: pacchimayāmaṃ nidahitvā paribhuñjitabbato yāmakālikāni nāma. Avasesesu anuññātaphalapattapuppharasesupi
tika-vin04t:1769_10: eseva nayo. Sappiādīni pañca bhesajjāni sattāhaṃ nidahitvā paribhuñjitabbato sattāhakālikāni
tika-vin04t:1769_11: nāma. Idaṃ pana yāvakālikādittayaṃ kālavimuttañca udakaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesamūlaphalāphalādi
tika-vin04t:1769_12: yaṃ neva khādanīyatthaṃ na bhojanīyatthaṃ pharati, taṃ yāvajīvaṃ nidahitvā sati paccaye
tika-vin04t:1769_13: paribhuñjitabbato yāvajīvikaṃ nāma. Āhareyyāti paveseyya. Aññatra udakadantaponāti
tika-vin04t:1769_14: idaṃ anāhārepi udake āhārasaññāya, dantapone ca “mukhadvāraṃ āhaṭaṃ ida”nti saññāya
tika-vin04t:1769_15: kukkuccāyantānaṃ kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Udakañhi yathāsukhaṃ pātuṃ, dantakaṭṭhañca
tika-vin04t:1769_16: dantaponaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Ṭhapetvā pana idaṃ dvayaṃ avasesaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya
tika-vin04t:1769_17: gaṇhato gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre pācittiyaṃ, sacepi dantakaṭṭharaso ajānantassa
tika-vin04t:1770_0: Vesāliyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha adinnaṃ āhāraṃ āharaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1770_2: tikapācittiyaṃ, paṭiggahitake appaṭiggahitasaññino, vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭiggahitasaññissa,
tika-vin04t:1770_3: udakadantapone, cattāri mahāvikaṭāni sati paccaye asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin04t:1770_4: paribhuñjantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Ettha dubbacopi asamatthopi kappiyakārako
tika-vin04t:1770_5: asantapakkheyeva tiṭṭhati, chārikāya asati sukkhadāruṃ jhāpetvā, tasmiñca asati alladāruṃ
tika-vin04t:1770_6: rukkhato chinditvāpi kātuṃ, mattikatthāya ca pathaviṃ khaṇitumpi vaṭṭati, idaṃ pana
tika-vin04t:1770_7: catubbidhampi mahāvikaṭaṃ kālodissaṃ nāma sappadaṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva sāmaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1770_8: aññadā paṭiggāhāpetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Appaṭiggahitakatā, ananuññātatā, dhūmādiabbohārikābhāvo,
tika-vin04t:1770_9: ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:1775: Acelakavaggassa paṭhame etesaṃ acelakādīnaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ ekappayogena dentassa ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ, avacchinditvā avacchinditvā dentassa payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1776_0: Vesāliyaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paribbājikāya dve pūve dānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1776_1: asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, udakadantaponaṃ dentassa, atitthiye
tika-vin04t:1776_2: titthiyasaññissa, vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Atitthiye atitthiyasaññissa, anupasampannena
tika-vin04t:1776_3: dāpentassa, tesaṃ santike bhājanaṃ nikkhipitvā “idaṃ gaṇhathā”ti bhaṇantassa, tesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1776_4: vā nikkhittabhājane dentassa, bāhiralepaṃ dentassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Aññatitthiyatā,
tika-vin04t:1776_5: ananuññātatā, ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya sahatthā anikkhittabhājane dānanti
tika-vin04t:1779_0: Dutiye dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vāti yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ dāpetvā vā na dāpetvā vā. Uyyojeyyāti
tika-vin04t:1779_1: mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasanakīḷanarahonisajjādīni kattukāmo ‘gacchā’tiādīni vatvā uyyojeyya.
tika-vin04t:1779_2: Etadevāti etaṃ anācārameva paccayaṃ karitvā, na aññaṃ patirūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Pācittiyanti
tika-vin04t:1779_3: uyyojanamatte tāva dukkaṭaṃ, yadā panassa so dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā ekena
tika-vin04t:1779_4: pādena vijahati, aparaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyena vijahite pācittiyaṃ. Ettha ca dassanūpacārassa
tika-vin04t:1779_5: ajjhokāse ṭhatvā dvādasahatthappamāṇaṃ, tathā savanūpacārassa. Sace pana antarā kuṭṭadvārapākārādayo
tika-vin04t:1780_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha uyyojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, uyyojanāṇattikāya
tika-vin04t:1780_1: sāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ, ubhinnampi kalisāsanāropane
tika-vin04t:1780_2: dukkaṭameva, “ubho ekato na yāpessāmā”ti evamādīhi patirūpakāraṇehi uyyojentassa,
tika-vin04t:1780_3: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Anācāraṃ ācaritukāmatā, tadatthameva upasampannassa uyyojanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1780_4: evaṃ uyyojitassa upacārātikkamoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisānīti.
